I tried different chargers and cables and still no response. called the support as it was still under warranty and went through the steps with them pressing the button combinations as instructed by the support representative. Then he told me to send it for repair. I sent it.Today 5/19/2014: Today, the other one had the same issue. Called SAMSUNG. They told me to send it for repair and gave me the shipment label.The device itself is very good when it works. But it's a big flaw that the battery goes bad if it's completely discharged and it's not user replaceable. If I replaced it as shown on many videos online, I would've lost the warranty and replacing it needs screw drivers and some not so easy steps to disconnect the battery from the motherboard then reconnect the new one.They should've made the battery as reliable and user friendly as their cell phones to be able to change it without losing the warranty. But again a battery that goes bad upon complete discharge is unforgivable in a device like this. I always thought that one of the advantages of the SAMSUNG Galaxy cell phones over the iPhone is the ability to change the battery without needing to give your phone to Apple then get a refurbished one and go through backup and restore. Now that's the case with the Galaxy Tab3.

Reviews.Title: Terrible buy! I feel both amazon and Samsung Company has robbed my money.
Reviews.Author: NAOMI
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a Christmas gift for my daughter, and havent been able to use it properly. The tablet came with charging issues and does not charge. I bought a new charger (original) thinking i would solve the issue but no, I contacted Amazon and they refered me to the supplier "Samsung" who says the are not responsible for things sold by Amazon! What the heck i dont understand , at the end I paid for a product that its not working and it seems as i cant complain since no one is responsible. I am very dissapointed with both companies.

Reviews.Title: Same on Samsung!
Reviews.Author: J. Calderon "JONZI216"
Reviews.Content: shame on samsung for putting out such a crappy tabet. I purchased 2 as christmans gifts, this tablet lacks normal performance,  very laggy, crappy cameras, crappy resolution, and god forbid you add apps! they will lag, freeze or crash. these "paper weights" are going right back!  not worth the aggrivation , please keep clear of this garbage.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love love love this tablet!  I have a Kindle Fire HD (7") which I also love, but my three year old has claimed it as his own, so I was in need of a suitable replacement.  I did not purchase this item from Amazon, but through Sprint, who is offering the tablet for $49.99 with a two-year data plan (I have absolutely no intention of using the data plan, but at $5/month, it works out to be a cheaper alternative than shelling out over $200 for a tablet with only half the memory).This tablet has every feature that I would ever want in a tablet.  The size is perfect--it is lightweight, but feels comfortable and sturdy while holding it.  It has an Android platform, so virtually every app is available for it (except those exclusive to Apple).  I have used it to watch movies, play games, and listen to music--and everything is just amazing.  I will, however, concede to the views of others regarding to the placement of the speaker...sound is great in portrait mode, not so great in landscape...so you might want to use headphones.  I have had no issues with the resolution of the screen, but I am no expert, so I wouldn't know if the display was inferior.It is VERY easy to use right out of the box.  Just set it up and go.  Highly recommend this tablet!!  :)

Reviews.Title: nice tablet don't litsen to people can't please!
Reviews.Author: dogg 40
Reviews.Content: What a nice tablet it has a better screen then my galaxy 3 phone prerty fast to well worth the money buy one you won't regret it don't litsen to bad reveiws this thing rocks

Reviews.Title: Nothing to do compared to the S phones
Reviews.Author: tesia971
Reviews.Content: Hi, I bought this tablet as a promotion from my local cable company, I was expecting something outstanding, like the S3 did in its time, but it's completely the opposite.It's just too slow, if I play a video game sometimes it freezes, to be more precise playing Candy Crush Saga, as well as other games.When I open a Chrome window and click the address bar at the top, I've counted up to 5 seconds for the keyboard to appear and the lagging it has when using other apps just makes it awkward to use.My daughter (10 yrs old) calls it the blocked tablet, because it's always freezing on her.I also have a Playbook from Blackberry which is faster than the Samsung, and it was release in 2011.My recommendation, don't buy it, spend a little more on a Nexus 7 or the iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: WAY too underpowered for the price
Reviews.Author: Jacob B
Reviews.Content: 1024x600 screen? Dual-core 1.3ghz processor? 3MP fixed-focus camera without flash? The $130 Sero 7 Pro from Walmart has a 1280x800 screen, 5mp camera with flash, mini-hdmi, quad-core 1.3ghz processor, microSD, micro USB (pretty universal). Sorry, Samsung. You could do much better.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: fun, as far as I can tell
Reviews.Content: I was so hesitant to purchase this tablet after some pretty poor reviews, however.....I did buy it, and am so glad I did. I have had no problems what so ever with this tablet.  It's quick to access pages on the internet, the 3-4g works great when we are out and about.  The screen is great to look at, I mean it's not hd like my fire however I notice very little difference.  It's small and much thinner and lighter than my fire which makes it nice to carry around.  I have had no trouble with battery life, I was surfing quite a bit the first 2 days and only recharged it one time.  The camera leaves little to be desired, but for the price you have to sacrifice something.  I have yet to have it freeze up on me while surfing around.  I will be purchasing a larger memory chip at some point.  I haven't watched any movies or youtube so I really can't give any information as to how well that works.  All in all I love it at this point.  A great little tablet for the price.  Sprint is actually running a promotion right now, 50$ for the tablet and I pay 15$ a month for the data plan.  Much cheaper than a smart phone!!!  One more thing, I went on Amazon, bought a great case, screen protector and stylus all for 10$ so make sure wherever you buy your tablet doesn't try to rob you blind for these items :)

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!!
Reviews.Author: chris Borgman
Reviews.Content: WOW!!! Incredibly fast, and very relevant! gift for my little brother, (age 8) and he has a ton of apps on it already and it still runs very fast! I definitely recommend it, and I may get one for myself! I got it on a Sunday!!!!

Reviews.Title: Android needs more apps
Reviews.Author: read55
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and does pretty much what I need it to but several of the television apps are not available in the app store. Also the fact fhat Adobe flash player is no longer supported for the newer OS is a real minus. If you're thinking of using this tablet for watching tv, be sure to check out the Google play store before buying so you know what tv apps are available.

Reviews.Title: Good enough for the price but a lot behind similar products.
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Sabino
Reviews.Content: I  really expected more from this tablet but I works fine until now. Beware the battery runs out too fast.

Reviews.Title: Tab 3?
Reviews.Author: Norman Spaulding
Reviews.Content: Slow wifi connection, can't use for internet chat, signal for wifi not as good as Tab 2.. I'd rather had bought a Tab 2.

Reviews.Title: Not Very Good
Reviews.Author: Marc Faucher
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a Christmas gift in 2013, thinking it would be a good entry level tablet. It isn't. I should have just spent the extra money and bought an iPad. I ended up keeping it for myself (gave replacement gift card to original recipient who obviously didn't like it) and when I occasionally try to use it, it's nothing but a frustrating experience. Even simple tasks can prove annoyingly difficult at times. It's basically worthless and I'm not sure why I ever bother charging the battery.

Reviews.Title: Worst of the Galaxy Tab family I've seen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jer"
Reviews.Content: We've had the 10.1 inch version 1 and 2, and a 7 inch version 2 in our family - and this one is garbage. It's slower than the original, constantly locks up and doesn't seem to be capable of handling most of the apps we attempt on it.If this is the third version - I don't understand why the specs are so awful on it. It should have a noticeable improvement over version 1 - but I don't see what they've changed. Aside from making it slower.I got it for someone as a gift, and feel horrible, as the thing is always having problems.

Reviews.Title: S L O W
Reviews.Author: Liana Mayle
Reviews.Content: The tablet is ok, I like the quality of the screen, all the apps etc. But it has one major problem...it's very slow!! My previous tablet was a Google Nexus 7, worked impeccably and was almost the same as this one, 8 GB of storage, 1 GB of RAM. I am honestly disappointed, but I am dealing with it, I can't afford another one. I always chose my Nexus over my laptop, but with the Samsung I pretty much try to stay away from it as much as possible, I'd rather use my laptop. Wouldn't recommend it unfortunately. I wish I would've purchased a Nexus again. If anybody has a solution to my problem please share...

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT
Reviews.Author: OSWALDO ARTIAGA
Reviews.Content: I AM USER OF TABLES FOR MORE OR LESS 3 Anor, THIS 7 "I'M VERY PLEASED AS ME ALLOWED TO DO ALL MY WORK ME REQUIRES ALSO ME OFFERS MANY OPTIONS ENTRETEIMIENTO AND MAKE SEVERAL TASKS AT THE SAME TIME AS HIGHLY RECOMMEND, THANKS TO MY SUPPLIER, THE TRADEMARK AND AMAZON IN MY CLIENT A THANKFUL AND HAPPY, I WISH YOU ALL MANY SUCCESSES.

Reviews.Title: Not an upgrade to the Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking I was upgrading from my tired (yet still fully functional) Tab 2 7.  My intention was to give the old Tab 2 to my sons and I'd have a brand new, snappier device - wrong!  This thing was very sluggish since day one.  I decided to make a few tweaks to it (launcher, turning off some settings) but it never improved.  It was very sluggish, there was a delay to any action performed, and it would freeze just using Chrome  (pre-installed) until it would just restart on its own.  It also had random restarts even though I wasn't doing anything with it.  I'd want to think that I received a defective unit but found a lot of people having similar results with theirs.  I'm fed up with it, can't do basic things (I don't play video games on it - just read articles and watch YouTube videos).  So, it's going back.Edit 4/29/2014:  Forgot to add that the power button will get stuck so that will also cause it to turn off/reset.  Also, some apps like Google Play store would stop working and I finally noticed that the time would reset - different year, different day/month, different time and time zone.  Couldn't figure out why.

Reviews.Title: Problems
Reviews.Author: Christal Munroe
Reviews.Content: I started off saying this is a great product but it started giving alot of problems. Major problem saying it is connected to the wifi and it really is not connecting at all. I recently had to send it out to samsung to have it repaired. This is after having it for 3 months. They did not even replace it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Vernell
Reviews.Content: It fits in my purse. I can use it when I travel. I love having it among the books in my livingroom so that I can get extra information on the  subject I am reading about. My omly wish is that it had a usb port.

Reviews.Title: Good starter tablet at a great price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these so our twins could Skype with Grandma and read at the same time without fighting. My husband has a S3 phone and is familiar with the operating system. I have an iPhone, so I'm unfamiliar with Android devices. I'm learning to use it and it's great. I have Nook and Kindle apps, Facebook, email, and tv apps on mine. My mom loves to read and take pictures with hers.For the price, it is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Much better than I thought it would be!
Reviews.Author: Lothos
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Galaxy Tab 3 right after the Tab 4 was announced.  I was originally looking at the Nexus 7, which has much better specs, but didn't purchase it because Square and other credit card readers aren't fully compatible.  They're compatible with the Tab 3 which is why I purchased this one, and I got the Tab 3 on sale for a really nice price.I do photography, and needed something to show photos on, and was originally worried about the low resolution screen not being good enough but it looks really nice in person.  The tablet feels snappy and quick and I've only rarely noticed any lag on it.  It works great as an ebook reader.While I was hesitant at first, after receiving the tablet I'm quite satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Geat Tablet, be careful of Amazon's fake promotion
Reviews.Author: Mei
Reviews.Content: Pros: The tablet works well, very clear, just the right size to carry around without adding too much weight. Its been 3 days but i love itCons: Amazon promises to "Pre-loaded with free content including Hulu Plus membership, Google Play credit and Boingo Wi-Fi Access" Not true! theyre actually referring to the Free memberships we already get, there is no added benefit. Notice they dont even mention how much the google play credit will be. It was all very sneaky of Amazon and I am very surprised and disappointed with them

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY TABLET
Reviews.Author: Jeanniss Martinez
Reviews.Content: ITS EVERYTHING I COULD ASK FOR I LOVE IT. I ENJOY PLAYING MY GAMES AND READING MY BOOKS ON MY KINDLE APP. THANK YOU FOR A GOOS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for someone new to tablets
Reviews.Author: Marvi
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my Dad for Christmas and he's a bit older but a little techie so he hadn't tried a tablet. He found he has a lot of uses for it. Great little device.

Reviews.Title: samsung tablet
Reviews.Author: jteekalall
Reviews.Content: great value for the money. awesome tablet my 12 yr old is a pro handling this. worth the tablet price

Reviews.Title: The perfect size.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bobkelly41"
Reviews.Content: I have tried a lot of tablets and I don't think the perfect one exists. This is as close as it gets. Crystal clear screen and it is similar to most of my Samsung products so short learning curve.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: was just what I wanted love this thing. got a 64 gig micro sd for it and have tons of space. I read on this thing , watch movies and listen to music.

Reviews.Title: exceed my expectations
Reviews.Author: pinkie
Reviews.Content: Well no problems withbthe tablet so far, I am impressed with it , it does more than I expected it to do anc its a good bug compared to thd othef brands.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: michelle from Pa
Reviews.Content: this was a Christmas gift for my niece who absolutely loved it.  What's not to love.  Came promptly and it was a hit!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: RobtheTechGuy
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet. Size is excellent and performance is 9 out of 10. I love Samsung's feature where you can turn off apps you don't want to use. The only annoyance is that it only trickle charges from a usb port and the only way to correct that is to root it. Which I've done. So no serious complaints. Performance is there screen is beautiful. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Best little tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: EUN S. CHANG
Reviews.Content: We purchased 4 of these for our key plant people to keep track of inventory, to communicate with each other through either e-mails, skype, or via pictures and videos.  Could not fathom that a tablet with a $150.00 per unit could do all this and more.  We were original thinking of Apple products but only spent a fraction.  This unit comes with a program that is fully compatible with Microsoft Office which sealed the deal.  We also purchase some [Rhino] Black Heavy Duty rugged impact Hybrid Case with Build In Kickstand Protective Case For Samsung Tablet Galaxy Tab 3 7" P3200 which made these rugged enough to be used in our plant.

Reviews.Title: Excelent tab
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been using Ipad for as long as four years. This is a great tab. Less expensive than Apple, fast, great expandible memory, excelent view for less than 150 bucks.

Reviews.Title: confortable additional equipment
Reviews.Author: bataille

Reviews.Title: I should of purchased this from right from the get go..
Reviews.Author: argadames
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet so my baby daughter can see her sesame street videos and since the price was so cheap I purchased a Dragon Touch, big mistake.. Let it be known I dropped it and that was the end... So I purchased this Samsung Galaxy Tab 3, I should have done that from the beginning. It has a clear image, great sound and the design is way sturdier. The only downside is It needs an adapter to connect to the TV via HDMI, regardless I would definitely recommend it!

Personally, I would have returned it because I think it's horribly slow but she seems to like it. Also, don't ever use the power saver function. It renders the device nearly unusable.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: pinky
Reviews.Content: I would recommend. I like it better than first generation because it is faster and slimmer with a universal charging plug

Reviews.Title: Love it-very satified for what I use it for
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: this is the first time I have bought myself something nice in a very, very long time.  I know it isn't much to some people, but to me, I absolutely love it.  Haven't had any problems with it and I have had it for about a month now.  Everything that I needed it for, it is perfect.  I can watch about 3 movies on it before the battery needs charging.  It charges quickly.  I can stream just about anything on it. My only problem is the wi-fi in the areas I am in.  Sometimes it doesn't want to stay connected, but that is a minimal issue.  I live in a heavily wooded area and with my wi-fi at home I have no problems.  Overall, my experience thus far is excellent for what I use it or need it for!!!  Samsung is the only way to go in these types of electronics in my opinion.  I also had my brother confir before I bought this.  I know the cost is alot to some people either, but with me, it is a lot of money and I didn't want to throw it away.  My brother is the tech guy in our family.  His opinion means the most to me when it comes to electronics. He owns the newest galaxy tab 10.1 inch.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: kimstann
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my business because I wanted to take pictures and store them in folders without needing a regular computer.  The program that comes with it was perfect so no need to purchase anything else.  Got it at a really good price on amazon and the only reason I did not give it a Five is because I do not use it to it's full extent.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: JOSHUE MANUEL PEREZ RASTELLI
Reviews.Content: the tablet are fast, en the resolution is good, run well on the internet by wifi. i,m happy with my tablet

Reviews.Title: a letdown
Reviews.Author: Justin Walsh
Reviews.Content: Even though this is long, i would recommend reading all of it to see if you have any similar apps or games that I use before purchasing this product.i tried to carefully research before purchasing the galaxy tab 3 over the nexus 7, however until you start having issues and begin to try to find solutions, do the true user impressions come forward. All the reviews i read on amazon were pretty close to the same, "its better than tab 2 and great for the price!" I'll start with what i liked about the Tab 3. Since it's a Samsung product, and i already had a Samsung Galaxy S Blaze phone, once I signed in using my Samsung account, all the apps i have on my phone started downloading automatically. Also, all of my wifi hotspots and passwords were transferred so i didn't have to remember and recall of my family's home network passwords. and since this is also a Google product, a simple sign in also allowed me access to all my Google accounts like youtube, gmail, and all the Google services that i participate in. The product is a nice size and fits in my hands well. It feels well put together, not cheap but not as sturdy as i was hoping either. the screen is bright and crisp and the touch responds well most of the time. it uses a micro usb cable to charge and connect to the computer. i already have 2 Samsung phones and an amazon kindle hd, so i didn't have to purchase any extra cables and can charge it where ever i have strategically placed a charging station around my home. I also love the microSD port that can expand the memory up to 64 Gigabits. Now i'll move on to some of the problems. i have had issues where the back button, common on android devices, just stopped working and i had to wait for it to become responsive again (restarting did not fix the issue). i also had an instance where i was surfing the web and then suddenly the wifi connection just stopped. It recognized the home network was there, it just wouldn't connect to it. I know it was working because i picked up my phone and started browsing using it with no issues. A restart fixed the issue but it still bothered me. Also when browsing it felt slow to me so again i picked up my phone and did a little test. i went to the same website on both my Galaxy Blaze and the Galaxy Tab 3. Every time, the phone loaded up the page quicker, even on refreshes. Which brings me to the most disappointing reason and the main reason i am returning it(other than the defects like the back button and wifi shutting off), my apps. Since all my apps starting downloading once i signed into my samsung and google account, i was pretty stoked that i wouldn't have to go find them individually and i wouldn't have to always use my phone for games, reading, or time killing apps. One of my favorite games is Simpsons: Tapped Out. Once everything was done downloading i fired up Tapped Out first. It worked fine for around 3 minutes, then it crashed back to the home screen. I tried to relaunch it, once i clicked to start playing, it crashed to the home screen again. i restarted the tablet and attempted to relaunch again. This time the game got hung on the loading screen and the back of the tablet next to the camera lens starting getting very hot (obviously this is where the processor is). i forced a restart and began to check if anyone else was having issues. This is a common issue with the game on the Tab 3 with many people not able to play. i couldn't understand why my 3 year phone can play game, that my 1 year old tablet couldn't. so i started to dig a little deeper. i found that many people are having game and app issues with the Galaxy Tab 3 and apparently this has to do with the resolution of the screen. The tab 3 has a resolution of 1024 X 600, while most newer apps require 1024X800 ( which is what most other tablets at least have if not higher). I have had issues with other apps that work fine on my phone but not on the tablet such as Lego: My City and the Chive app. i talked to someone from Samsung and they said the apps may not be completely compatible with my device. Again, i couldn't understand why my phone can play them flawlessly and this tablet cannot. Not all of the apps were glitchy or unusable, the Kindle app and Comixology worked very well and, even though slow, the web browsing worked okay. i also have Angry Birds and Bad Piggies loaded and those both worked as well. Maybe all these issues get fixed with a new android OS update(it's currently 4.1 Jellybean), maybe this is an isolated incident, but I'm not going to try again with this tablet and will recommend it only to those looking strictly for a reading device with occasional web browsing

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Krystle Vian
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet. Why didn't I get one sooner? Its great for browsing the web, watching Hulu or Netflix, checking social media, writing my many lists and so much more! The only thing is the camera is awful. Sometimes it feels like its comparable to a kids disposable camera, and there isn't even a flash option. I gave up and use my phone or my digital camera, but you would think with something like this the camera would be a lot nicer and durable. Other than that, the tablet is fast, reliable and works great!

Reviews.Title: Bought it as a gift for my Fiancee for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: And I am the one using it all the time.It is pretty much like my phone, but bigger.Works well.

Reviews.Title: I wish I knew then what I know now...
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: The size, color  and features are nice.  The camera could use a flash for indoor photos and photos taken at night. I found out after purchasing a micro SD card that apps cannot be moved to the SD card, only pictures and documents..which I still have not figured out how to do. Plus if you set up drop box or any cloud system they can be sent directly there, so you do not need the SD.  As a result, I am very conservative in the the number and types of apps I download.  I ask my self do I really need it. For example, I downloaded the Washington post app.It takes up a lot of memory, so I thought I was going to move it to the micro SD , but as I mentioned above you cannot move apps to the SD card.Had I really known and understood this was not an option, I might have picked another device.  Also I find that is very slow. I have used a ipad for work and other things and moves a lot faster.  It's not a bad product, but I still find myself opening my laptop to get things done faster.

Reviews.Title: Runs slow
Reviews.Author: Damita
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I had a GalaxyTab 2 that got wet so I had to replace it. the Tab 3 is slow.Takes along time to load.Maybe mine was refurbished?Sold as new. It doesn't have good features like the Tab 2.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Erin L. Dodgen
Reviews.Content: I go this for my daughter and she loves it! Very user friendly and holds a charge well. Helps that I have a Samsung tablet and phone myself!

Reviews.Author: J. Hub

The diagonal length of the screen is the 7 inches.  Smaller than my e reader I have but still worth the price.  Still have a few issues to work out because it's different than the e reader of course.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dana O'Brien
Reviews.Content: Manufactures packaging, works flawlessly. No problems. Packaging was perfect. Great hand held tablet for the price.  We are Android lovers here!

Reviews.Title: tab

Reviews.Title: Gift to myself

Reviews.Content: Had  wanted a tablet because of the convenience.  The Tab 3 does everything I need it for. Not the top of the line but pretty good if you just want something to keep up with Facebook or play some games or follow e mail. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung

Reviews.Content: This tablet is great I love it I can go any where with it fixs in any all my bags I can get into any of my apps the sound on it so good I can be in the next room and still hear my music playing  niceeeee :)

Reviews.Title: probably the best tablet for its price range
Reviews.Author: Paulo
Reviews.Content: battery last between 2 and 5 days, depending on how much I use it, if I don't use it at all, probably would last 3 or 4 days more.all the applications I have installed work perfectly, it nevers freezes and the size makes it portable, and you still have a decent screen.

Reviews.Title: Best Christmas present of the year
Reviews.Author: Dana B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother-in-law as a Christmas present.  My husband said it was a bad idea, but I didn't listen.  He talked to her yesterday and had to admit that she loves it and is considering getting cell service for it so she can enjoy more features on it, like texting the grandkids.  One thing she mentioned specifically is that it takes great pictures.  She is almost 80, so that is a good indication of just how easy it is to use, and how clear the display is.  One of the features I was most interested in when I chose it for her was the blue tooth option, so she can listen to audio books over her car stereo.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: elizabeth gallegos
Reviews.Content: Great tablet...very convenient size and love that it has expandable memory.  Works great with Wii. Easy to user right out of the box .

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Online Shopper "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  This is the 3rd tablet I've bought for my granddaughter.  I bought cheaper ones thinking that I'd get her a nicer one when she is older.  This was a mistake since the money I spent on 2 prior cheaper ones could have been applied toward a higher quality one from the beginning and I'd be money ahead.  I've always had success with Samsung products, so should have gone this route when I first bought her a tablet.  She loves it, and I don't have to see the disappointment in her face when the cheap ones bite the dust.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: just what I needed
Reviews.Author: PetalG
Reviews.Content: Its a good inexpensive travel tablet. Not too many frills lighweight. Get a case though. It seems to scratch easy.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: stylist@20
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet its versatile fits perfectly between my palms and with an expandable memory of upto 64 GB what more could you ask for...my only cons for this product are....*.it tends to freeze when multiple apps are being ran or when you've downloaded a few apps*.a usb  adapter cannot be used with this model only with the 8" and 10"*.this model doesn't use a SIM card*. And the expandable storage for the micro sd card cannot store apps on it...its just for files like your videos, photos, music etc but not for your apps or games. The 8gb that is built in the tablet is for those stuff.So I've been using this device for like near to a month now...I've heard other reviewers said that if your tablet battery drains to the point of shutting down it will never turn back on so I try my best not to let that happen lol...I ordered the tab 3 7" on the 7 and got my order on the 9 with standard shipping..it was super fast even though the sellers where having delays due to snow storm...Another issue I have...why does the price of the tab 3 7" keeps floctuating..I paid $235 inclusive of tax and shiping in total and a week later I check back on amazon its price has changed to $150 inclusive of shiping and taxes..that's just crazy.So that's about it for now if anything else arises I'll b sure to update this review

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Erika De la Rosa Enamorado
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my nephew.  It's beautiful, perfect fit for a kid and have many useful apps. I wan't another for me :-)

Reviews.Title: Great Priice

Reviews.Content: This was worth it!  I purchased for my 7-year old and she loves it.  It is very much a competition for the much expensive ipad mini.  I am impress and think this is indeed a great item for the price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: SANDRA
Reviews.Content: I loved the tablet has a screen with HD, I liked that I can download many games and applications. but I wish the battery lasted longer.

Reviews.Title: Best of the Andriod Tabs
Reviews.Author: Chris Fullerton "Fixer - TheBGCS.com"
Reviews.Content: Samsung is making leaps and bounds above the others! I bought one of these for my wife after she was constantly complaining about how much she hated my smartphone! She quickly learned Android so she could play games and the like, and now SHE has a smart phone! Next, I bought another for my Grandson, He's ten and it's time he had his own computer, I warned him it's fragile and got him a case telling him, if you break it it's gone and won't be replaced! Another lesson for him that is working. He's keeping his grades up (straight A's) and he's taken good care of the machine he loves. I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Way too slow!
Reviews.Author: Paul Poynot
Reviews.Content: I saw the previous reviews about how slow this tablet was and totally ignored them. What a mistake! On my wifi at home it moves at the speed of snail. I also had apps closing while using them.  Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab
Reviews.Author: Rhonda "Rhonda"
Reviews.Content: this was a surprise for our daughter for  Christmas and she was so very happy with it....easy to set up and she has it with her at all times small enough for her to carry in her purse.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy tab 3 7"
Reviews.Author: Budroe
Reviews.Content: This I have really enjoyed. I rate it with a5* and it deserves it.I really like it also because it's layed out just like my Samsung galaxy S 3.Got every thing but the phone. And it flows so smooth and feels good in my hand.

Reviews.Title: Works great, operation is as advertised and no problems
Reviews.Author: M. Kerwood "aibkegit"
Reviews.Content: We bought two for Christmas for our 12 and 7 year old. They have been able to use the apps they want and and adjust settings very easily. Android system is so easy for them both to understand and show them how to use things.WIFI works great, I don't understand how some of these reviews say that it sucks. Maybe they have a much bigger house than I do and need some more router options throughout their house or just need to spend more than $40 on a wireless modem or router. Downloads have been no problem, we only have 12mps/5mps. Netflix works great as well as surfing, YouTube and more. My oldest even uses it with Skype and no issues.Screen quality, the best... no... but what are you comparing it to? With the screen brightness adjusted, everything is clear and steady.One con, other than the processor should have been updated from the Tab2 to Tab3 is the brightness auto adjust needs to work better, it really works if the room is bright but in medium brightness the brightness is far to low.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: My son LOVESSSSSSSSSSS this tablet!  To play games, watch you tube video and whatever else.  It is fast and very kid friendly.

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: adrianne gillis
Reviews.Content: I got this because I wanted something small to fit in my purse. I have a surface tablet which was a beast to carry around. This is perfect, so compact. This is obviously not the most powerful tablet but it fits my needs just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Tab....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like this product.  It works better than my Kindle, and I really have no problems with it that I can think of.  I would like it better if the charging cord was as strong as the previous version.  It seems like the weakest link because as soon as it is damaged the product won't charge and then will be too expensive to fix. Since I have been through that twice with other tablets, I am more aware of how easily it can be damaged.

Reviews.Title: Great for beginners.
Reviews.Author: fanny
Reviews.Content: My mom loved the tablet.  She is not a technology person and got the hang of it pretty fast. Also its easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet!
Reviews.Author: chadwick
Reviews.Content: This Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is an all-around great tablet for the price. It runs Android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean, has a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, with 8 GB of storage. This tablet is not the top of the line, fastest and best tablet on the market- it was designed to be a basic tablet and be affordable. For the price, you can't beat this tablet.The OS on this tablet is Android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean. The OS runs well on the system, and is able to handle multiple applications at the same time. The OS also includes the ability to force close apps and clear RAM.The Tab 3 is also well designed. It is encased in white plastic, with a metal strip around the outside. The power and volume buttons are on the sides, with touch sensitive "Back" and "Menu" buttons, and one physical "Home" button on the face of the tablet. The charger port and speakers are on the bottom of the tablet, and the headphone jack is on the top. There is also a compartment for a MicroSD card on the side of the tablet.The Tab 3 also includes a cool feature for controlling other devices- there is an IR port built in to the side. Software comes loaded on the tablet to set up with your TV, Blu Ray, cable box, etc. Plus if you subscribe to major cable companies, you can load their channel lineups and guides right on screen.There is one last feature worth noting about this tablet. Since it is a Samsung product, it comes enabled with Samsung All Share Play. This is a great feature that allows you to share Photos, Videos and Music between Samsung devices. It's easy to set up within the device's Settings, there is an option to "search" for other devices. In my case, I have mine paired with my Samsung UN46EH5300 TV (review for that coming soon!). So if I want to watch a video on my tablet right on my TV (currently stored on a 64 GB MicroSD card), I just have to turn my tablet on and it appears in my TV's input selection list! When the video starts playing the tablet becomes the remote, giving you options to play, pause, rewind, etc. This All Share Play also integrates with apps like YouTube. For example, if I am watching a YouTube video, I have the ability to "send" the video feed to the TV (as long as it is turned on).Overall- I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet for everyday use. If you have any questions, feel free to ask!!

Reviews.Title: Loving this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Charlene
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for about 2 weeks now... and its like my sidekick.you know how we didnt have cell phones years ago now you have to turn around and go back home to get it cause you just have to have it.this tablet is with me like the pacifier is with a baby. whenever im ready to go I slip it in my purse grab the power cord and im off.love the wifi. so many businesses have free wifi from the eateries I frequent to my grocery store or the car repair spot. I go to town on this thing.i can read pdf excel powerpoint presentations you have a world of apps.i dont know where this thing can go wrong. Im very careful about what I download if I dont use it its deleted.i havent saved much just still seeing how much it can manage.i did say before I started saving pictures & books I would get a micro sd card. the storage is expandable to I believe 64 gb.i can say so far the camera quality is a little ify.it may be one of those where you need bright light and a close up. Will test that more. Using the internet is just as good as the portability. and just when you think it may stall (not that its slow at all just low expectations) you see the blue processing line going across the top of the screen like lightning. So far im very much enjoying the tablet.along with this purchase I bought the tech armor anti glare & anti fingerprint screen protector (love it). I recall the reviews being ify but it was a snap for me its a 3 pk comes with a smoother & wiping cloth. I also purchased a silicone skin cover to protect from scratches. I think i will get a case. Its another level of protection it was a life saver for my last tablet. I liked to open in close like a book. One thing I wanted to mention if your looking at your screen and it looks too dark dont worry it auto adjust to your lighting. If the room has low lighting the screen will automatically dim. turn the lighting brighter then the screen gets brighter.  Oh another thing that drove me nuts was wanting to organize or remove apps or delete one of the 3 home screens. To move the apps around hold drag and drop. if you want on another screen hold and drag to either side you'll see a blue line as if turning the page. It'll go to the next screen. To delete apps hold drag and drop to the trash bin. To adjust the home screens while viewing the home screen drag your fingers across screen as if pinching the screen. the screens will minimize and you can drag and drop to the trash bin

Reviews.Title: Depends on what you're looking for...
Reviews.Author: M. S. Raven
Reviews.Content: I bought this for one purpose - to use a word processor on it so that I could see the text better than on my cell phone screen. I don't need to watch movies or download a lot of content or anything like that, so for me it works just fine. Also, I already own a Samsung phone and had a Google Play account, so it was nice that when it turned on, all my content downloaded and I have everything that I have on my cell phone on here as well in the same Samsung set up that I'm used to.However, it must be said that this device, while nice and all and the size works for me, is not the zippy, high def tablet that you get for doing multiple tasks and downloading loads of things from the internet. It is quite slow loading internet pages, it often stalls if there is more than one program running, some of the widgets took forever to show up on a screen where I put it because I was downloading other apps at the same time. A few of the games I play from time to time, blink a bit with lag time, but I haven't done any heavy gaming. I assume that would be a horrible experience. It also has a tiny memory, so be ready to buy that SD card (nice feature, but these days who wants to spend extra money on an SD card, or have to have an SD card?).Generally speaking, it works fine, it's just not very robust, the screen isn't amazing, the camera isn't spectacular, and the speed is not impressive. But for what I'm doing with it, I like it. The size is great to carry around in a purse, it fits in one hand, typing on the screen is fine (though I've gotten a bluetooth keyboard). If I wasn't using it for just the general text document processing that I am, I would imagine this would only be good for very light tablet use, maybe for young kids that don't play big, high def games, probably great for taking notes in class. Other than those select areas, I imagine this is not what people would want for all the apps and dazzling stuff you get online these days. It's outdated to say the least, but for the price, for select areas, for certain tasks you might want to accomplish, or for very light tablet use, it might suffice.

Reviews.Title: Too big to be a phone, too small to be TV
Reviews.Author: Peter "Short Bald and Ugly"
Reviews.Content: This unit is Goldilocks sized. Light and bright, feature packed, it is the perfect companion to my Nexus 10, and it travels better

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: kimberly damp
Reviews.Content: Pricing was excellent.  Size is great. I didn't want a full-size tablet and this one is just perfect. Can't wait to figure out all the cool things it can do.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for average users
Reviews.Author: Javier G Ramirez
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for everyday use like watch movies, games, check e-mails, surf the web. I'm very pleased I bought this

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I love the galaxy tab 3 it is just the right size not to big or small a real goldie locks effect to say the least recommended to anyone trying to either do a little web surfing, work or just to play games.

Reviews.Title: MARCYVC
Reviews.Author: Marcela
Reviews.Content: AMAZING  WAS  A GIFT FOR A KIDDOS AND  THEY  DONT STOP  TO PLAY AND SEARCH THINGS IN THE INTERNET  WITH  THE NEW TABLE - ITS FAST

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7 inch

Reviews.Content: I AM SATISFIED WITH MY PURCHASE. i WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE LOOKING FOR A TABLET THAT IS REASONABLY PRICED BUT EFFICIENT. It was purchased for my sister who seems satisfied so far. no complains as yet. I hope there will be none.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with my purchase.  It is better than expected. Service is great and now I want a bigger screen lol.

Reviews.Title: Best for the money.
Reviews.Author: Robert Musselman
Reviews.Content: Small easy to carry on plane.  Great screen. Better reception of Wi Fi than my lap top. Better than my I pad with SD  card and easy connection to my camera.

Reviews.Title: My Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: janine scott
Reviews.Content: i gave it a 5 star rating because I was really impressed. It offers so much more than the Kindle. I like thst its quite user friendly. I was worried about the color, because I really wanted a black and the white one looked like a toy, so I was happy to see that the gold-brown, was dark enough and so kept the sleek, sophisticated image. I would recommend this product to anyone who is interested in having a light mini computer at his or her fingertips.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet!
Reviews.Author: BigOz
Reviews.Content: Setting up this table on WIFI was simple.  The display is crisp and clear.I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great for jus playing on
Reviews.Author: jeff bevers
Reviews.Content: I purchased for just for the sole purpose of playing games for my 5 yr old daughter..and watching movies in the car..it is alittle sluggish at times..not the fastest..but I knew that from watching reviews and the price..but would recommend to others..great for the price and good function..I have used it as a big Navi screen on a small trip..worked great..I jus turn on my Wifi on my phone and good to go..

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: 24/7 Mom "Val"
Reviews.Content: Was a Christmas gift and they are very pleased with it.  Looks nice and was charged when we got it so that was a plus.  No complaints from the person who received it.  Seems that all is well and it was a successful gift. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was not sure I would like the size due to I am use to a 15.6 inch screen on a laptop but I love this thing. The price is great for all the  features it comes with. The remote is so awesome although I did not care for the peel app. I downloaded the smart ir remote and I can contol anything in my house, and I do lol. I also bought a bluetooth obd2 scan tool from amazon and now I have a cheap scan tool to diagnose my vehicles problems. Really worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 thumbs up.
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, Gold-Brown) is WAY better than the Kindle Fire. Way better features and no problems with the plug connectors like the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Craig W Tilton
Reviews.Content: For the cost, this is a fantastic purchase. ~Runs faster than my desktop computer....Best value for your money.

Reviews.Title: SMALL
Reviews.Author: Charles Cooper
Reviews.Content: it was very small but it packs a good punch the same as the 10 inch and just as fast.

Reviews.Title: good.product
Reviews.Author: Rob Rutkofske
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my children and since I have used the tab 2 for work I figured this would be good young teenagers. So far no issues. Samsung makes a good product.

Reviews.Title: Great for first time users.
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: Our laptop is dying, so I bought 2 of these. One for me and one for my husband. This is our first tablet. I am pretty satisfied with mine. I only notice a couple of things like: 1) The keyboard doesnt always pop up right away. There sometimes seems to be a lag. 2) I have issues when I can lose my wifi all day. My husband and I will be in the same room, but my wifi is down where his isn't.  These are my two complaints. Now my husband, he is having a bigger issue. His is slow.... Not sure why. I looked at his memory and shut down all the open apps but is still goes super slow. All in all, I think for the fact that they are our first tablets, I am satisfied with the quality thay we received for the price that we paid.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: magellan
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad 2 with 64 gigs of memory which I love but wanted a cheaper, smaller, lighter, more portable unit that I could lug around and use for email and web browsing and wouldn't care if it broke. The Galaxy Tab 3 offers a lot of value for the price. Great screen, very light and portable, impressive battery life, it's fast, and the micro SD slot is handy for extra storage. It comes preloaded with dozens of apps, most of which I'll probably never use, but they're there if you need them. I'm still learning the Android operating system but it's pretty easy to figure out. The App Store isn't as extensive as the Apple one but it's adequate for my simple needs.A brief update. After playing with it for a while I found I like the file utility which allows you to see and manage files and directories just like in DOS. The 64 gig micro SD card that I bought appears as a separate file folder. I was also able to import my full iPad contacts list by exporting them using the app, MCBackup Pro, which uses vCard format and emailing them to myself, then importing them from there. Very cool. So far the only downside is that it won't charge from one of my Mophie portable battery packs which i use all the time with my iPhone and iPad Touch. Apparently you must use the included wall adapter. Other than that, a great little mini tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Melvin Earl Tavis III "Mel"
Reviews.Content: This tab is awsome. Its slim and beautiful and for its price its a must have.The only downside is that it lags to much.. but thats just samsung for you.Shipment took about 7 days to get to my house but it was order on christmas day.

Reviews.Title: I liked it at first
Reviews.Author: Brian S.
Reviews.Content: I liked it at first....then it stopped working. the ir blaster wouldnt work. the screen jittered and the game play and wifi was supper slow. I so wanted it to be better. im returning it to get a kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and everything on time.
Reviews.Author: Santiago Londono Kuratomi
Reviews.Content: I like it. it was what I expected, I recommend it a 100%. this staff is great and the size is perfect.

Reviews.Title: good not great
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Juarez
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet for fair price. I use it mostly to watch tv and stream my music while on car rides. Havent really testes out its features on games but is for good use of social networks. Camera usage is not its best if desired to use daily.

Reviews.Title: Slippery Always, but awesome technology & features!!
Reviews.Author: J. Johansen
Reviews.Content: Great 7" tablet running Android at a great price.. Has everything equivalent to my iPad, but more control over your device.. Only reason that I didn't rate it five stars is due to Samsung's design... The tablet is very slippery & slides out of your hands easily.. Definitely buy a tablet case/cover if you purchase this item!!

Reviews.Title: Love the size, like the price
Reviews.Author: Aaron Campbell
Reviews.Content: We've always been Apple people but decided to try this tablet.  The price and size were what we were looking for.In my experience, iPads are more intuitive and easy to set up---by a long shot.  But like I said, the price and size trumped this time.  With that said, the Galaxy did a great job of compiling different emails, integrating different accounts and apps, etc.  I found the easiest way for me to learn was to follow a tutorial on YouTube.  Once it is set up, it is fun to customize.I'm hoping to update in a couple of months after we have some experience.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Jeremy D. Emily
Reviews.Content: I have both the tab 2 and tab 3 now.  Both are great products.  I'm not sure why but the addition of an actual home button on this one seems like a great idea.  Got this for 149.99 on black friday.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Adalberto
Reviews.Content: These tablets do not come with Flash. Why???Be very careful when taking the pictures because they are easily moved.

Reviews.Title: no flash on camera
Reviews.Author: shanella Brooks
Reviews.Content: No flash on the camera do picture quality is very limited. Other than that seems great. Amaxon needs to cut out this "amount of words required" crap

Reviews.Title: not the Best
Reviews.Author: blev
Reviews.Content: Has a grainier screen image than I thought it would! The camera is not good at all either! Would spend a little more on a better one!

Reviews.Title: nice tablet but I hate the picture quality
Reviews.Author: LA DESHA FRASER
Reviews.Content: This tab has very cool features. I do not have to type, I can speak, say what I want and it is Written by the tablet for me. on the other hand the quality of the pictureS are poor. If you are going to take pics at night do not even bother. The pictures will not have  a good quality, unless you are taking out the pics in the daytime in the daylight

Reviews.Title: keeps your other half entertained
Reviews.Author: diana espinosa
Reviews.Content: My husband won't put it down! By far best gift yet.  Great husband sitter.The speed is up to par. You can log into your Google account and get all your apps and settings to reflect what's on your Android phone.

Reviews.Title: 1 of 3 Tabs had a flicker...
Reviews.Author: Peggy Carr
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 Tabs for presents. 2 work fine, but 1 Tab flickers when the back light setting is turned down to its lowest setting. It was sent back to Samsung. If 1 out of 3 Tabs had this problem, I feel there is a pretty good chance of getting one that doesn't preform properly. The other 2 are nice.

Reviews.Title: Works.
Reviews.Author: A. Sulaiman "ghostman126"
Reviews.Content: Works like it's supposed to. However, an OTG cable for does not work with the 7 inch version. Everything else seems ok.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Handheld Tablet
Reviews.Author: PC in DFWTX
Reviews.Content: Perfect size. Fast. Works Great!As long as you're not expecting it do the work of an i7 core processor laptop, you won't be dissappointed.Bought this for the wife and it does everything she needs it to do including reading books, listening to music, Facebook and video time with the grand kids!Fits in her purse with the case on and isn't too heavy.I could go on and on, but I'll let the 5 stars do the talking.

Reviews.Title: Love the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7 inch).  I truly can say it is AMAZING.  So quick and easy to use.  I can'timaging owning any other brand of tablet.  The apps are all fully functional.  The screen size is great.  Picks up myWi-Fi connections much better than the Tab 2.  My only problem is the back button.  I can't seem to keep from hitting this over and over by mistake.  Will try out a new case to see if this helps any.  Overall...this is one great little tablet.

Reviews.Title: No problem
Reviews.Author: Rudolph Mullings
Reviews.Content: Delivery was in the estimated time given, product was in good condition. There was 1 concern I had that the device was not starting after a few days of use. However after an internet search I found this was more a manufacturer issue in that I had 2 hold the power button and the volume down button for 10sec to get it to turn on.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift for the kids
Reviews.Author: Agustin david III
Reviews.Content: Kids Love it... but my Galaxy S4 runs faster than the Tablet, I would think the tablet should be faster

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: sandra l battle
Reviews.Content: My daughter love this product. I gave it to her for Christmas and she really enjoy it. Great gift for her.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J Ihrke
Reviews.Content: It's good for any new tablet user. Fast, compact, useful and sturdy. I recommend getting a case for it, though. You might need it.

Reviews.Title: My samsung tablet
Reviews.Author: coralie maynard
Reviews.Content: love the speed and the neat size of this tablet and it came in my favorite colour for devices, well done

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: krishal
Reviews.Content: It does everything I was hoping it would! It is Prefect! Works like a dream. I would buy from here again. The process was so easy and it arived very quickly. I am so happy!

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Rafael J. Luces "RJLL"
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with my tablet. Great Screen, good battery life, you can use an micro sd card, which is really nice because you can watch movies, see your pictures and Listening to your music. The camera is not the best, but it is a good product for the money

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: Love love love this tablet. My kids and I both use it daily. I am a tutor and I take it with me on the job and it helps in so many ways.

Reviews.Title: A great little tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Leehu Zysberg
Reviews.Content: Got this one for my son to play games and use it for email and facebook stuff. It works great, NEVER crashes down, my son dropped it twice to the ground - with no damage whatsoever. Display is vivid and razor-sharp. Sound quality is fair but nothing stunning. Overall a great value and a decent performer if you don't need a big screen.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy at Sprint data in Phoenix not worth the service fees
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Patterson
Reviews.Content: Okay tablet, should have gotten the kindle fire is much better and bigger.  There is no flash on the camera, resolution average, very grainy video, was sold this by Sprint store in Phoenix, AZ, there is no 4G in AZ so, using data only on it was pretty much worthless and when I tried to return it, there was a $75 restocking fee.  Buy from Amazon and go wifi route unless you have 4G, don't waste your money on data service and the $50 offer unless you want to end up paying $400 after 2 years with poor data coverage.

Reviews.Title: AS expected from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Alan M.
Reviews.Content: Good : Works fine , nice lookBad :  i bought it at 179, the day after was at 149Nice purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Henry Miller "Tha Hotboy"
Reviews.Content: At first I wasn't really sure weather to order this tablet. But after reading many of the reviews I decided to give it a shot. I ordered this as like and early Christmas present for my girlfriend and boy does she love it. It has a easy to learn setup and android is a breeze. We spend many nights playing "Candy Crush" and other apps. It makes me want to now invest in a tablet of my own �...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Tablet with lots of extras without the marked up price or monthly bill
Reviews.Author: Vincent Rosenberger
Reviews.Content: Great product for a great price!  The 8GB hard drive can be expanded using the MicroSD card slot on the side of the unit.  I liked the fact that this unit was wi-fi only and did not need a contract or monthly bill.  And the AMOLED screen, fast processor, and convenient size all made this tablet an excellent choice for me without breaking the bank.

Reviews.Title: Wish I got this earlier!
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: Works great after I got it to work correctly, with the help of a guy from Samsung's support site.  Note:  If you have problems, don't call late at night or on weekends - you might get someone from the Philippines.  The guy from the Philippines couldn't help me at all, made me feel like a complete idiot and gave me a pick up number to return my tablet!  Samsung's USA support is great - their rep walked me through everything, realized what the problem was and solved it!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS THING!!!  GREAT VALUE FOR THE PRICE!
Reviews.Author: David Lambert
Reviews.Content: I've had it for almost a week and have found the user experience to be exceptional for a little notepad of this price.  Don't buy the cheap Insignia notepad from Best Buy.  The graphics freeze up all the time.  I returned that and bought the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7.0.  Night and day experience.  Very responsive all the time.  The only problem that I've seen occasionally has been YouTube video locking up the device.  That requires a reboot.  (Hold the screen button down for 15 seconds.)  But that only happened twice to me so far.If you have a Samsung Galaxy phone and you like it, you'll love this because it functions pretty much the same, except without the cellular phone or data.

Reviews.Title: I recommend it!
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Donald
Reviews.Content: No question about it - I love this and all that I use it for. Complaints about the low resolution are so nit picky - this little Galaxy is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great compact tab
Reviews.Author: Kathy-ann  Mendoza
Reviews.Content: It is light and surprisingly durable.  I am not a big tec person but I think it is great.  It fits well in my hand bag when I travel.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Stephani
Reviews.Content: Bought this item it is perfect since I got it I haven't put it down I highly recommend it.  10 stars

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: Sireeka J.
Reviews.Content: bought it for my son really cool,he loves it  and i love how simple and easy the apps are to download

Reviews.Title: Great for children that are learning!
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. It has everything need it for those that are learning to use tablet for the first time. Very simple to use and easy to handle and take around. It connect really easy if wi-fi is available. It is like having a small laptop. You may add extra memory too.  I like it more than the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: The Tablets are light, with a high speed, good resolution, great brightness of the screen, good and resaltantes colors.
Reviews.Author: Antulio Salazar
Reviews.Content: Excellent! The Tablets fill the expectations. They will be a good gift of navidad for my daughters. The Tablets are light, with a high speed, good resolution, great brightness of the screen, good and resaltantes colors.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy another one
Reviews.Author: Mr.LindenWillow "Mr.LindenWillow"
Reviews.Content: I got a refurbished one, and am not ashamed the beast runs great, light responsive comes with all the necessary apps.  All for a great price!  Not going to ever be angry about that! My iPhone can charge at night while I read my news headlines on this well sized screen! Super!

Reviews.Title: BITHDAY GIFT
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I got this for a birthday present. The recipient likes all of the features and the compactness of the device. However he does not like the fact that is does not have a flash for the camera. For the price, the Samsung Galaxy Tab3 works great as an inexpensive gift.

Reviews.Title: Good tab!
Reviews.Author: Adenaikke
Reviews.Content: The galaxy tab 3 7" is quite a good gadget. It meets most of my expectations though I'm still acquainting myself with it. I give it a 4-star rating because I am yet to fully explore all its features and do not know what I will find and because the battery life though ok, is not quite as good as I expect it to be.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet for the Money
Reviews.Author: Melissa B.
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a very good price plus the galaxy s name is hard to pass up. I have tons of apps installed and it runs well. It has some really nice features such as s voice which is like the I phones Siri and the s planner which is very functional. It's speed is not exceptionally fast but it's good enough for what I need. The 7 inch screen size is perfect; I can watch Netflix movies and it is very portable and easy to hold with one hand. I would recommend this device to anyone who wants a good tablet and doesn't want to pay an arm and a leg.

Reviews.Title: Not super but ok
Reviews.Author: jin jin
Reviews.Content: The touch response is slow but not unbearable. If you want to save movies and books it is advisible the buy the additional memory. Shipping was fast. And it works well (dropped 2x).

Reviews.Title: great starter tablet for kids
Reviews.Author: nclark513
Reviews.Content: great tablet for my 9 year old. Sleek well built design and is plenty fast for what he wants to do. My son hasn't put it down since he got it

Reviews.Title: I'm Spoiled
Reviews.Author: Kateva Reed
Reviews.Content: Great! Just have a problem keeping my husbands hands off of it. Candy Crush has a whole new look!! ; )

Reviews.Title: It does what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Cafiend
Reviews.Content: I'm not one to go to the top when rating anything, especially when I haven't had it long. But I like it better than a mere 4 stars. I'm still figuring out all the quirks. I wanted a tablet that I could carry when commuting by bike. WiFi only is fine; I have access to networks in most of the places I would want to use it. It saves paying for a data plan.This little gadget is fast. The 7-inch screen seems quite generous, considering I would have settled for something even smaller. Now that I have it I'm glad I didn't. This one is the ideal size to fit the rack bags on either of the bikes I regularly use to commute. No complaints so far. I'll probably get a Bluetooth keyboard because it it hard to type on the virtual keyboard that comes up on screen. It's still surprisingly effective even with my fat fingers. I wouldn't want to blog a novel on it, but it will do for quick posts, email check-ins and spur of the moment searches.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool
Reviews.Author: Tee
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this tablet. Really likes the color. He likes it  better than blackberry playbook and he likes it better than galaxy nexus.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this tablet.  I use it for reading e-books, being online, playing games.  A lot of fun. All purpose.  Enjoyable.  Lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Emileysha Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Love the tablet.... Easy to use....Not to big not to small Good Size....It's just like a galaxy phone but bigger :) ......can hold an sd card.......

Reviews.Title: Good Device
Reviews.Author: Karen Aguilar
Reviews.Content: The device size is perfect, it is comfortable to carry and comfortable to read or use the different applications that are installed.Allows use applications like viber so phone conversations can be kept free.It behaves like any Android device but for someone who is looking for a medium is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Francisco De Jesus
Reviews.Content: Handy,Beautiful display definition, Plays Music and videos very good, I recommend to play HD Videos to get advantange of the display, Connected to my PC works great with full and lite Kies,firmware already updated.The only thing I cannot get until now, just tried by the way once, is to recieve the music via bluetooh in my Jabra BT8010, even when it is paired to each other. maybe something  I am missing. If I get that I will return to edit this information. Well, I don`t know if the tablet has ADRP??? YET.The tablet takes standard pictures and videos good, not so magnificent  resolution like a real camera DSRL or like one with 10 or 12 megapixels because the tablet has 3 mpxls only, but at least you don`t miss the opportunity to take a shot.Applications preloaded worked fine, also if you download a free game or app it does an excellent job via wifi.All the features, buttons, notifications window screen, wallpapers worked.I paired with a BT keyboard& case for iPad Mini and it worked excellent, typing on Office Word.I heard music  using a generic universal 3.5m.m earphones and worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: mattstats09
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, if you let a kid play ith it BE SURE to run advanced task killer or it is slow. Other than that we LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Alejandro M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom as a gift who is 72 years old with no experience at all in the world of tech and she was able to fool around with this toy perfectly enough to talk in skype, navigate thru maps, take quick pictures and send them by email. Looks like Samsung and Android are doing a really good job by making things more intuitive. The tablet looks nice. I'm a big fan of samsung devices and I own a couple of different tablets from this brand, this one looks good and my mom is happy with it so I'm giving 5 starts to this product.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Cindy Nielsen
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an option to play games, access the internet, etc. without having to carry my laptop around, The size and functions of this tablet were exactly what I was looking for. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: thought it'd be worse. impressive
Reviews.Author: alicia
Reviews.Content: Not bad to be honest. I thought because of the chipaet it'd be slow and even worse compared to the Nexus but it's actually pretty great. I'm a college student and I use it as one of my learning elements. Not bad.

Reviews.Title: she loves it
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the lady as a birthday gift and it wasn't what I was looking for. I originally got on Amazon to purchase a Kindle for her because she is a reader. But, after many hours of researching pros, cons, reviews, cost vs capability / versatility the galaxy was a sure winner. She can still read and do everything our larger tablets can do and have them all networked together. Amazon Prime is great to have as well. She can choose from thousands of books and movies instantly at no extra charge. Free 2-day shipping. Well worth the annual fee.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Yl
Reviews.Content: Works great, very convenient for school. It's essentially an iPad for much cheaper. I definitely recommend it, plus it looks nice!

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: Ke'Brina Townsend
Reviews.Content: A few minor glitches, but mostly a helpful product with school. You will have to buy a memory card because it only comes with 8 gb.

Reviews.Title: looking for quality and price then the samsung galaxy tab 3 is the one to buy. i love it works well. the camera is great the pho
Reviews.Author: Trissy
Reviews.Content: looking for quality and price then the samsung galaxy tab 3 is the one to buy. i love it . it works well , the camera is great. it gives great photos. it cannot be compared to any other tablet

Reviews.Title: goodbye ipad, hello Samsung Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ya-ya"
Reviews.Content: I rrecentlypurchased the Samsung Note from Sprint.  They were offering the Galaxy Tab 3 for $50 if you signed for a wireless plan for the Galaxy of minimim $5 a month.  I had just broke my ipad screen and was getting a little tired of the clised system so decided to buy.  I am delighted at how intuitive both Samsung products are in overall performance.  I have a Nexsus 7 and the Galaxy Tab seems faster, and though both are 7 inches, I like the Tab screen resolution a little more.  Best of all, the apps I purchase from the Google store are easily available on all three android products.  I am NOT having any withdrawal symptoms from changing from iphone and ipad to android products.

Reviews.Title: We Love IT.
Reviews.Author: cooksister
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Kindle Fire, but I chose the  Galaxy because I have a Galaxy phone and I am very happy with it.  I have owned it for just over two months now and I am very happy with it. It is just the right size to keep my great nephew happy.  I love the availability of free games that we both love.  It is just right not too big not too small.  So far I have not any technical problems.  However that said, mostly the boy uses it for now.  I find it easy to read and it fits in my hand.  The price was right considering I mostly use for small child entertainment.  The only thing that would keep me from buying him his own, is that like most technology, I am afraid of it becoming obsolete before he grows up.  (He is five now).  That said, this is what makes this so great.  I would rather spend less on this rather that spending a whole lot more for someething that will be obsolet in two or three years

Reviews.Title: Owned for less than 24 hours.
Reviews.Author: Seth C. Redd
Reviews.Content: it did not take long for me to return the item, here is my review.Pros: The picture Quality is fantastic, it's bright, it's crisp.  The Touch pad and side Scrolling work perfectly, it's quick and it's smooth.  The Size and shape is comfortable and the Tablet feels solid.  The Tablet looks good.  The Tablet has a USB port for connecting to your computer.  The Expandable SD Card Memory is a huge plus.Cons: The WI-FI connectivity is far below par. I've taken it to multiple places to ensure it wasn't just my modem/internet.  I even tried a new tablet after that only to experience the same issue.  The Tablet has tendencies to crash when Running apps that require WI-FI after a connection is finally made.  Unfortunately The tablets Browser's (chrome) and (internet) are fairly slow when actually connected.Overall: The Tablet is great for non internet use, But anything requiring internet whether its a download or youtube will often crash the tablet meaning you have to restart it and hope for the best.  The Browsing is slow, as a comparison my Ipod touch which is a (4th Gen) will load web pages and videos more than 2X as fast as this tablet.  I was looking forward to owning one but because of the issues I encountered, I returned it back to the store in less than 24 hours of owning it to get a Refund. It's a shame given how beautiful the tablet and display is.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: allen
Reviews.Content: Love it. Best tablet on the market in a smaller more portable version. Nothing more that I can say much other than samsung outdid themselves on this one

Reviews.Title: OK but I prefer the 8 inch version
Reviews.Author: Larissa
Reviews.Content: The specs between the tab 2 7 inch and tab 3 is noticeable. For some reason Samsung made the tab 3 thicker than the tab2. But the screen resolution is a bit better and Samsung got rid of the proprietary cable for the tab 3 line.  The tab 3 7 inch was OK. It I like 8 inch version.  Screen resolution is better and the 8 inch version supports OTG for full size USB access. The 8 inch also supports HDMI output with the appropriate adapter.

Reviews.Title: Returned after 5 days.
Reviews.Author: Mr.Roupe
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this tablet. I plugged it in to charge when I got it and didn't get to use it much the first day, only a couple hours of straight use and everything seemed fine. The next day I noticed the WiFi problem some other reviewers mention which weren't on here until after mine was shipped. Almost every time I turned it on or woke it up I had to go in and manually turn the WiFi off then turn it back on for it to connect if I wanted to get online right away. The other times I let it go (if I wasn't getting online right away) it took at least a minute or longer for it to connect, this is with a signal it was saying was very strong. It seems to constantly "scan" for WiFi signals, even when it's already connected to one. Even though this was annoying, I was willing to put up with it and hope they could fix it with an update.I downloaded a couple apps and they all seemed to work fine (Netflix and Viggle). Although a couple games I tried (Robot Unicorn Attack 2) ran slow at times and (Major Mayhem) paused once and told me the frame rate was too slow and wanted me to turn down it's graphic settings. Although if you turned off the power saver setting, both of them ran a lot better. A few other games I tried (Candy Crush Saga, Tetris Blitz, Jetpack Joyride) played fine.Google Chrome ran at probably half the speed as the built-in browser. On Chrome a site would take 20-30 seconds to load, the same site loaded in less then 10 seconds on the built-in browser. Though the built-in browser isn't without it's annoyances. One I hated the most, there seemed to not be a password manager in it. If you told it to remember your passwords and you wanted to remove one later, I only saw an option to clear all passwords.Some people may not like it, but I liked the sound every time you "clicked" something with the built-in browser, it let me know I actually hit the link. Chrome on the other hand did not have the sounds leaving me wondering if I missed the link or if it was just loading slow like usual. Also, multiple times while online, I would click a link on a site, the site would be loading the next page (on the same site) and give me an error saying something like, that action can not be preformed and finish loading the page... what action it was? I have no idea. It does not support flash and It also froze up once loading a site and I had to hold the power button to get out of it.A couple other annoyances, the setting to automatically control screen brightness constantly made it entirely too dark, I eventually turned it off since it's on by default. Also, In my experience, the camera was too dark. I had to turn the brightness clear up when I tried it. Unless the object had direct light on it, I could not see it.On the 3rd day I started getting the error "the process com.google.process.gapps has stopped." It only seemed to pop up when I opened a browser. There seems to be fixes for this although I didn't look for one at the time because I started getting another error.That other error "Package File Invalid" started, which it seems that now Google is looking for a fix for it. The game Jetpack Joyride had an update and I got this error. I thought maybe something was wrong and tried updating it later just to get the error again. I uninstalled the game and tried to install it again, couldn't do it at all. Not knowing if it was just the game or not, I tried downloading another app to see, still get "Package File Invalid." I looked around online for help, found nothing at all on Google Support nor Samsung, although Google may have something now since they are looking for a fix. I found a few Android forums/sites with "fixes" none of which worked for me. Cleared cache and data, uninstalled Google Play updates etc. nothing worked.Thinking I maybe did something or an app I downloaded screwed something up, I decided to completely factory reset the thing. I start setting everything up, enter my WiFi, enter my Samsung account, start entering my Google account when I click next it sends me back to the start... OK I set everything back up (WiFi, Google account etc.) when I finish and it loads the OS, I had 14 update errors where it tried updating all the pre-installed apps and couldn't because "Package File Invalid." OK so maybe I did something wrong or when it sent me back to the start something messed it up, factory reset again, this time everything works fine, the OS loads and starts updating.
