A couple updates go fine, then once again "Package File Invalid." I entered the Play store tried downloading an app "Package File Invalid" tried another app "Package File Invalid." Factory reset again to remove all of my information and contact Amazon to return it, thankfully they let me.This being my first Android device, it didn't make a good first impression.

Reviews.Title: Milo
Reviews.Author: Milo
Reviews.Content: Planning to return it.The two main disadvantage so far are:1. Capacitive buttons don't light up as someone mentioned already which is very annoying at night. I have the Vibrant  galaxy s phone which is 3 years old and the capacitive buttons light. It's beyond me why they removed that option 3 years later for their devices....2. Which is even more annoying is that the speakers are at the bottom and when you turn the device horizontally to watch with bigger picture you inevitably blocked them with your finger. I don't know how else you are suppose to hold the pad in that position to prevent that to happen. That to me is so stupid and so simple mistake that I don't know how Samsung let that happen. And in the end this model just feels already morally old even though it just came out. In 2-3 weeks are coming models that would be the same price range like nexus 7 2 and Asus hd7 that would surpass the tab 3 in every single  dimension, so if you don't rush I would recommend you to wait little more and get different device because I don't think this one is worth it the 200$. The biggest change compared to tab 2 is the design which looks much better for sure but who cares when the functionality is not good.

Reviews.Title: Just as Amazon return time limit expires, my Tab 3 becomes a $200 brick
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Cyclelicious"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely unbelievable. Tab 3 is completely unusuable. I try all of the reset tricks and tips available online to no avail. I wait over the weekend to process the return and find I can't because Amazon has a 30 day return limit! Samsung support completely unresponsive. Grrrrr!

Reviews.Title: recieved a tablet that does not power on
Reviews.Author: Greg lopez
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed to have received a tablet that does not work out of the box the tablet does not work now I spent a great deal of money on this device and I hope that the seller will make it right by sending me a working unit I have no more money to purchase another tablet I wish I did but I just don't I have no problem returning the device just need replacement unit and return box to send this one back.. Let's hope this seller reads this and does me right

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: Arquimedes Rivas
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife, and she love this tablet.Easy to use, works perfect, has a great connectivity, the resolution is so great and video play is awesome.Is the perfect gift.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, Gold-Brown)
Reviews.Author: Edward Kuligowski
Reviews.Content: I've had the Kindle and currently have the Asus T300. The Asus is great, but while reading in bed it becomes very heavy. I bought the Galaxy on a whim and couldn't be more surprised or happier. Light, quick, great apps, easy to use and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Good win!
Reviews.Author: SUDS "SS"
Reviews.Content: I recently won this and gave it to my husband. I don't think it is a product that I would have thought to purchase because when we previously looked at it the reviews were not all that great. In fact, my husband purchased the Tab 2 for me instead of this one because the Tab 2 had better reviews (I returned the Tab 2 after less than 15 days for a Note 8, but that is not the point of this review so I will not go into it further for this review). This tablet has been a very pleasant surprise!My husband has not had any problems with this tablet, it is peppy/fast and seems to offer everything that he needs. We added a 32gb card to it so it now has 40gb of memory ($17 investment). He had been using our old iPad (2nd gen) and he is not a tech geek like me, but he seems to really like this device and the size of this device (he has not picked up the iPad since he got this). I tried to set it all up for him before giving it to him and found later that he was enjoying customizing the device himself, which made me happy!We own a lot of tablets and this one fits in with the others quite well. In my opinion it is a much better value than the iPad or iPad mini largely because the operating systems are so similar at this point, the apps are similar and you can add memory to this device, which is something you cannot do on any iPad. Oh and I have found a number of android apps that allow you to sync to itunes for your music and movies and then other apps that allow you to sync to your icloud calendar, contact and to do list.In terms of this versus the other less expensive android tablets that we own the main differences would be how the company (Samsung in this case) sets up the android environment and the fact that this device has a button instead of all touch screen buttons. Overall this is a nice tablet for the price point. If I could change one thing I would have it be 16 gb instead of 8. The 8gb is fine for my husband who does not have a ton of large apps that run better on the device vs the card, but my kids have a lot of kid friendly, high graphic, large memory apps that run better on the device vs the memory card. I think this device would not have been a great choice for my kids.Please note - Android devices generally, with the exception of the Kindle (which does not have a memory slot), cannot play Amazon video. I believe this is Amazon's choice and not the choice of the manufacturers.Here are the similar devices that we own:1. Samsung Galaxy Note 82. Lenovo A30003. Dell Venue 7 16gb4. iPad 2If you have any questions about the different devices I am happy to answer any questions you might have.

Reviews.Title: Excellent screen, the wifi is not production ready and update Its a BRICK
Reviews.Author: S. Kolinjavadi "skolin"
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet, layout and very good price, but how come Samsung have gotten away with a tablet whose wifi connection becomes sub-par when you let it rest or go into power saving mode for a while, when it comes back, your home wifi is toothless, though the other devices are doing just fine. This is a major problem with this device and the cause of the two stars missing. Im surprised there has been no fix for this yet.---UPDATE-----This is the most disappointing thing of all, its now a BRICK that may require surgery before it can walk again. Evidently I'm not the only victim of what sums upto to very poor engineering and worse still evidence of continued indifference, many Samsung products including this one get into a vegetative state if you happen to let the battery completely run down before you put it back on charge. I had this misfortune last week when I did not have quick access to the charger and now the damn thing won't wake back up no matter how much I charge, its playing dead as a DODO and it happened one day after my return window ended. And the reports on this problem are legion. How can you sell a product, a decent one in other terms in the market with such a huge problem that practically makes it a brick!3 starts to 1.

Reviews.Title: Faulty Product :(
Reviews.Author: Kayla Keifer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother for Christmas.It was perfect--everything worked just fine...for a while.She started telling me about weird things happening to it. The device will randomly restart itself, and upon booting up, resets the date and time to 12/31/2011 5:00pmLater on she told me that the power button sticks and the screen will turn off on her.Does anybody know of any manufacturers warranty, or is she stuck with this forever?

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: German Aguilar
Reviews.Content: I can't say anything new that other reviews have said (plus i am lazy)I will limit to say that the package arrived in time, and that my mother loved the gift.

Reviews.Title: Exelent
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Exelent product it is just what I expected and more. I like everything about it, it works perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Cannot transfer apps to the SD card
Reviews.Author: SuperVestor
Reviews.Content: You can add up to a 32 GB SD card. However, you can't move apps to it, just media files. My cheapo Android phone can move apps to the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Not better thanthe tab 2
Reviews.Author: Luis S.
Reviews.Content: I thought that the tab 3 will be an upgraded better version than the tab 2, but it is not so. OS is not even Jelly Bean and the tablet works much more slower than the tab 2

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Joannie
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet. I shopped and researched forever before purchasing this one. I read hundreds of reviews and compared many different stores and prices. Finally decided on a Samsung from Amazon. So glad I did. This tablet is really fast and has performed better than expected for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Not Quite The Nexus 7 2nd Gen, But An AWESOME Tab Nonetheless
Reviews.Author: M. Anaximenes
Reviews.Content: As a huge fan of the Android ecosystem and ever evolving OS itself, I want the latest versions as soon as they're released, and only a Nexus device offers that certainty. For that reason, after using both the Galaxy Tab 3 and the Nexus 7 2nd gen, I chose to keep the Asus Nexus as my personal tab. That decision was rewarded just a week later when the Nexus received Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) which I must say, is an absolute masterpiece, but one that has yet to find its way to the Galaxy. Knowing Samsung I am confident they'll make an update available at some point, but I take comfort in knowing that in addition to top of the line hardware and specs, my Nexus will always have the most up to date OS and will receive all fixes, upgrades and updates almost immediately.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: We got children Galaxy Tablets for Christmas. so we got all of the equipment for them here on amazon. Everything was good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect value, perfect use
Reviews.Author: Isaac Ache
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet, with the brand we trust.  Samsung does it again, great value and awesome functions.  Works great as a gift. Arrived in time and nothing negative about it.  Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: C. Bakhos
Reviews.Content: Is a very good tablet sometimes freeze and need to restart when I use Google Maps and try to use Street View. This 7 inch model does not allow to use multi-user I don't know why this feature is very important nowadays, because I bought this tablet for all my family and each one has their own account. But is OK for this moment.

Reviews.Title: Husbands Gift
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: This was bought for my husband. It's really nice. He really likes it and the price was  nice. Husbands Gift.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the tablet
Reviews.Author: bret frohner
Reviews.Content: I was please with the purchase, it very convenient, it light but can do as much as a laptop. good product.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Susan E. Kaylor
Reviews.Content: I watched the price fluctuate and managed to grab it while at its lowest.  It's easy to set up and use, and I love what it offers, esp. for the novice user.  This is one of the best-priced tabs on the market and it won't disappoint you!

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift and the recipient loved it
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone and we're both very happy with it.I was happy to get it at a fair price and it works great.

Reviews.Title: is it a phone and a tablet
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Colebrook
Reviews.Content: i live outside the us. will it be able to work with the phone company (btc) the bahamas mobile phone network . can i download snapchat,viber whatsapp, vine etc. can i take and make calls. can i text

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Mega Tab 3
Reviews.Author: marjoriehope
Reviews.Content: I gave this tab as a gift, being that I thought it was an unlocked cell, at least they are enjoying it, thank you amazon!

Reviews.Title: a good buy
Reviews.Author: Chelsy Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet a few days ago and I love it my money was not wasted I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: What a great tablet!
Reviews.Author: marie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and I use it as much as he does! Super fast and the picture is perfect!! Very vivid colors and clarity.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Had the Tablet for 3 days when it suddenly deleted all my apps then reverted back to a different time and date. Called Samsung and they were very nice and offered to fix it free of charge. Sent it back with their return label and waited a week and-a-half for it to return. Got it back, turned it on and it worked, but only for a few hours when it started doing the same thing as before. Called Samsung again and told them I wanted it replaced. The nice gal I spoke to said it is Samsung's policy to attempt to fix items two times before replacement. So, I sent it back a second time and waited another week and-a-half. Just got it back yesterday and loaded all my apps, etc. and it worked again, until today when it reverted back again to a different date and time... So frustrating!!!! Now, I've been on hold 37 minutes and still have not gotten anywhere. Hopefully when someone answers they will take care of me. I like Samsung products, but I won't buy another Tab 3, maybe they will let me upgrade to a Tab 4.

Reviews.Title: slow and under powered
Reviews.Author: jogi pattisapu
Reviews.Content: wifi only tabletcant run more than 2 or 3 apps or it will bog downpower button is easy to push in backpack - found my tab fully drained many times

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: Samsung chose this because I like the brand, has front and rear camera and multiple applications can be downloaded, i love it

Reviews.Title: Bad quality.
Reviews.Author: Katiuska M. Barreto "Katiuska"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for a gift. The day I received I turned on and it was okay. Today that I gave it as a gift, after half hour working the screen is not working anymore. I paid for a new device and with this I supposed it is refurbished. No matter I chose a seller Fulfilled by Amazon. Terrible experience. Can you imagine receive a gift and after half hour it doesnt work anymore.

Reviews.Title: Really like new
Reviews.Author: Carlos R.
Reviews.Content: I bought this item used and really comes great sitiation, almost new... This tables its strong, fast, and works for me.... :)

Reviews.Title: I love
Reviews.Author: David G Thelen
Reviews.Content: I really LOVE Samsung GalaxyTab3! I had a crApple iPad... forabout 4 months, then out ofno where it just too a fatal dumpon me, and hasn't worked since.

Reviews.Title: Works great!  Battery life could be better but then again, could be worse
Reviews.Author: TheLabrat
Reviews.Content: My son loves this.  He is 13 and uses it primarily for games.  It's not the best for games because of the fact that they tend to suck the battery dry faster.  The battery will last him at least a couple hours, which is fine for a short 100 mile highway trip.  However none of the car usb chargers I have is adequate for charging this thing.  The screen flickers and does weird stuff.  Probably because it charges with 2 amps and I don't think my adapter is pushing that.  I am happy that the battery doesn't seem to drain too much when idle, I had a previous tablet that had issues with that.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Gloria Arteaga D "Comprador"
Reviews.Content: Excelent table, This one in very good conditions the product is protected well and is the original samsung. 100% recomend

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy review
Reviews.Author: J. M. Diaz
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my dad for Father's Day / birthday gift. Works great, I'd recommend the tablet for anyone wanting an android mini tablet.It's small, light and hopefully big enough for him to use & be connected without feeling encumbered

Reviews.Title: Great Tab
Reviews.Author: Jenelle Soso
Reviews.Content: This tab works very well. Unfortunately my fell out my hands now its not taking any charge. I used this tablet for a very short time and it was not to bad.

Reviews.Title: worked for about 32 days............
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: worked for about 25 days well.  it got slow, then by about day 32 it shut off and has not worked since.

Reviews.Title: Great Tab
Reviews.Author: James White
Reviews.Content: Works great for the price and does what i need it to do. I would reccommend this product but shop around for the best price since they change from time to time.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it - uses it only at home with no data plan
Reviews.Author: David R. Collins "scanevalexec"
Reviews.Content: This was a simple and elegant solution for my wife.  She wanted a pad, but did not want to have a data plan.  She uses it on our WiFi at home and at her office.  She uses it mainly for Google searches, e-mail (Yahoo), and Facebook.  It does all of that well.  For most other computer work she uses the home computer, which is in heavy competition with my daughter using it very often.  Anyway, I've been using a Galaxy 3s phone for some time, and It appears to be the same high quality item, essentially working like a great big smart phone.

Reviews.Title: High Speed!
Reviews.Author: M Perlstein "M Perlstein"
Reviews.Content: We had a iPad before and now we got this I would never go back to iPad. its very easy to use and the size is also perfect.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: just as described, i bought this product for my friend that breaks everything, but this is still going , so its been way good, thanks

Reviews.Title: Subpar for expectations
Reviews.Author: Christopher C. Schutte
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7.0 right after Christmas 2013 for a decent sale price; although, more specifically for an app I needed for work. I was hoping the added benefit of having a multimedia tablet for many other would offer a less expensive alternative to an iPad or constantly using my iPhone 4S. I have to say that the only good thing I can speak highly of is that you can load external files on it with a USB cable and/or micro flash card. Other than that, the Tab is slow, unresponsive, crashes apps, does not have a very reactive touch screen, and somewhat nonuser friendly with setup and operation. My daughter has an Apple iPad 1 and that is more responsive and stable than the Tab. This is my first Android device and I can now honestly say I will not depart with Apple's OS for Android. Six plus months of use is enough for me to dissuade anyone from buying this device or an Android based product. I should have saved the $150 and put it towards an Apple iPad mini. Well, live and learn. The old adage, you get what you pay for rings true here.

Reviews.Title: It's a pretty ok tablet.
Reviews.Author: Polly Swafford
Reviews.Content: I've had some troubles with it lagging and freezing badly. After having to turn it off/on a few times I think it fixed it. This is why it isn't a 5 star. Personally the apps are what I wanted. I got it for school use and pleased when I could open up my assignments on word and PowerPoint.

Reviews.Title: It does what it's supposed to.
Reviews.Author: floyd wilson
Reviews.Content: If you just wanna watch some movies or read a book this is the device for you. The camera isn't too bad for a tablet, but I doubt anyone buys a tablet for the camera. I definitely recommend this tablet for anyone who travels or just likes reading. The micro sd slot is a definite bonus!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Roy Harrison
Reviews.Content: my kids love it.  I was nervous about anything refurbished.  it was half price of a new one.. its all good

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy t3 tablet
Reviews.Author: DONALD B. SHERMAN "COWBOY DON"
Reviews.Content: I am very excited to own this tablet.  the colors on screen are vived.  the speed to connect online is very good.having received it about 2 weeks ago, I am still on the learning curve.  I use it every day to become more fluent in the use and potential of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but short range wifi
Reviews.Author: Dane R. Jones Jr. "G. W. Danar"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is good. Almost perfect size. Good size screen but still can fit in some large pockets. The stock memory of 8gb can be filled quick because some games can be 1gb in size. But the memory can be expanded easily and not for too much. Performance is good. I am still surprised by the graphics of some games. I just wish I could get or find a gimp or photoshop like app to do graphic designs on the go without having to root or basically hack the tablet. The wifi range is good if you are within your home or the same building as the router but it can get weak when  you are outside. I am looking for a way to boost its signal by maybe using an usb wifi adapter for rasberrry pi like boards and use a usb to micro usb adapter to connect it to the tablet. Should work since rasberry pi uses android and linux like this can but this tablet has to be hacked to root it so you can install linux while it comes with android out of box. I would recommend and buy this tablet again. Battery is about 12 hours with wifi off but with wifi on it can be drained in about 6 hours if you surf the net alot and can be drained even quicker if playing a game with 3d graphics while wifi is on. But with all the usb power adapters on the market I doubt that will be much of a problem for most people. I have two wall power adapters and one car adapter while only spending about 40 us dollars so i can not complain too much about having enough power for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Pedraza "evil_23666"
Reviews.Content: I have the Gal 3 8 inch tablet. So when my son dropped & shattered his we decided to get him this tablet. We figured we'd get a refurb to save some money. It arrived sooner than expected. But there were issue with it as well. We contacted the seller & it was promptly addressed & we opted for replacement and figured we would give it another shot. Replacement turned up & is working just as awesome as expected!!

Reviews.Title: work's great
Reviews.Author: yolanda flores
Reviews.Content: Work's great and can't go wrong for the price that why I give it 5 stars so far so good

Reviews.Title: This is good
Reviews.Author: Daniel Mendonça Vargas
Reviews.Content: Good tablet. Fast, easy to use. I bought it to my girl and she loves it. Very useful for her purposes.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Xavier
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these tablets for my family and so far they've been great.Games, social apps, streaming services all perform above average. I almost went for an off brand tablet but then I realized that this was not that much more expensive for what I needed them for. My kids love them and stay glued to them for hours(after homework of course).I know they come out with a new model every year or so but in the mean time this will do then I'll probably upgrade to the new models when the time comes. Samsung and Android have made wonderful technology and I can't wait to see what's next.

Reviews.Title: great pruduct
Reviews.Author: ben ross
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet from my sprint store as an anniversary gift for me and my girlfriend and I have been pleased with it ever since then( which was roughly 3 to 6 months ago ). I would definitely recommend somebody buy this tablet.Featuresone of the features I enjoy the most about this tablet is the amount of apps that you can use on the device, Skype, Pandora, Netflix , all run smoothly on it. you can also change out memory cards on this device to get up to 64 GB of storage. there is also an average battery life not exactly awesome but had to say itcomfortthis tablet is a decent size. it fits in your hand fairly comfortably even with prolonged use ( watching Netflix for about 4 hours ).  its also a somewhat light weight tablet its around one pound so not to great but not terrible.priceI paid fifty dollars for my tablet but that was only because of the deal sprint had going on., it was a very decent price. i admit if it costed any  more I would not have bought it though( only because i would not of had the money ).screen sizei like the 7 inch version over the 10 inch version because of the ability to change out the memory cards also the 7 inch is great for watching Netflix .accessory'sI admit I haven't explored much in the way of extras but I admit I bought the case that sprint had which was the standard case it was good. also my stylus pen works with my tablet so using my drawing apps is fun and easy.conclusionI would highly recommend this tablet for anyone who like to change out music or pictures via the memory cards , or the people who just like to have a tablet to do anything like playing games. I would also recommend getting a case for the tablet because I have dropped mine a couple of times and wouldn't want it to get damaged. ending note I would just like to say that this tablet is awesome !!

Reviews.Title: It's Meh...
Reviews.Author: Jorge's Amazons
Reviews.Content: The tablet is now old and clearly lags behind in terms of screen quality, processing power, and overall graphics.  I would recommend spending a little more and getting a tablet that is twice as good as this one.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Karina Garcia
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab is a great product. It has all the features that I need and more. I am very happy with the Samsung Galaxy Tab

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Leslie goheen
Reviews.Content: My son loves it can't hardly make him put it down.  Since all of are tablets r Samsung we can share games

Reviews.Title: Beautiful little tablet
Reviews.Author: Lynnae Ruberg
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is perfect for my work. I needed a simple Android tool for doing some mobile surveys, but one that would also let me try out other Android data collection apps in the future. The form factor is great - a little larger than I'd like, but the phone is a little too small - and I'm hoping the higher quality means it'll last 2-3 years.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: Love the tablet.  More than I expected.  Does a lot for a small tablet, very versatile and useful.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is Good
Reviews.Author: Larry Hanson
Reviews.Content: Just the right size for my wife. the unit responds well and quickly, that is what she wanted beside being small and light. The price was right and it arrived in a timely manner.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: WIFE LOVES IT!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Torres
Reviews.Content: I am in the Middle east and I bought this Samsung Tablet for my wife, as a birthday gift. She loves her tablet and the many features.

Reviews.Title: love my sg3 tab
Reviews.Author: mandy morgan
Reviews.Content: Love my samsung galaxy 3 tablet. Very easy to use with lots of options. Still trying to navigate my way around...alot like my cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: T. Pereira
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful little tablet.  It was very easy to set up and has all the apps that I need.  My next purchase will be a larger Samsung Galaxy tablet.  Bye Bye overpriced ipads.

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Lynda Fox
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to replace a Kendal which had stopped charging. I am hoping she likes it better and it continues to work well.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: A.Law
Reviews.Content: I got this product pretty fast in the mail practically "brand new". The only thing wrong was a dent in the packaging. I'm still learning how to use it but this was a good buy. My only cons on this product so far would be that the screen sometimes is very sensitive but overall I'm satisfied with the product I received.

Reviews.Title: Got rid of the Mini/Laptop
Reviews.Author: E. Steele
Reviews.Content: Replaced the Mini/laptop with the Samsung Tab 3. I have a grandfathered unlimited mobile Wifi setup so it is always connected to the internet. I am looking to add the wireless charging.

Reviews.Title: Luv IT
Reviews.Author: LN "LN"
Reviews.Content: bought one for my daugher after buying her a Lenovo that lasted about a month, then it froze on her. Got a replacement and same thing. Bought her the Galaxy tab and the only problem we've had with it is that we did not get it sooner.

Reviews.Title: loving it !
Reviews.Author: Barbara S. Bedard "Barbara B"
Reviews.Content: I really love this ! It charges pretty quick and the battery lasts a long time...I can watch movies great pix.. read books play games I also listen to books on the road !and I am sure it does a ton more !  I haven't put my music on it yet.. I hardly ever use my ipod anymore since I got this ! The only thing it doesn't have is facetime which is a bummer but I can Skype ,,, anyway its great !

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL BRUNO
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent. Highly recommended. Can do almost everything you ask. Just had to add the SD card for better storage.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product and great service
Reviews.Author: Felix J Pineau
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my Grand Daughter.  She loves it.  I think she"d rather I tear her hair out than make her put it down.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tablet
Reviews.Author: D felicia
Reviews.Content: it was a gift for my daughter is a very good brand . we own many Samsung devices so this was the perfect gift.

Reviews.Title: Best Features on this price range!
Reviews.Author: Omar Sostre-Tirado
Reviews.Content: Full features, Samsung brand reliabilty at a very reasonable  price. Very good resolution display. Wifi . Will buy it again..

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Melanie Gordon
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Definitely recommend buying.  It's size is great, especially for traveling; packs away neatly, accessories and all.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: Carolyn F. Hickox "Carolyn, aunt-in-law"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a graduation gift for a friend in the Phillipines. She LOVED it. It works perfectly and the camera is fantastic. We just skyped last night and it was like I was there with her.

Reviews.Title: I am impressed....
Reviews.Author: Terrence Wood
Reviews.Content: This was my first tablet purchase and for the small things I needed it for, it has surpassed my expectations.  For beginning users or skilled users, it is perfect.  I would recommend this product highly.  I have had no issues with the applications, or downloads, connecting to wi-fi none of the things I had read in the reviews prior to purchasing.  I am happy!  Samsung rocks!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: anibal guacaran
Reviews.Content: this is an excellent productvery good to my kids learn and have fun with iti recomend it ok

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: sheerli veg
Reviews.Content: i love this tab- it has enough space to put the apps i want on it, i love the calendar/organizer feature, and i use it for kindle ebook downloads as well, which i wasnt planning to when i bought it. sometimes its a bit slow to load, but i cant complain- its a great buy for the price i paid!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, Gold-Brown)
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Works pretty good.  Wife is not a tablet person but she likes it.  Kids love it.  I have had the Tab 2 for a while and find it faster than the newer Tab 3.  Tab 3 lags behind inputs and is a little glitchy.  Games are a little jerky, lessor quality video card or something I guess.  Tab 2 has upgraded Android 4.2.2 but Tab 3 is stuck at 4.1.2.  Don't know if an update will come any time soon.  I have rooted the Tab 3 to get rid of the bloatware... so far so good I guess.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I have been satisfied with the purchase, the size is great and it works well for my kids to use.My one/main complaint is that I can NOT utilize amazon Prime videos on the device and that is extremely frustrating. Other than that it has done everything I expected and has many good to great qualities for a small tablet.

Reviews.Title: daily use works great
Reviews.Author: dudeman
Reviews.Content: I like my tab works great except it losses time every once in a while and won't connect to WiFi. Quick fix not a too big of a deal. Plays most android games. For daily use works pretty good. Runs constantly for 6 months now. I would 5 star but its not pre rooted -1star and its just a little slow typing sometimes -1star

Reviews.Title: Good brand but not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Doris V Alarcon
Reviews.Content: I love all Samsung products this was a little disappointing because the first tablet I got the charging port wouldn't work so they had to send me a replacement. The replacement is working good so far but it freezes a lot, it seems very slow at times.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy tab
Reviews.Author: L. R. Nagy "lani02"
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed my tablet and use it for many things including email, internet, games and  pictures. It works great

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: SANDRA VASQUEZ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 8 year old and she loves it. It has all the features I was looking for, I am a Samsung galaxy owner and it was easy to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Deana L.
Reviews.Content: This was a great find. My husband needed a tablet for work and this works perfectly. Our 4 yr old can even use it bc it's that durable.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amos Browning
Reviews.Content: I needed a tablet for college classes as I do e-text. I primarily bought it as a reader, but I don't use it quite as much i as thought I would for an e-reader. I still find myself opening the text on the computer a good bit. But I love the IR blaster, as I have found apps to make it into a universal remote for my tv.OS feels pretty snappy. The size is good, I couldn't justify the price difference for the 8", but the 7" is actually a good size in my hand. It also slides in my back pocket of my jeans.I waited forever to pull the trigger on a tablet. I'm not an fan of iOS, but seriously considered apple for the battery life. This thing easily makes it through the day.  I haven't put the battery through a stress test of streaming movies all day long, but it is usually 3 days of casual use.between charges.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: Golddloks
Reviews.Content: I ordered  my little galaxy tab 3 and I love it. Its small but I wanted something that  was light weight and it is and when I took my trip it went right along with me. I probably use it almost every day and I havent had any problems at all with it.

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: Mo'
Reviews.Content: I already had a Tab 2 so the Tab 3 was just an upgrade for me..  especially due to the double sided camera.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: Malissia
Reviews.Content: Everything worked pretty nicely, just don't use it with slow internet. I liked the size, and how u use your finger tips to operate it.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB 3
Reviews.Author: Maxey M. Kempt
Reviews.Content: I OWN THE 10INCH VERSION OF THIS AND I REALLY ENJOY IT ALOT. I BOUGHT THIS ONE FOR A GIFT,BUT THIS ONE HAS ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES OF THE 10 INCH JUST IN A SMALLER PACKAGE

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: marcos t. loera
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy Tab 3 is a neat little tablet.  It's not too big nor too small, the processing speed is quick and it doesn't lag when you flip through pages of apps.  It also has some pretty cool apps that I have gotten attached to and play around with quite often.  I wanted a tablet because I didn't want to use my phone for ever single thing and run my battery down back to back, so the Galaxy was a perfect choice for a tablet .

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: I am sorry I waited so long to buy one. However, I'm trying to figure out why there is no multi- screen. I am using it as a wireless keyboard and mouse in connection with my laptop when I'm watching in bed. I am also using it as a remote connection so I can use my laptop anywhere. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Raul.Mendoza
Reviews.Content: It's very small and seems very fragile. It works great, but the battery life is a bit short which would be my only complain.

Reviews.Title: tab 3
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This tab 3 is amazing, the color is jus cool, never saw this color in my country before, will recommend any time

Reviews.Title: My Daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Walter Sr
Reviews.Content: My daughter really loves this device. She says that it takes good pictures, surf the internet well, is decent for reading a book, and the operating system is very stable.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Robin Saunders
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet its very fast and I use it for everything definitely worth the money I want to get 1 for my daughter

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: PsySCHopper "KayCee79"
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 12-year old son, who is absolutely fascinated with it! We upgraded (I guess) from the NABI 2 tablet to this Galaxy Tab 3, which in, and of itself, is quite literally galaxies away in performance/functioning and capabilities from the NABI 2!  This tablet is a remote control (which, for me is a HUGE seller), it has access to the Amazon marketplace, GooglePlay, and the Samsung marketplace as well. This tablet also allows for PIP, or rather, for one to watch a video on Netflix while browsing the internet! It has been dropped outside of its case and kept ticking! I'd say more, but why?! ;-) I also purchased one for my 6 year old, and the 10 inch for my 15 year old! At all ages, they are winners, with plenty of educational tools and apps for each of them! Color me one satisfied customer! Oh and the shipment was extremely swift!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Washington
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet...First tablet I've ever had and it's working perfectly. More than just a tablet, it's becoming my number on piece of electronics.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Moore
Reviews.Content: Loving my tablet. Just great and easy to carry with you .Use it in the bed Just great and love it.  Thanks !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: never go for it
Reviews.Author: HITESH
Reviews.Content: Very very slow.no proper product description on the Amazon web page. Not matching Samsung's image at all. Not worth buying

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I was really disappointed.  I thought it would be better. Its ok for surfing, facebook, these stuff but it's really slow if u wanna watch a video on websites. It also doesn't support flash and even if u download a built in flash browser, it's extremely slow

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: italo bolanos
Reviews.Content: This tablet, I have used and tested thoroughly and found that it does have overall advantages. So as a techie, I tested this tablet out and below I will list what I have found to be the Pros and Cons of this tablet. *Also, I own the Tab 3 7.0 3G (T211)UNLOCKED PHONE/TABLET COMBO (in white and I purchased it recently on Amazon and it is just 96 dollars more than this WiFi only one). The 3G model is a real phone and has a Micro Sim card slot in it. For just about 90 dollars more, I got the phone part and the 3g data abilities in the Tab 3 with 3g (which is very much worth the added cost). The P211 I also purchased on Amazon and now I carry it everyday as a phone and mini tablet combo. So if you need a phone and tablet in one unit consider the Tab 3 7.0 3g as it is just one unit to carry for phone and tablet! Both my Tab 3 versions are peppy and run great!

Reviews.Title: Very portable
Reviews.Author: Caroline G Metcalf
Reviews.Content: It is new to me and I am still learning a lot about it. I would recommend it as a good tablet especially if you are smarter at it, but I am a slow learner. Still i would say it is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Randi Schonning
Reviews.Content: Really useful gadget Easy to set up easy to use. Love the google voice feature. And a wonderful clear video (ok so sound isn't the best) which is an excellent and convenient teaching aid. All in all very satisfied. And despite the cross border fees and shipping - still the best price out there.

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: John Toth
Reviews.Content: very easy to use. i like it for traveling and basic use. Works well with other apps. I bought the bluetoot keyboard...nice extra.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Fridrik
Reviews.Content: Enough for me.  I do not need a bigger screen?  I am using a Samsung telephone as well, so the set up is the same. Thks.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7"
Reviews.Author: D. Stoll "Dave"
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered on time, although they called it refurbished it looks brand new. Seems to work pedfectly.  The only criticism I have is Samsung doesn't tech service doesn't do tech service for their own refurbished product. One of my pet peeves is all this high tech gadgets are great and useful tools , however nobody shows you how to use them or wants to support them. That goes for software and hardware. You have to be technically adept or watch utube videos to learn how to use the brand new high tech stuff you just bought. About the Samsung Tab 3 refurbished unit, it works great and will be a useful tool in my bag.

Reviews.Title: Incredible tablet!
Reviews.Author: Shaquille Wolef
Reviews.Content: Few complaints!It does everything I need!The battery lasts a very long time regardless of whether I use a lot of apps or not. I like that I can watch a least a full movie on here without plugging it into something. I often go on long random walks, and I can trust this tablet to still have power as I go.The pictures and videos are pretty great, but there is definitely room for improvement because you don't always have the clearest picture if the lighting isn't great.Sometimes, the speed hasn't been what I expected, but I have only seen that when I have about 10 apps running. Otherwise, it is great! :)I also find it to be a big deal that it has a microSD slot that is well protected!Overall, it is a lovely product! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, but beware of warehouse deals
Reviews.Author: Carson P.
Reviews.Content: Ordered one of these from the warehouse, like I have other electronics.  I've always been happy with the Warehouse deals, but this was extremely disappointing.  It was garage sale quality packaging at best, original but beat to hell.  The actual unit had smudges and dirt on it, as if it had been under someones car seat.  Amazon, I'm willing to buy opened used items at a discount, but this was unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Bad USB micro port
Reviews.Author: George S. Rizk
Reviews.Content: in the beginning it used to stop charging because some manufacture defect in the charging port and within 4 months stop charging. I send it to Samsung for repair and the answer I got was it is my fault!!I called the customer service to complain about that decision and they transfer me to the executive customer relations and when I explain the issue they told me the only thing they can do is call the repair center and tell them my point of view.So, I asked to speak to a supervisor and the answer was NO!! yes the answer was NO!

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: V. Cecere "gryffindor10"
Reviews.Content: I had ordered this because I had thought my Galaxy Tab 2 had died. It has since come back to life but that is cool cus now I have 2 tablets. I would give the Tab 3 a 5 star rating except for one annoying thing. Quite often when I am online on this tablet all of a sudden I won't be able to bring a site up, it says unavailable check your network connection and I look and it says I am connected. I have to shut the wifi off and then put it back on again so it will recognize that it is connected and then I can continue what I was doing. I can't understand why it does this but it is not that big of a deal overall it is a great tablet the same as the Tab 2 was. Actually the Tab 2 would do that internet connection thing once in a while too but not as often as the Tab 3. Overall I am very happy with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet its small and super light the resolution is great. The battery lasts for quite awhile thats a good thing.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Denise S.
Reviews.Content: Great buy. Brought it for myself but my 3yr old seem to taken over it n downloads everything. Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: worked great for a year then Bricked when update failed
Reviews.Author: E. Sine "Javaman"
Reviews.Content: When it worked,  it was good - it was very very goodBut when it was bad, it was horrid.We purchased this as a student kit (included keyboard) and rarely used the keyboard.We ended up using this mainly for our daughter's videos on car trips (the expandable memory was nice).Then the apocalypse came.  During our last update (4.3.1 or some such) the file ended up being corrupted, and we were unable to recover from it.  Samsung was absolutely no help,  since we were out of warranty, they said "so sorry, can't help you, why not you buy a new one?"Tried everything under the sun,  system resart, cold booting,  system restore,  and each time it would show the little android guy falling over and saying corrupt files/data.Needless to say we became an expensive paper weight.That's too bad because we cannot recommend any samsung tablets anymore.  We have Asus now and they are running great for the same price and better processors.

Reviews.Title: Excellent all the way around!
Reviews.Author: RMH
Reviews.Content: Great product and great company. I highly recommend them both. You can not go wrong with this tab and far superior to apps to that of iPad.

Reviews.Title: good tablet for your basic needs
Reviews.Author: M. Prieto
Reviews.Content: First the good, people put down the screen resolution being low, but samsung screens are one of the best , there 1024 by 600 resoution is so much better than other screen with same resolution . Side by side with my kindle fire hd i can barely notice much difference. The tab is not extreme fast but it is not slow either, if you install  a task killer or ram manger , you can keep the ram clear and it will improve your browsing experience. People say it take 3 secs more to open apps, really 3 secs if you cant wait an extra 3 secs, its time to slow down your life.  I test the wifi and it works great the bars are not correct , when iam outside i get one bar but the tab work perfectly still loading pages and loading u-tube, test it yourself u will find even with 1 bar showing the connection is great.This is a perfect tab for movies and emails, the size is quite small and light fits almost perfectly in my pants pocket.  Since the price drop you can find these as low as 149.00 , which is a great price for the tab. The tv remote is great for using the tab to control tv.  Most people make fun or hate samsung touch wiz, but i love it , it has lots of useful features and mekes it easy to use the tablet, i have own the nexus 7 2013 and yes it is faster and smoother, but i like the samsung so much better, with the nexus you have to be very gental as it is very thin I was always afraid the screen would crack.  Like i said if you install a ram manager or task killer and keep the memory clear , you will find the tab work fine, as long as your not expecting it to be blazing fast....  Really the only real bad is the 8 gigs of strorage which is about 4.5 gigs useable .....

Reviews.Title: Really impressive
Reviews.Author: Shyvonne Anderson
Reviews.Content: It's light weight, easy to store and carry, really easy to use, battery life is excellent.  I was really impressed once I got used to it. really like it. I think it's great. I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: tablet to use for checking email, surfing web instead of going to my laptop.  Mostly use with the kindle app as an e reader and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7inch
Reviews.Author: dsuasnavar
Reviews.Content: I like it.  I got the 7-inch which is just right for me.  I can read my ebooks,  check my email,  and many more.It runs smoothly and is fast.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Thelma L Hopkins
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my Nephew for Christmas and he loves it, he brag to all of his friends about it. I am going to get me one.

Reviews.Title: I love this product!
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Arreaza
Reviews.Content: When I got my tablet, I got really excited. I've been enjoying it ever since. It's very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Satesh N.
Reviews.Content: I own a TAB2 and I must say that the performance is the same. However if you dont have a TAB 2 get this since the design is superior. the TAB3 gives a more sturdy hold since i feel like my TAB2 can roll out of my hand with its rounded smmoth design, not so with the TAB3. Also with the TAB3 actual buttons for home and back its more convenient than the TAB2 which had a display touch screen home button which can be a hassle with screen rotation.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Emma Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I love it. Preferred. This item fits what I wanted. Excellent quality. Beautiful. Confortable. Perfect size. Good Color and well-made

Reviews.Title: Excelent tab for its price.
Reviews.Author: Ortodontic
Reviews.Content: Very easy and fast tab, very low cost tablet, I bought white color because its cheaper...and I dont use other than ipad at home.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung
Reviews.Author: Franco Osuna
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of Samsung and android. This is a mix that rules.easy to use and well prepared for work

Reviews.Title: Bigger Version of Phone
Reviews.Author: Sierra
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just like a bigger version of my phone. I initially bought it to read and listen to music on while I was at work and it's honestly great for that. It can be a bit slow and I don't like that but its such a minor detail. A great buy!

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Sharon M. Prinz "Applesauce"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, just what I wanted.  I love my Kindle Fire HD, but find it alittle too large to carry around in my handbag.  This unit is just perfect, does everything and so easy.  Great bargain...

Reviews.Title: looking for great deals.
Reviews.Author: Katrina Bills "movie lover"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it. My neice set it up for me. Im not good at technology. But I use it toserf the intrrnet. Its been a godsend to me. Sometimes the internet gets slow, but its great for such a great price. I would recommend it to otherrs. Thank u very much...i was going to add is yes it has a headset jack an 1 R blaster. And if I use it alot I charge it everyday. It looks like it has speakers also by the charger port. Hope that helps. Im not good with technology like I said. But I love it.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Sherry Woody
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a Kindle at Christmas and thank heavens my daughter talked me in to buying this instead.  It was a model behind which made it really affordable and still has all the whistles and bells I want , plus I love the size.  Btw  I just downloaded Kindle to my tablet so i have the best of both worlds.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: NoCoast Photo
Reviews.Content: I bought this Galaxy Tab for my wife as a Christmas gift. She loves it, can't keep her off it. Battery lasts hours and the quality of the speaker is as good as to be expected. I'm a fan of the Android OS, this tablet uses Jelly Bean 4.1.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: RiddleL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself to give my kindle to my kids.  I love it.  I also have a Samsung Galaxy phone and they were able to sync up.  I use it mostly for reading using my Kindle app but I have used it for other things and I love that I upgraded to this!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed having this (it's a great way to stay organized for my wedding and to surf the internet without turning on my laptop). It does tend to really lag in performance when you have it on Power Saving Mode (the battery still lasts for quite a while when Power Saving Mode is off). I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this Tablet ! The best one yet !
Reviews.Author: ShemSwag
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for about a year now and I couldn't be happier with it ! It  has helped me through so many rough times in my life and I love how it feels in the hand. Don't buy an expensive Apple tablet when you could have one of these amazing Galaxy Tab 3 series. My only problem with this tablet is that it doesn't have the current Kitkat update as yet and multi-windowing is not available. Hopefully, this will be fixed in the KitKat update !

Reviews.Title: this item is a very good product
Reviews.Author: natasha
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet I brought it for a good friend of mines an he loves it hes always on this tablet

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: leidy
Reviews.Content: Thanks for all the tablet is in perfect condition, arrived on time and costs. ue only thing of note the lack of rest every perfect headphones

Reviews.Title: super easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brenda Boeldt "brenda"
Reviews.Content: Its not as fast as I wanted, but is super easy to use... just a bigger version of my smart phone... :-)

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Wayne King
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a trial to have my staff use this in the field for custodial inspections and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Yes
Reviews.Author: Jerry Solomon
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I got one for my son for Christmas and I really liked it. Glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great device but battery or charger cable issues
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: A pretty nifty little gadget. It's not a cellphone, it's not a pc, it's the perfect tablet. It fits comfortably on your hand and is not tiresome to hold but is not too small either.With this one I got an issue. One night it discharged completely and the next day it didn't wanted to turn on. Even after I left it charging for a long time. The next day I brought it to work and connected it to the pc for a long time. It worked perfectly fine afterwards.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Shannon S.
Reviews.Content: So far after 3 months no complaints definitely would recommend this product or buy it again :-) that's  it :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Joseph Baker
Reviews.Content: I am completely technologically illiterate but I have seen my co workers with tablets similar to this and I had to have one.  I have been slowly learning what this little machine can do and I am more than satisfied with it!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: GUILLERMO FIORENZA
Reviews.Content: Good product. It easy collocation and the quality is excellent, I tested that with my child and has a good ressistent.

Reviews.Title: the bomb
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Murphy
Reviews.Content: my aunt really love her new toy u can do everything from this tablet I will recommend it to others thanks

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: Courtney A.
Reviews.Content: as a lover of samsung products this tablet met all of my expectations. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Jose Lozano
Reviews.Content: My mother isn't tech savvy so I bought her this tablet to help her catch up with today's world. She loves it and is obsessed with it.

Reviews.Title: nice little tab to get the job done
Reviews.Author: D.
Reviews.Content: It's a nice tab and has the same interface as my galaxy S3, so working with it is very easy. I just needed something to read my pdf files and e-books on, and this does the job. It is slow and isn't really fast, actually slower than my phone, but if you're not looking for top of the line and just want a small tab for reading and occasional youtube viewing, this product is great!

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the right amount of MOney!
Reviews.Author: Fernando Rubalcava "fride19832"
Reviews.Content: Tablet is very responsive, no problems setting  up the mail,calendar,WiFi, and contacts. It's been only 1 month and so far the wife love's it. This tablet at that price is a great buy. Nice Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Ri Ki
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is absolutely cute and neat and came the way that it was described. It doesn't have a sim card slot, however, but it's fine without one.

Reviews.Title: I chose this product instead of a new phone
Reviews.Author: Phyllis L.
Reviews.Content: I am having fun learning my Galaxy. There are so many different things to do on it, I am amazed. I have already read one book on Kindle and starting another. It takes great pictures but I haven't figured out yet if I can send them. I am sure there is a way. I keep referring back to the online instruction manual so it will all come to me eventually. It's a wonderful product

Reviews.Title: love love love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. She has another tablet which doesn't have a back camera so she is happy with this one

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow at times, but as always with Android tablets, there are good customization options and a wide range of apps.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly fast download.
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: The tablet was for my son. He said it quickly searches and it's clear. he only wish the Samsung Galaxy was able to gett optimum now, access to watch his favorite T.V. shows on the tablet.

Reviews.Title: my birthday gift to me
Reviews.Author: Tarsha Singletary
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet and a big fan of SAMSUNG galaxy products. If you own a galaxy phone then you will love this tablet

Reviews.Title: excellent team
Reviews.Author: JESUS L ACOSTA P
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very practical and comfortable to use, helped me a lot to synchronize multiple computers in my house with the apps that I downloaded, and you can download an endless number of applications to be used, I have no complaints of this tablet, it has simplified my many of my tasks both at home and at work.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased these for my kids to read on at school (Middle School and High School) and they work perfect.  They loaded them up with apps and it still runs fast. Great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Travella Williams
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mother and she loves her new tablet 3 . Thanks a lot amazon. Very appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tab
Reviews.Author: Gaby
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 works Beautifully. The only setback would be that unlike the Tab 2 where I was store applications on my micro SD card with ease. This version makes storing applications on your SD card a bit more complicated. Just google it and follow the instructions on how to do it. Other than that,  I have no complaints. Don't hesitate to buy because you wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Olayinka Bolaji
Reviews.Content: This samsung galaxy tab met all my expectations, deserves a 5 star really, love the color. I recommend this for anyone looking for a tab

Reviews.Title: Best tablet
Reviews.Author: Eric Hayes
Reviews.Content: To be so compact and easy to carry around, it would seem like it wouldn't do very much, but that's the exact opposite. Also with Samsung's high quality camera, it is the only digital camera you need.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Toya
Reviews.Content: I'm so in love with my tablet.... I haven't really put it down since I brought it.. I'll recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dayana Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, the tablet is very practical and comfortable, loved the price and quality. I recommend it to everyone, whether children or adults.

Reviews.Title: IT'S PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Rebeca Trujillo
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is ideal. Very portable. Great screen resolution. Crisp colors, Fast performance. It's PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 7
Reviews.Author: Conney
Reviews.Content: This little device is the best. It's my personal and private little computer. I would recommend it to every one. The greatest. I love it.

Reviews.Title: tab 3
Reviews.Author: Priscila Diaz "PRI18"
Reviews.Content: it's was awesome , what you see is what you get , totally new , not damaged.I recommed it .

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Amanda Reeder
Reviews.Content: I got this so I could put my textbooks on it and carry it to class. I wanted something lighter than my laptop. It has been working pretty well. I have a problem  with one textbook it is very sluggish, but it is a very large textbook and the other 3 do not have that problem. I used Google drive to put them there. I liked that all the apps from my phone went onto the Tab. It has been pretty good. I'm still learning some things but so far I'm happy

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Amanda Chavez
Reviews.Content: Absolutely great tablet. Love it! Would recommend it to anyone. It works great and does what I need it to do. Awesome.

Reviews.Title: good enough 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its a great device for the price. A little glichy and hesitant at times but overall good. It can be very handy

Reviews.Title: Wait on this one.
Reviews.Author: T-bone
Reviews.Content: This is a good size for everyday use.  Easy to carry.  Memory/storage is barely adequate, had to use supplement.  The battery would not re-charge after using it for 6 weeks, one week after return policy had expired.  Money down drain.

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever
Reviews.Author: kerft2_74
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 5-y-o daughter.  She really enjoys it so much it was worth the money.  I got a good price too.  She uses it extensively, all other gifts have paled in comparison.  I now have my Kindle to myself!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Jackie Hamm
Reviews.Content: I received my Galaxy Tab and immediately began using it... I love the size fits in my purse with ease...

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Smith family
Reviews.Content: Very good product, it has even been able to withstand the wear and tear of having it here in afganistan.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Gurkan
Reviews.Content: It was awesome product but i sold to my friend.  It is as described. But i am not samsung user i couldnt deal

Reviews.Title: I bought 3 of these
Reviews.Author: F. Lynn Walker
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 tablets for Christmas presents.  One of them died in less than a month (it wouldn't turn on at all).  I returned it and received a new one in less than a week.  So far, the new one is working well.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet
Reviews.Author: D. Machata "machata"
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I got tired of lugging around a heavy laptop on vacation. It is very small, lightweight and convenient. It doesn't have the computing power of a laptop, but the display is sharp and high quality. I don't have a smartphone, so it is my first experience with apps too. I find them problematic, for example flash is NOT supported by Android, so most videos won't play. That sucks, but it's not Samsung's fault. Overall I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: CHERYL GABRIEL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister and she loves it!  Easy for her to use and easy for her to jump on wifi no matter where she is.  Small enough to throw in her purse but not too expensive that you can't let you kids play on it.

Reviews.Title: User friendly, Very Good Battery Life
Reviews.Author: Britt Dahl
Reviews.Content: My kids love these and they are user friendly. The battery life is very good as well. Also a great size for the kids to take with them and not be cumbersome.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: GSDLover "GSDLover"
Reviews.Content: And my mother will not put it down.  They use it for everything, especially with the optional Chromecast I purchased for them.

Reviews.Title: The BEST Christmas gift!
Reviews.Author: GayT
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband although he had never expressed wanting a tablet.  HE LOVES IT!!  Its a larger version of the Samsung Galaxy 4 phone so my 23 year old was able to navigate and assist DAD with setting up his apps.  GREAT device.

Reviews.Title: works like advertised
Reviews.Author: Douglas Powell
Reviews.Content: Great product. Easy to set up and use.  My only computer now. Even print great pics to my wireless printer

Reviews.Title: Great price. Slow shipping.
Reviews.Author: Charly of Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, NY
Reviews.Content: I shopped around online & on the internet before purchasing. Great price. Tablet works well. Battery last a long time.

Reviews.Title: purchase for my daugher
Reviews.Author: Shelita
Reviews.Content: My daughter is 11 and was tired of the cheap tab,  She looks her samsung galaxy tab, she doesn't put it down and she found more apps to help with reading.  Made me so jealous i purchase another tab for me.  LOL  Fast deliver

Reviews.Title: Love it with a passion
Reviews.Author: Nielle
Reviews.Content: I love it! I use it to read, keep track of my life, and other things. I haven't really looked through a lot of the stuff it has on there yet but pretty cool so far. Can't see my life without my Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal for Refurbished.
Reviews.Author: Rock J
Reviews.Content: When I received this item it was sealed in its original box as if it was brand new.  Everything was there no problems with the devise and I have used it everyday since I received it.  It is my alarm/nightstand/music desk clock.  I love the color.  I bought an Otterbox outside case with stand and it is the best tablet I have seen or had.  Fast and I can sync it with my Samsung Galaxy S4 cell phone and Dell Laptop.  It's great at this price.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale Walls Sr.
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this tablet.  This is my first (I was using a laptop).  Screen is the right size.  HD is AWESOME!!!  Screen gets kinda dirty from the fingers all the time but that's O.K.  Easy to use.  Connected to my network without a hiccup.  Like the apps you can get with it.  Overall, I am a happy camper!!!

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: susannie ellison
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, I can't seem to put it down. Picture quality could be better though. Overall it is a great device.

Reviews.Title: A bit slow
Reviews.Author: Asher Fine
Reviews.Content: first of all its woth the price..second, it runs a bit slow and not very smooth.all in all it is a nice small tablet but not really a high performance tablet at all

Reviews.Title: not as good as the tab 2
Reviews.Author: Shaun Boyer "Shaun"
Reviews.Content: dont know how you can down grade with a new product but Samsung did it, not as fast and the screen seem to be a bit more dimmer

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: LEONARDO ANDRES ARIAS SOSA
Reviews.Content: THANKS FOR THE ARTICLE WAS RECEIVED IN PERFECT CONDITION. EXCELLENT QUALITY ITEMS AND I'M REALLY THANKFUL FOR YOUR GOOD WORK ... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Great device with a great price
Reviews.Author: Sharon K. Chiddister
Reviews.Content: I liked the price and Samsung is a very reputable  brand.  I almost wish I  would have bought the 8 or 10 inch.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Mendoza
Reviews.Content: Small, but too much, confortable, easy to use, expandable memory capability, wi-fi, fast web browsing, really liked this product and its features

Reviews.Title: Excellent item!!!
Reviews.Author: Isabel Rodriguez Peña
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy Tab is awesome, connects to Wi Fi super fast, it's small enough so I can carry it in my handbag,  has great resolution and I am super happy with it! It arrived super fast and in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: Why Won't It Save to the External Memory Card?
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet purchase for me and perhaps my last. I've seen a lot of positive reviews for this product, so I don't understand why I'm having the issues I'm having. I'm just trying to save a picture(s) to the card and it won't let me. For example, when I select the camera and choose to save to the "memory card" I get a message as follows: "unable to save file to SD... transferring to internal memory" or at least some verbiage like that. I contacted Samsung customer support via online chat and was very unimpressed. Any one out there have some thoughts on how to resolve this problem? Otherwise, I think I will be looking to return. I didn't want to spend the big bucks on an Apple product, but gosh... if this is what you get with an Android device... maybe an iPad mini is worth the extra money. ??

Reviews.Title: Good price, Screen resolution/clariy sucks, old Android version
Reviews.Author: Anusha
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a better experience. I also own a Samsung Galaxy S4 phone & this Galaxy Tab 3 doesn't come close in terms of screen quality & overall experience. Not easy way to upgrade to new version of Android either. Lame! Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good functionality for a small tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Chittenden
Reviews.Content: I have Nook, Kindle, and iPad, too, and find the Samsung to compare favorably except for its small size.  Unfortunately, it does not do what I bought it for which was to mirror to my Samsung TV and to act as a touch remote.  It will send saved video and photos to the tv but it will not mirror live streaming data or web browsing.  If you want to do.that buy the 8" tablet.  Apps download easily and I have not yet found any that are incompatible.  Don't worry about color choices if you are going to use a cover.

Reviews.Title: Small Tablet packs big punch
Reviews.Author: Kirk
Reviews.Content: I have an I-Pad and this is much easier to carry around and actually works better and easier for much less money.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Diane Nagy
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I owned the galaxy s4 phone and loved it, so I figured this is exactly like it, already know how it functions, so glad I chose this over all the other tablets, and the price made it even better!!!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: greta
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this tablet a few weeks ago, and we have not experienced any problems. It was easy to set up and all worked well.

Reviews.Title: Best Android Tablet I have ever owned....
Reviews.Author: Ripped Off
Reviews.Content: This Tablet was a sweet price and included free shipping.... Well worth it! Would buy it again! I love it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Dante Sovereign
Reviews.Content: I've been using this and the Tab 2 8gb, 1.2ghz wifi side by side to compare and I am impressed.  I have all of my backed up apps on it and it still runs very smoothly.  The 16gb and 1.5ghz processor definitely make a difference over the Tab 2.  I've only had it for a week and tend to only like to give a review after extensive use.  I may update later.

Reviews.Title: A good Christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: Judy Scholtens "reading grandma"
Reviews.Content: Two of my grandkids asked me to order this for them to give to their parents for aChristmas gift.  Good delivery time before the holiday and they are very satisfiedwith their gift.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on something else!
Reviews.Author: Lewis S.
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. Runs well, decent memory. Added an 8 gig memory card to it and I can stream Netflix without issues or interruptions. The screen is on the smaller side, but for a budget tablet it is exactly what I needed. Bought another tablet (not a name brand) and it was dead within a week! This was worth every penny IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: oldmodelT "oldmodelt"
Reviews.Content: These were purchased for the two older grand children. They were extremely happy with the tablets. They can do as much with these as I can with my clunky old Dell. Maybe next year, I better look to upgrade my own!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Celida Padilla
Reviews.Content: The perfect gift for my nice on her "quinceañera" birthdayShe loves her first tablet.En the price is very afortable.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Carlos L Luque
Reviews.Content: The Samsung brand, the tab specs and the price were the main attraction for me to buy this product. I will recommend this tab to friends and family

Reviews.Title: yeah for samsung
Reviews.Author: maurine mccurdy
Reviews.Content: Samsung galaxy 3 is everything I expected and wanted it to be. I love it. Easy to use, comfortable in my hand. My photos turn out absolutely fabulous. It does beautiful documents and my games are a blast

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Great product.  I wish communication it would be better but at the end I got s nice tablet that I'm really enjoying

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet for the mony
Reviews.Author: K. Vicari
Reviews.Content: I had a tab 2 and got the 3 which I like a lot better. It is easy to hold in your hands and the design is better it matches the phones.

Reviews.Title: The price is Great
Reviews.Author: wael elsedeki
Reviews.Content: Just get it it's the best price you will ever find anywhere world wide.Thank you. I love it so much

Reviews.Title: Tab 3 rocks
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Weir
Reviews.Content: Samsung is rocking the products lately.  I have this devise and the Note III whoc both work amazingly well! Super product.

Reviews.Title: SUPER DEAL
Reviews.Author: Trent D. Freed "Tman"
Reviews.Content: Great price and great tablet so far. Really enjoying it and couldn't find a better deal locally in the stores

Reviews.Title: More than convenient
Reviews.Author: Bog Flynn
Reviews.Content: Bought this towards end of last year.  Love this tablet.  Useful feature is infrared port - makes it ultimate remote.  Battery life is phenomenal.  Watched a movie through Netflix and wasn't fully charged.  When finished, I thought battery icon would be empty.  It was actually still towards top!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Package
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Osei-Owusu
Reviews.Content: Was delivered right to my door stepExcellent condition. Great job!!! The tab looks cool and it was the perfect present for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Klimekoski
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace my Next Book tablet that quit working after three months. The Samsung is, by far, superior to my old tablet.The included Apps make it compatible to an iPod.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for an affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet primarily for reading. It works great for ebooks. I've downloaded several from Amazon and use the Kindle app. Touch screen has a delay that's very annoying. Sometimes it doesn't even work. But since I use my laptop for internet, it's not that big of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Very nice device.
Reviews.Author: Harriet C. Forster
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab was a gift for my husband's birthday.  I am very impressed with the easy of operation and the speed.  Display is very clear and size is good.  I had an iPad and actually like this device better.

Reviews.Title: daugher-in-law loves this
Reviews.Author: Sheila M. Gerber
Reviews.Content: looked everywhere to purchase one of these for my daughter-in-law and finally decided that this was the bet price.  She was interested in an HD Kindle and used my Galaxy tablet.  She immediately changed her mind about the other product.  We found this to be the best price and it shipped quick and was here in time for Christmas.  She loved it.

Reviews.Title: solid for newbies that need a tablet
Reviews.Author: Christopher boseak
Reviews.Content: for the most part this is a solid tablet. I bought this for my wife, assuming it would live up to my Galaxy S3 and Galaxy Note. Its good but not all that powerful

Reviews.Title: Grandson's Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Jim G.
Reviews.Content: I guess it's considered a good Christmas gift, my grandson who is 12 years old doesn't go anywhere without it.

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a gift.
Reviews.Author: Arielle
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mother for Christmas. She has never had a touch screen device before and she LOVES IT. Totally recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: nice tab
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: i really like the tab , it's so class and so nice. and price is really good. great deal !

Reviews.Title: Did not work with non-broadcasting WiFi AP
Reviews.Author: IT Ed
Reviews.Content: The device would not connect with non-broadcasting WiFi access points, even when added manuallly with assigned IP adddress.  Worked fine when the WiFi was broadcasting, but went to 'connection out of range' if the AP was switched to non-broadcasting.  Tried it with several WiFi AP's, but all had basically the same problem with all.Returned to Samsung for service, but they sent it back with the same problem.  (The repair statement said they did a software update, but the device was up-to-date before I sent it in.)Returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: excellent - very good function, material and nice, soft, easy to carry around
Reviews.Author: Tony W. Yuen
Reviews.Content: excellent - very good function, material and nice, soft, easy to carry aroundexcellent - very good function, material and nice, soft, easy to carry around

Reviews.Title: Its the best thing that I have ever used!
Reviews.Author: karissa
Reviews.Content: I love how fast and easy to use. I can't wait to see how it will helm me in school!

Reviews.Title: l love this item!
Reviews.Author: Sean Best
Reviews.Content: I have recommended it to my friends!This product is very handy and it is so convenient to move around with!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great price great product. would recommend this for anyone. dont waste your time on the Dragon Touch tablets this one blows them away

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Fito
