Reviews.Content: I bought 2 Galaxy Tab 3. One for my brother, as he is graduating from school, and one for my aunt to help her organize her agenda, contacts, and daily activities. Both of them loved them. It was extremly easy to set up the devices and we haven't found any issues.

Reviews.Title: Gift for wife
Reviews.Author: JimBO
Reviews.Content: She seems to like it well enough.  It was a big surprise for her Christmas morning and it made a great impression.  Still working.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: pamelia evans
Reviews.Content: GREAT FOR THE PRICE EASY TO USE AND SETUP.  CAN CARRY IN MY PURSE.  GREAT SOUND AND VERY CLEAR TO SEE.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: David Brown
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints. Great price and speed.  Why pay more when you can get this tablet. Android apps, plenty to choose from.

Reviews.Title: Very good little tablet.
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Piper
Reviews.Content: I own a Nexus 7 and now this Galaxy Tab 3, 7 inch. The two notable differences are the price and resolution. Although the lower resolution of the Galaxy Tab is noticeable when reading very fine print,  it is still quite acceptable. Due to the fact that I paid half as much for the Galaxy Tab as the Nexus,  I am more pleased with the Galaxy Tab.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Marielena Len "Marielena"
Reviews.Content: My parents ask me for a tablet.  I started with a reaserch on the internet and amazon and found this Galaxy Tab 3 exactly what they need, and with the exact size.  They just started using it and it was very frindly, in fact, they use it with the Chromecast HDMI to watch show on a big screen.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Leslie Moore
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tablet,  for the price its great, does all that I personally need it to do.  What I like most is the size and it does just a much as the high end tablets out there.  Its worth the money.  Samsung really did a good job in developing this tablet.

Reviews.Title: ok ok
Reviews.Author: enriketo
Reviews.Content: I just bought this one so my baby girl could watch youtube. To be honest its an ok tablet, thats it  dont expect the next big thing

Reviews.Title: Great ph
Reviews.Author: Cheena
Reviews.Content: Really great ph for its price. Even for new apps and music battery life is good. Great handling as well

Reviews.Title: looooove it. hoping for better camera quality, but love it overall.
Reviews.Author: Faith Harris
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth purchasing. I would recommend it to teens and anyone that likes social networking. Great buy! Go get one.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: tdltn "tdltn"
Reviews.Content: Always toyed with the idea of a tablet and after using my friends, I had to get one!  Great look and price!!  Very pleased with this item!!

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: G. Setaro "GSV"
Reviews.Content: Its a very good tablet you feel the quality of it, its very responsive, fast, light and the Android its a very good OS.

Reviews.Title: it  is helpful to get samsung galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: Amadou kane
Reviews.Content: There lot of apps in this Samsung. We can use it like phone, TV, internet search. I would recommend any one who want to go get

Reviews.Title: Dang it looks good!!!
Reviews.Author: Colby Pederson
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung Galaxy Tab for my little sister for Christmas. She loves it its great looking, fast, easy to use plus she can stick it right in her back pocket. The bad of course is the 8gb of memory but with sites like YouTube, playlist.com, Pandora and many more there really no reason to download music anymore. Same goes with movies too. Also I really think they could have put some more ram into the thing. Like come on most phones now almost have 2gb ram. If it had more ram this thing would be real beast but it does not. Overall very happy with purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet !!!!
Reviews.Author: KIT C.
Reviews.Content: Great WiFi... netflix stream flawlesly, skye work good w/ the front camera, facebook, internet search workswithout any problem. speakers is loud, very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: specs for LTE model are not the same as wifi only
Reviews.Author: Derek A. Visocchi
Reviews.Content: LTE model is 1.7 dual core CPU 1.5 GB RAM and 16gb flash storage...specs listed are for that of wifi only model.

Reviews.Title: On time!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time and in perfect conditions. I think i don't have anything more to write. I'm happy with my tablet Samsung Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: marissa
Reviews.Content: Well it is a Samsung galaxy tab 3 do I have to even go on!  It is great no complaints thus far.  I would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: WARRANTY
Reviews.Author: JESUS
Reviews.Content: THE TABLET DO NOT WANT TO LEAVE STARTING THE LOADING ALL DAY AND NOT START I WANT TO KNOW THAT I HAVE TO FOLLOW STEPS IN ORDER TO USE THE WARRANTY OF THIS EQUIPMENT BUY IT IN AUGUST 2013THANKS A LOT FOR ME know HELP WITH THIS GREETINGS

Reviews.Title: Top end tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Fast tablet,best performance for the price .  Easy to operate. Highly recommend to all. ages. Thanks for guiding me  there.

Reviews.Title: Excellent performance at a convenient price
Reviews.Author: Maria C Bernetich
Reviews.Content: Highly fullfilled my expectations. I would recommend it to a friend (though I will probably choose the 10-inch one the next time).

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dario
Reviews.Content: I really loved this product. the tablet is fast. easy to use. good quality.I recomend this product for everyone, no doubts.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Copper
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is perfect.  I can check my e-mail and reply.  I can check my facebook, the weather, weather radar, amazon, autotrader or anyother www site I wish to look at.  The camera is handy, post-it note reminder, etc.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Zena Henderson
Reviews.Content: This is a great beginning Tablet for my dad. He's relatively new to electronics and he loves. Good product.  Just a bit smaller than what I'm used too

Reviews.Title: Beautiful in Brown
Reviews.Author: Riqui
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Galaxy Tab 3!  It's small enough to fit in my handbagand light enough to hold, carry & watch movies or play games. I just wishthat the available warranty was visable when ordering but I did notice I can go baback & order it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: kelly lim
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom's Christmas present,she uses it so well and with "google Chrome", it's so much fun to watch movies and tv series (especially with the Netflix app),I think the size is great, and it's just ideal to have if you are looking for a small cheap tablet :) (quality seems better than the price for me)

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab
Reviews.Author: Pj Magee-guagliano "PJ"
Reviews.Content: I Love this Tab....  Perfect to carry in my purse, yet big enough to easily navigate the screen.  Holds a great charge and crisp color.  I use this more than my NoteBook as it is lighter and just easier all around !  Recommend !!

Reviews.Title: Working Great
Reviews.Author: Kase
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son's birthday and he is in love with it. One of the features that he liked the most is the ability to video chat with me whenever he has WIFI access. 'Google Hang out', allows him to talk to anyone who has the 'Google hang out' app on their smart phone. All that is required is a Gmail account. It also had a neat app called Watch-On, this app acts as a remote control and can change channels, change the volume, power the TV and set top box on/off. Very cool app, very cool tablet, would purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought.
Reviews.Author: Seketha Woods
Reviews.Content: My son wanted a I phone touch 5. I brought the tablet instead. He loves it. He is always finding new cool things to do with it.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old for Christmas. He loves it! My only thing with it is that it doesn't have parental controls so I had to buy an app from the Google play store & it sometimes laggs while using the internet but other than that it's awesome

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Fanny Troncoso
Reviews.Content: Samsung tab 3 is great, the product is in excellent condition. I recommend buying the accessory set for optimal benefit.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: My C. PAY "Dileep"
Reviews.Content: Nice tabletThe only problem is automatic brightness.The screen is nice.I recommend this to othersGreat buy for this price

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: zulay
Reviews.Content: i like it because i need it this item; is all that i say in this moments, i enjoy so

Reviews.Title: For the most part I am pleased with the Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Kent R. Boggess
Reviews.Content: I chose a four because I like the features of the Tab 3.  I like the size and weight..I like the many built in features, ease of use etc.  I had a Kindle Fire HD previously, which had a much better picture, and a better camera..I am not impressed with the front or rear camera on the Tab 3, but over all I am pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids and adults
Reviews.Author: Kayla Marie Scott
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my friends kids and they loved itLooks just as described and how it is in the pictureI would definitely recommend this

Reviews.Title: PERFECT FOR KIDS
Reviews.Author: Arletta Johnson
Reviews.Content: My daughter absolutley adores this tablet. she stays very entertained.Its fairly light weight and easy for a 7 year old to use.this cmae wit a charger that didnt work very well though. The second day of use I realize she had to turn the charger a certain way to get it to work. I dont like that.Otherwise it works just fine. I recomment this product to anyone and will be buyin my son one in the future. He is 4 and uses it just fine without help as well.

Reviews.Title: Good, but...
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is hands down one great device. It works smoothly and seamlessly. But it doesn't do all those wonderful things anyone owning an iPad or similar will have become used to. Games and apps are great, google play is getting there now, and this thing is sturdy and easy to handle. Can't do iTunes of course, and can't play Amazon movies either - which for me is a big disappointment. My kid loves it, also cause its compact and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 3.7
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Great price.. gift for my mom for Christmas.  She loves it.email is faster at coming up then the home computer.ordered another one for myself..

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Gonzalez Gilbert
Reviews.Content: I highly recomend this seller, it works perfect. It is exactly as described, this a very fast tablet, is the perfect size to fit anywhere and the perfect power to make all the task.

Reviews.Title: excellent service excellent product
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: I got this for a friend of mine and she just love it. It was delivered even before the estimated time and the product features and just what I expected from a Samsung product, the display it's just great and the performance it's excellent, I have the galaxy tab 2 and I feel just tempted to get one this for me as well.... bottom line, good product strongly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working in less than 60 days
Reviews.Author: John Leavitt
Reviews.Content: I planned to use as Flight Computer, nifty device when working, had all of about ten hours on it, charged it overnight went to boot it up and nothing, nothing at all!Infant mortality at it's finest...

Reviews.Title: A great tablet that does it all!
Reviews.Author: L. Jones
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect tablet and just the right size for me - wanting to carry it around all the time rather than leave at home like the bigger IPAD.  Ideal for scheduling, note-taking and email and internet access on the go.  Gone are my little post-its that get lost.

Reviews.Title: little slow
Reviews.Author: Courtney VanDamme
Reviews.Content: System is a little slow, not sure if its just my interweb that interferes with that though. But I love the color (brown) nice and sparkly

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rachel Brown
Reviews.Content: Wonderful wonderful product, could not be happier with android. Thanks samsung for your wonderful awesome products that work so great.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Exley
Reviews.Content: This is a Great tab! I Love it and so does my son. Easy to use and great pictures :)

Reviews.Title: was what I expected
Reviews.Author: Militza
Reviews.Content: It's a great product I used in skype and is very fast really, I love how it works and is so easy to having for everywhere. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Great Devise
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: This Galaxy 3 is everything I expected. It's fast, has a great picture, and is easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: summer kempf
Reviews.Content: Works great and just plain awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!' Pure amazing. Thinking about which is better though? Kindle Fire HDX or Samsung Galaxy Tab 3?

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just purchase this tablet today and I really like it. I used to have the 10.1 but my boyfriend ended up using that one, so I bought a smaller one for myself. I like how it's small enough to take to work with me but also big enough to read on it without having to squint my eyes trying to read. I got it when it was $150 so for me it's a winner.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Jessi Morales
Reviews.Content: I got these for my husband and I. We both love them. They are small enough we can take them anywhere without needing an extra bag.

Reviews.Title: Good for kids (pre-teens / teens)
Reviews.Author: Yeimy Tsou
Reviews.Content: I bought it for My 9 year old niece and she absolutely loves it. iIt was a good gift for a reasonable price

Reviews.Title: I liked and it was delivered on time
Reviews.Author: Marcela M. Salgado
Reviews.Content: Is what I wanted. It was delivered on time.I liked. It is a good product. It was an exelent oportunity and present for christmas.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Shantaram Jibodh
Reviews.Content: okay the products worked but some did not operate as advertised. I will see what ot rplace those products with on next order.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Billie Rickman
Reviews.Content: It does everything I could want it to do.. I received it as a Christmas gift,  it is the first tablet I have owned but it performs all the actions I desire a tablet to do. It is a good fit for my hand and also fits in pocket or belt (inside case)

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Cudjoe-Brathwaite
Reviews.Content: This item was a good buy. It was fit for purpose and more. I would recommend it to anyone who asks.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet works great. I bought it so that I could use Skype on a trip, but with the world of free and inexpensive apps available for the Android operating system that it uses I have found lots of other uses for it. I thought it would just be a toy, which it is, but it is also a helpful tool.

Reviews.Title: WORKS REALLY WELL!
Reviews.Author: Phillip Harris
Reviews.Content: LIKE THE DEVICE...WORKS REALLY WELL - WOULD RECOMMEND TO OTHERS...GREAT DEVICE...AND GOOD PRICE....EASY TO CARRY AROUND...AND SHIPPED ON TIME..HAPPY HAPPY

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I am carrying my tablet with me everywhere. I was originally looking at a Kindle Fire and this offers me so much more.Great for my wants and needs

Reviews.Title: crashes all the time
Reviews.Author: John Tomaszewski "shesky"
Reviews.Content: I have a galaxy s3 that I love so it was a no Brainer to take a chance on a tab 3.  Very disappointed so far.  Its slow and crashes all the time.  I have an original kindle from years ago that out performs this tablet on my favorite apart and games.  Would not buy again

Reviews.Title: Greatest budget tablet
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: First of all, I want to say I got this at a special in Best Buy for $139 dollars, so if a seller is charging more than that, he is ripping you off and you need to contact amazon. Its a great tablet for the money you pay(Unless you pay more than the amount cleared). Anyway, the tablet is great for music, pictures and quality for the price. You get a 50gb upgrade for dropbox and you can upgrade your memory to 64gb with a micro sd card. There is a little wifi problem, but, what tablet is perfect? Me, I'm a huge music fan and have a big collection, so with the micro sd card it fitted perfectly. Hardware wise, the specs are last years, but if you're on a budget, you can never go wrong with this one. The battery life lasts me more than enough, I'm a collage guy so i'm mostly listening to music and facebooking any chance I get. I recomend getting yourself a screen protector and cover, since the screen will get dirty with your fingers quickly. Great tablet overall.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Destiny N. Savage
Reviews.Content: should have spent the extra money for the galaxy 8"  2 weeks after getting this for Christmas its worked great, battery drained overnight and now it wont take a charge with any of the methods available from Samsung or online.  It is not the fastest tablet so after using my kids ipads it seems even slower now.Update  Spoke to Jon at Amazon and he quickly understood the issue and exchanged the broken one for a new one. Even paid the shipping both ways. Extremely helpful even with my having thrown away the packaging. Still not the best tablet but customer service was outstanding

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: i just scored a brand new galaxy tab 3 for only $139 ... i am already stocked just about that ... i went ahead and upgraded to next day shipping since it was so cheap. and after my order confimation, i checked the website again just to read over the specs again and the price had jumped back up to $169. i wil write a better review later.Ok its later now .., ive had the tablet for 3days now. I love it and the kids love it too. May order them one to play with during spring break. I think the price was an absolute steal. I amm very satisfied. I see other tablets cheaper but they aren't as fast as this one.  I am becoming a Samsung fan.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Cicylea Knowles
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old as a Christmas  gift, she loves it & so do I. Apps are easy to purchase

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Neal Treadwell
Reviews.Content: Love it works out for me drive for a living gets great wifi reception fast fast fast.  Except they lowered price after purchase n refused to refund difference

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Jorge O. Espejo
Reviews.Content: My Daughter s enjoying the tablet. She has yet to explore its capability with the Bluetooth keyboard, but is finding ways to utilize it productively.

Reviews.Title: slow and weak
Reviews.Author: Saquib Masud
Reviews.Content: unfortunately I cannot read comic books properly i.e. cannot view cbr files without the screen getting blurry.  Right now, I'm just hoping Samsung redeems themselves with tablets.  I have no complaints about their phones though.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Aleesha Allen-Daley
Reviews.Content: just wat I needed. the right size and all. its user friendly, whereas I take it everywhere I go. I just cant help it,  I'm obsess with this tab.

Reviews.Title: nice pad.
Reviews.Author: Robert Tranchant
Reviews.Content: I like this pad. It provides me with what I was looking for in a pad at this cost. My Nexus is nicer but also more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Frye
Reviews.Content: It Met all my expectations. The look on my wife's face when she opened it up at Christmas was priceless.

Reviews.Title: bought it for a christmas present
Reviews.Author: rebecca
Reviews.Content: my bf loved it, brand new sealed works great & its nice and small and lighweight reminds me of a book and fast shipping

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet at a stunning price
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The tablet is awesome for any price, but for $180 it's easily the best deal out there on a tablet. Exceptional display, incredible ease of use, and a ton of great features make this an outstanding tablet.

Reviews.Title: simply amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jermaine Lewis
Reviews.Content: Its everything I thought it would be, the 7 inchbscreen is perfect as it combines portability and usability, small enough to transport but big enough to be productive efficiently. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: 7 inch tablet.
Reviews.Author: Melvin Allen
Reviews.Content: It's ok however it doesn't do all that I thought it would... I am still working out the final touches...

Reviews.Title: instruction book
Reviews.Author: Joan E Schade
Reviews.Content: The instruction booklet was difficult to read and therefore understand.  Lighter colored paper would have helped and a good index.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Not much negative to say about this one.  I really like the fact that it has expandable memory via a microSD card and it runs fast and seamlessly.  It's a very good tablet in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Lisa M garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas she loves the size and it work great.  She wants to eliminate her phone and just use the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice and slim but slow
Reviews.Author: Pedro Camorlinga
Reviews.Content: I bought it mainly as a gaming device for my kids. I like the design; it is sleek, easy to hold and lightweight. However, the processing speed is significantly slow; it has a slow response time and some games (for instance Minion Rush) appear with broken graphics (e.g. slow image rendering) and are almost impossible to play, even though the storage is at 50% capacity. I will buy an external Micro SD to see if it improves the response time.

Reviews.Title: NICE TABLET.
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: GREAT SIZE TABLET. I BOUGHT 2 OF THEM. A WHITE AND A BROWN ONE. FOR EACH OF MY KIDS. (WISHED I HAD KNOWN ABOUT THE KIDS EDITION BEFORE) . BUT OTHER THAN THAT, ITS GREAT. I DOWNLOADED A LOT OF KIDS LEARNING APPS  FOR THEM. THEY ENJOY THEM.

Reviews.Title: kids loved it
Reviews.Author: lventura
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent tablet, very well built and the size makes it very portable while still keeping very good quality for videos or reading

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: wolf
Reviews.Content: I've always been a fan of Samsung and every portable electronic device we own is samsung. They have never let us down, and for the price you can't beat that. They are working great and with the additional memory slot it's almost impossible for the kids to fill it up.

Reviews.Title: Great device for cheap
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: I missed the low price sale and paid $159. It is fun to have in my house. It makes noises when I get mail or some other notification. It is there on standby to wakeup and do some quick web surfing. Battery life in standby is excellent. I have played some videos and the native player is limited on the CODEX it runs. I tried some free video APPS that kind of ran one CODEX better than another. I did not find a player yet that is as robust as some PC software (MPC, VLC). might help. I tried it in the car as GPS with some freeware, works OK. You can transfer GPX files (multi point GPS tracks). I might try some commercial GPS software.  GREAT screen daylight. I don't know if iPad is better, but for 1/4th the price it is great for me. My phone is an HTC EVO 4G and so the learning curve was low.... since the galaxy Tab 3 is an Android device as well.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Kandice
Reviews.Content: Love that it is easy to use and my daughter can use it easily to play puzzles. I just wish there was more memory.

Reviews.Title: one happy camper
Reviews.Author: Jesse Trujillo
Reviews.Content: great convenient tool. it is always there when I need it. I will recommend this to a friend. It is just what I needed. I will recommend this to a friend. THANK-YOU

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: DantePR
Reviews.Content: The tablet was deliver on time and on a good box. It was on excellent conditions. The price was relatively good for the season.

Reviews.Title: my son loves it
Reviews.Author: Brenda Nous-simmons "love chi"
Reviews.Content: This is a nive tablet can do so much on it.I recommend it to others. My son is very happy with it .

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped it would be.
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I have been viewing email, web articles, etc on my Samsung phone. I decided I wanted a bigger screen, so bought the tablet. I  looked at Kindles and IPads, but decided I wanted to stay with Samsung. The tablet feels very familiar after using the phone for some time (also have good luck with 3 Samsung TVs.). I got the WiFi version as I can use the Samsung phone as my WiFi hub to the web.. and I always have my phone. Works great. It uses our home wifi when I'm home and the phone when I'm out. Still learning to use various things, but recommend the tablet without reservation.

Reviews.Title: it is everything I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: Linda W
Reviews.Content: My daughter told me this was a great tablet and it will do more than her I pad, so I decided to get one and I am not disappointed, the price was right I did pay postage because I didn't see the space to click for free shipping

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M Yoder
Reviews.Content: looks great, charges very quickly, faster than we thought, downloads and installs without much problem. looking for a case for it, can't find orange in the stores.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Miriannys Beltrana  Velásquez Zabala
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent.At first, I was corcern about the color because the White one is more popular but I love this color!  They give you an originality code which certifies that you are buying a quality product. I recomend it!

Reviews.Title: Rating on Tab 3
Reviews.Author: William R Wilkins
Reviews.Content: High rating - - Clean - - every thing working, but I didn't want to switch to gmail and could not upload my user list from yahoo without. The Tab 3 is not very user friendly on other items. If I had time to read entire user manual, it would have been a keeper.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Angel Sosa Jimenez
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet. Great purchase and prompt service. I am going to get one for my son and definitely recommend it to my friends

Reviews.Title: THANKS
Reviews.Author: MaryE.
Reviews.Content: For personal use, it works as described.  Would recommend for any age, but you must know what to do wit it.

Reviews.Title: Adds storage easily.
Reviews.Author: MARSHA WHEATLEY
Reviews.Content: Great present.  I own the iPad but this fits in my purse and is equally or more useful.  The storage is the bonus.

Reviews.Title: Won't turn back on.
Reviews.Author: Chris Sleigher
Reviews.Content: This product stopped working after about a week. It would not turn on after it a charge. The internet blogs make it look like this is common. So far both Amazon and Samsung have had amazing service to replace or repair this item however.

Reviews.Title: the Samsung galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: brigida ozoria
Reviews.Content: I choose the Samsung galaxy tab 3 because it's faster, smarter and I can get in it what I'm looking for. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tab, our bad luck?
Reviews.Author: WendynSky "WendyP"
Reviews.Content: I'd give this tablet 5 stars, it's pretty in white, light weight, can do SO much (email, apps, Google plus, music, networking..) but unfortunately after 1 week and 2 charges it's sent to Samsung for repair. Glad it's under warranty and upon calling Samsung, they were very accommodating. (I assume charging issues area typical malfunction, quick to diagnose) *Amazon 's price & shipping were amazing of course! (We have 2 Kindle Fires, but my daughter was ready for more memory & to go outside of the box so to speak, adding her Google accounts & having the camera/video also extra storage with the SD card option) But as the #1 gift of the season in my house, I am disappointed to be going without it for 3-4 weeks after only 1 week enjoying it. (And loading it with fun apps from Amazon & Google as well as our daughter's favorite music downloads!) Thank you Amazon, hoping I can update my review when we get this Tab back & add the 5th star...hopeful, I've always been happy with Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but needs an update
Reviews.Author: Shadow
Reviews.Content: The tablet itself is good and very easy to use.  It does what most tablets don't. And the best part is the micro sd card for additional storage.  The only issue is that it didn't have sbeam like the GS4 to make things esier to share and it is very hard to update to the newest version of android.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Bogdan Plesa
Reviews.Content: A good tablet, but more ram memory would have been fine. Otherwise good quality for the price, a great travel companion.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: James22
Reviews.Content: We bought two tablets for our daughters for Christmas.  Each received the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7 inch).  Our daughters are 11 and 9.  It was a perfect gift.  First, the price was very reasonable for a quality product.  They use their tablets each day playing games, skyping with relatives and friends, email, etc.  And what I love most is that they enjoy it.  It was hard to justify buying an ipad for them when the Samsung offers everything for them that an ipad would.  And our experience with all Samsung products has been a good one.

Reviews.Title: Daughters favorite
Reviews.Author: Clare Williams
Reviews.Content: Surprise Christmas gift for 9 year old and she's thrilled! She hasn't put it down yet! Very easy for her to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money!
Reviews.Author: Carlton Joyner
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for my daughter for Christmas, she loved it. The only compaint she had was it took so long for the battery to be fully charged. Other than that no more compaints.

Reviews.Title: Slow compared to iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: Socrates Wep
Reviews.Content: I was using an iPad Mini before trying out this. All I can say is big difference in performance and responsiveness to touch. I'm going to stick to Apple.

Reviews.Title: Operates a lot slower than I thought it would
Reviews.Author: MamaofIII
Reviews.Content: Right off the bat it didn't charge when I plugged it in. Seems like I always have to double & triple check when I plug it in. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Next I was disappointed in how slowly it operates with the internet. I guess I'm spoiled to my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Gregorio
Reviews.Content: excellent productis for my personal use I am very happy to get this article sending was excellent to deal with Venezuela always attentive seller everything perfect charm me when I gave all the excellent sealing I'm very happy

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Ramiro Martinez
Reviews.Content: i liked everything about this tablet, it is very nice for the kids that like playing games & apps. thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the money
Reviews.Author: Get-A-Geek
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. This is a great tablet for the price. The screen does NOT have as good of resolution as the Nexus 7 Gen 1, but it does have the SD slot which imho needed for a device such as this, which will be used for Music and Videos. I found the gui responsive, and once again a great value for the price if found this on sale for $139.00

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, handy size
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mom for Christmas as an alternative to replacing her MP3 player. For the price, it seemed like a waste to buy another MP3 player when she could have a mini tablet which can still fit in her bag but does everything her HP Touchpad does. She's very happy with it. The price was $159 when I purchased it. I have the 10.1 inch Galaxy Tab 2, which I love, but I considered purchasing one of these for myself as well because of the handy size. I also have an S4 phone so I'm a fan of Samsung. I wished I had purchased one for my mother-in-law instead of the Kindle, which has no camera, no memory card slot and very limited apps.I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung did great.
Reviews.Author: edward
Reviews.Content: Ok so before i owned a ipad 2 i gave it to my siste4 because i didnt like it. Nd i just bought the samsung tab 3 nd its so awsome! I really like it. (Note when first getting this tab update the tab there will be about 5) alot of ppl never update there stuff nd leave poor reviews for the bugs etc. It really made a difference. I can use all my favorite apps. Nd i own a samsung galaxy s3 nd i love my phone so now i have a bigger version haha. Internet is a bit slow but not enough to hate it over all i really like it nd i have been on it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: KSCANT
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it. She says it is so easy to use. Coming from a 6 year old that is saying something.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ktowndiva "Isadabomb"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 19 year old daughter. I wasn't sure if she'd even be interested in it. But, to my suprise, she loves it. The only downside to it is all of the bloat wear Samsung adds to their phones and tablets. But, if you like Samsung phones, you'll love the Galaxy tablet!

Reviews.Title: Pleased costomer
Reviews.Author: Joel B.
Reviews.Content: WE love it just like every body ,I must keep a watch full eye on it .However I told the admirers where they can purchase any amount they want .Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Delicate screen but solid tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: If you're a fan of the phone you'll be quite impressed with the tablet. It may look small but it's quite impressive and the load time isn't bad at all. The downside is the screen. If you're clumsy and drop things a lot the screen will shatter if dropped so get the extended warranty and a case that's sturdy and will protect the screen.

Reviews.Title: micro sd card
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: The only thing I do not like about this is about the option of putting in a micro SD card to add more GBs to the Tablet. The Tablet doesn't allow you to transfer apps onto the micro SD card at all. Now I have a 32 gb micro SD card with nothing to put on it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Andy Whipp
Reviews.Content: Good LiTtle tablet Only Compliant I Can Think Of Would Be The Camera Doesn't Have A FLash. Would Buy Samsung Again.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Great buy, it came new and works like a dream. My husband loves it and he carries it around every where he goes.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: arrive in perfect condition. this product is perfect. pleased. I do not even handle lack of knowledge but equally this very cool

Reviews.Title: was gift .
Reviews.Author: John Carter
Reviews.Content: The receiver of this gift was happy with it. is still adding new apps and games, also enjoys the two camera angles.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Scott Whitfield
Reviews.Content: Solid, affordable tablet.  Gave as a gift for Xmas, and family member was very happy with it.  Would suggest to others.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mb"
Reviews.Content: I'm a Apple user that is being converted to Samsung.  Family got the phones so I decided to try out this tablet.  I really like it and will be adding a galaxy phone to go with it soon.Pros:  Bigger; nuff said.  Really like the homescreens and especially the "widgets" that have active content on them,  unlike just the icons only like Apple does.  Plus the Google Play store (read: Apple App store) gives away free stuff!Cons: Well, it could be bigger.  The screen seems to attract lint and junk. Wish I could change the volume on the screen instead of having to do it with the buttons on the side.

Reviews.Title: its out of date with new icecream update
Reviews.Author: Brandie Hootsell
Reviews.Content: So slow I cannot type without words mixing up or letters missing, internet connection...beyond slow.  I wish i could return this. Disappointed as a samsung household and samsung galaxy S3 user,

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Terresa Morales "Terresa Morales"
Reviews.Content: My wonderful husband got me this for Christmas.  It was everything I expected and more.This is an outstanding tablet that does everything it promises and so far so good. Thank you baby for giving me the best Christmas gift ever!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this for my sister for christmas....she screamed when she opened it and its serving her well. My only problem was the lovely free shipping was via fedex ground and it took forever to get to Texas.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ana Bustamante "Cocolita"
Reviews.Content: Samsung definitely is at the forefront in technology and each device shows better and better, i love samsung and is a necessary tool and perfect work.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet for entry-level and experienced users
Reviews.Author: Johann Phillips
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom who isn't very tech savvy, hoping that it would be intuitive and encourage her to use digital devices and make her life a little bit easier. She's been using it for a couple of weeks now and loving it so far. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Cory D
Reviews.Content: Bought his for my daunghter for Christmas. She loves it. Samsung is the way to go if you cant afford a Apple tablet. Very please with the speed, weight, display, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great value and ease of use for a tablet
Reviews.Author: Marie Wujek
Reviews.Content: Great value and ease of use for this tablet, was given as a gift and the receiver loved the gift.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet value
Reviews.Author: jeb421
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet for the money.  It does what I want from this type of device. If you are a techie and get real deep into tablet technology this may be below what you are used to but for a inexpensive tablet for general usage this has been excellent.

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy
Reviews.Author: Terry W Adams
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected and at a great price.  Least expensive one I found with a gps also.  would recommend and have recommended this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Product Rating
Reviews.Author: Stephen P.
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered in a timely manner and I as satisfied with it as whatever was displayed was what I got. The equipment works perfectly, can't complin however, the price has gone up too high so I cannot purchse another now but would like another because I'm highly satified with what I received.

Reviews.Title: would have gave 5 stars...problem here..
Reviews.Author: Il  Scalia
Reviews.Content: Tablet tethers to my cell, and it is rocket fast on the web.  Overall?  For under 200 bucks delivered  to my door not bad!!  2 weeks into use...HUGE  problem...the headphone jack went silent...started making a clicking sound only...now no sound!!  A common problem with the product based on my research.  You can go to wireless headphones...but me personally...I like hard wire so...I guess more EMF for my brain.?Positives:  No lag in key strokes, price is good... I like Samsung personally, graphics are clean, have'nt experienced pixilated screen with streaming video, size is perfect, SD card slot, more freedom than Apple products.  Again, you get your money's worth with Samsung.Negatives:  I believe a common manufacturing error has occurred with the headphone jack, as it started right out of the box and progressed to clicking alternating with working fine to now no audio at all from headphone jack.  Camera is not up to par with most Samsung cell phones from the same generation.I  will stay with the Samsung tablet due to freedom of controlling data etc...hopefully the next gen tab has a better camera megapixel like the S4...AND the headphone jack manufacture improves.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: 1MRZA
Reviews.Content: My husband truly loves his tablet.  He does not put it down. No complaints here. Good investment. We acutally compared this product before buying it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my niece.
Reviews.Author: Fred J Cannon
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece and as such I am unable to personally attest to the functionality of this tablet or how it compares to others.  All I can say is that 2 weeks after Christmas my niece is still thrilled with this gift and thanks me profusely for it every time I see her.  I didn't know at the time when I purchased it that she is a fan of Samsung and already has a Galaxy phone, so I got really lucky there.  She is a bit more tech savvy than I am, so based on her pleasure and enjoyment of this product I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A gift that went over well
Reviews.Author: Bob Wallace
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this tablet and if she is happy with it, I am very happy.  Can do e-mail, Facebook and it has voice recognition to find web-sites. Easy to use and set up and a good value.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Discover
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet for my wife and she loves it.  She had a knook tablet that is now a forgotten item.  This tablet makes up all the things that were missing on her other tablet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: kadene kirlew
Reviews.Content: This product exceeded my expectation, super phenomenal,loving it !I would definitely recommend this product to any one who is always on the go.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CHRISTMAS GIFT
Reviews.Author: Michelle Reimers
Reviews.Content: my son in law chose it. And my granddaughter was so happy, she was speechless which is worth more than the weight of gold.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with my tablet
Reviews.Author: lewis g webb
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet  l enjoy  I can't do anything with it  is make my day  I like the color of it

Reviews.Title: So light and fits in my purse
Reviews.Author: merrygumbo "merrygumbo"
Reviews.Content: I really like the convenience and light weight of this tablet. It does everything my big one does but in a carry it with you package.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Grand kids loved them. Best on market!!! Ages 9,18&19. They can do anything on them.they love all their games,texting and portability. Great product!

Reviews.Title: great multipurpose tablet
Reviews.Author: 1MTgasman
Reviews.Content: This is a great multipurpose tablet that is perfect for reading ebooks, streaming videos, searching the internet or playing games for the kids. Screen is good resolution and camera works pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up. Display is clear and easy to read.
Reviews.Author: Susan DeVore
Reviews.Content: The Gallaxy Tab 3 was very easy to set up. Repsonse time to internet is very fast and the display is clear and very easy to read.The 7" is a nice size. Easy to handle and fits in a purse or brief case very well.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: returned  it  was advertised to have usb port  It did not. Very hard to operate  user manual 146 pages spoke mainly to cell phone not tablet Purchase google nenum and it is a great tablet  Manual clear and easy to use but  cost about $40 more got it on sale at officemax  for $215 the 32 bit verson  Ted

Reviews.Title: Tab 3 So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: No complaints thus far. The item came as expected. It's been weeks and no issues with it. Good purchase. Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Trina Borja
Reviews.Content: Almost everything is great about this tablet except that it is noticeably slower than the Ipad mini. This is a great organizer but now so great to use as a browser on internet.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: I got it for my daughter and it is great. She loves the camera and video. It swipes good, and is very clear. I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Met every expectation
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Goyení
Reviews.Content: It's not the most powerfull tablet in the market, but it's a very good model.Very easy to use and complete, perfect for most users.Nice design with smooth curves that makes it look awesome. Good improvement since last model.

Reviews.Title: Just O.K
Reviews.Author: Aristides Nuï¿½ez Rivero
Reviews.Content: After trying other tablets from the same budget as Lenovo pad, find the SGT 3 a little bit slower with the same applications.Also it gets warm just watching videos and the screen resolution is not according to nowadays standards...(Have to say that this was already known before I got it)For the price is O.K, specially if all you want to do is checking your email or social media without usin your laptop or pc.

Reviews.Title: Love for the tablet
Reviews.Author: Travonda Vaughn
Reviews.Content: My child have not put this tablet down yet.  It sleeps right beside her.  Lol. I made a good choice with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tablet
Reviews.Author: Terry Robitaille
Reviews.Content: Its a wonderful tablet. Perfect size and easy too carry. Easy too use I would recommend it too family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, Gold-Brown)
Reviews.Author: kirkhen
Reviews.Content: everything i want, this tab is fast and sleek. resolution is great camera is good, the feel is very good, its worth way more than i paid for it.

Reviews.Title: I was leary...
Reviews.Author: Tah
Reviews.Content: But this turned out to be a great family purchase for just goofing around, playing game apps and watching Netflix or YouTube. Not super duper fast but it's no snail either. It doesn't lag much that I can tell. The expandable memory is nice. It's perfect size! It arrived when it was supposed to with no known issues as of now. :)

Reviews.Title: Get it!!! Get it!!!! Get it!!!
Reviews.Author: Dwayne Green
Reviews.Content: Awesome.... I brought my kid this tablet and all I can tell you that it works great and also I received product with no issues. I really mean no issues as all. No issues with any of the software. I am thinking of getting the 10.1 size for myself from this is same item provider.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet that can do it all
Reviews.Author: Naomy Villalvazo
Reviews.Content: This tablet made a great christmas gift. Recommend buying a case or rubber cover to protect it from accidental dropping. I have seen many of these tablets have the glass screen cracked and it does not look nice. Highly recommend this tablet because it is a good brand and the tablet can keep a child entertained for hours.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: tani
Reviews.Content: This is a good product with good quality. The price a little expensive confronting with China tablets with same parameters.

Reviews.Title: Easy handheld multi purpose social device
Reviews.Author: M. Mathews
Reviews.Content: Samsung tablet is versatile, user friendly and fully functional out of the box. Most of what I needed was pre-installed or easily configured. Setup wi-fi and I was good to go. Calendar, voice to text, alarm, browser, google apps, I've got all I need to stay informed and connected.

Reviews.Title: excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Excellent relation cost-benefits, it's very thin andThe screen is very bright, the proccesor speed is not bad bat it could be better

Reviews.Title: Excellent device to have
Reviews.Author: Beth Aldridge
Reviews.Content: It's excellent it's dependable it's awesome. Could not ask for anything better. I've really enjoyed it.very very nice to own.

Reviews.Title: Love my tablet
Reviews.Author: shatsi
Reviews.Content: I have had it since mid December and have been so happy with it! The size, color and weight are excellent to fit in my purse and travel with no complaints or problems. Easy to pack and go.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Trecy Sutton
Reviews.Content: These were a Christmas gift for my boys ages 8 and 10. After reading reviews on several tablets after many months I finally settled on the Samsung Galaxy and I am happy with my purchase.  They loved the tablet and it has so many apps. Runs great. And the price was awesome.  Thanks for everyone else's detailed reviews, you made my choice easy. I'm thinking of buying the larger one, same brand, for myself.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: GLENYS UMBRIA
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for: a lightweight tablet that is very easy to hold in one hand comfortably and you want a basic and easy to use tablet, then consider this is your tablet

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: DANIELA A MARQUEZ V
Reviews.Content: So far, so good! Its great for traveling and staying conected. I can do everything I do from my PC. I rate it 4 because i would like it to be a little faster when i need de keyboard. For 150$ it's GREAT!

Reviews.Title: grate
Reviews.Author: love to hunt
Reviews.Content: Our family now has three of this and love them they are great for all of your books, record keeping, calendaring and so much more I don't even know what all it can do. The kids are better at it than I am.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: monica olson
Reviews.Content: I got really frustrated with this tablet and I threw it up against a wall, and now it's working... Lol didn't break. 5 stars just for that

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Daniel Felipe Tobon
Reviews.Content: Works very well, fast and never have a bug. long battery and run all kinds of apps, im so happy with this one

Reviews.Title: Totally love
Reviews.Author: Angel "Rose"
Reviews.Content: Have been researching tabs and I totally love this tab, I am awaiting the 64 gb micros sd card I ordererd . I can take all medical stuff with me to dr once I scan them.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Leticia Garcia
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use for my 7 year old daughter and so convenient! It's a really good tablet I highly recomended to anybody!! It's great! I love it and my daughter love it too!!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: larry williams
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet it is great.I would recommend it to anyone that wants a tablet that does cost a arm and leg..

Reviews.Title: excelent device
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: I really like it easy to carry up and all things do i need to do are in this Device, fasly to use

Reviews.Title: very stylish
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: It's a Christmas gift for my wife. It's very neat and allows her to leave her laptop at home. So far, absolutely no problems. Exceeded our expectation!.

Reviews.Title: Not a great tablet
Reviews.Author: E.S.
Reviews.Content: This tablet is noticeably slower than the Nexus 7 (first generation) and the extra Samsung software is redundant and confusing.

Reviews.Title: My Constant Companion, Samsung Galaxy Tab 3,~zero complaints...
Reviews.Author: Seeo
Reviews.Content: Outstanding portable electronic device. I'm writing a book and my husband & I travel alot. Tired of carrying my laptop around and the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 seemed to be the perfect little investment. Whenever and wherever I get ideas I can pull my tablet out of my purse and write down things I need to remember. Love the various applications that can be downloaded from the Google store for free or at a low cost. I can watch movies, read my e-books, download favorite rock tunes, do my banking, shop at all my favorite stores and even read our Church's Bible lessons on my Samsung. Convenient and worth the small cost. I love that it synch's with my samsung phone and my desktop pc. As a reviewer for a number of websites I can do my assignments while on vacation in my extra time rather than wait til I get home to complete with worry of not making deadlines. Also love all the space for contact numbers and addresses. I've bought three tablets in the past that I was not happy with, this one is staying with me. Highly recommend~

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amy L. Clements "h2hfan"
Reviews.Content: awesome little table. its smaller than my ipad mini so it definitely gets a plus for that. also its easy to travel with. love it,love it, love it.

Reviews.Title: my opinion
Reviews.Author: Raquel Flores
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and it works great for some reason the tablet has froze twice but over all its a good tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: diva
Reviews.Content: I live in the Caribbean and the prices for the tab 3 are really expensive.  And my neice wanted one so bad. I decided to browse through amazon.  And guess what the prices were phenomenal.  I must have one for myself. In my country they hike up the price for every thing simple thing as color. But with Amazon the sellers are more considerate.  This is a great product at a bargain price.  A must have.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Debra Campbell
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my father.  I have one just like it. He absolutely loves it. It's easy to use and the perfect size for his needs.

Reviews.Title: Fast Shipping
Reviews.Author: By Atomika92
Reviews.Content: Got it for my girlfriend and she loves it, i would purchase another it's very sturdy the quality is great and shipping was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price but you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: I definitely enjoy this tablet and the practical apps I use on it. However when it comes to video quality and fun apps that require video its very laggy and produces poor, low quality video and its also hard to get good lighting with the video camera. Also browsing the internet on this(Chrome, Google search bar) is very laggy and at times unresponsive. If you are using this tablet simply for practical apps that you would use daily such as banking, weather, stocks, Instagram, Facebook, pinterest etc. it performs fine in that department. When it comes to apps that would require using the video camera or camera for much detail (keep in mind the camera on this tablet does allow you to focus on one object) I would definitely go with a different tablet. But since I am not too invested in a camera on my tablet, I'm not too upset about it. overall, I am satisfied with my purchase but just had a few complaints.

Reviews.Title: Samsung, never disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dara
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great. Only wish I could have afforded a bigger screen version, and  I think it should come standard with a screen saver already on it . I bought my kid a Dell and it came with one already on it, perfectlyperhaps tablet makers can either follow suit or make it an option. An option that they could charge an additional, nominal fee, of courseaside from that I'm very well pleased with this tablet. It does all I need and more. Always been a Samsung fan.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: T in Texas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet fr my son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. Very easy to use and works beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Love this and love Samsung
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  We bought it for my eight year old son after purchasing the Samsung Galaxy II last year.  This size is great for a child and I even borrow it from him sometimes.  He can store music on it and play tons of games from Google Play Store.  I would recommend purchasing a case to protect this.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Samuel Petrone
Reviews.Content: I wanted something to watch netflix and to mess around with on the go but nothing to fancy or too big. this is perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Agustin Salazar
Reviews.Content: I bougth it as a present for my sister and she really love it.  for the price is a very good purchase

Reviews.Title: Got it for my six year old
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Kostecki
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old daughter got it for Christmas. I love it. So easy for her to use and just the right size for a little one. I only wish there were more parental controls built in, but overall it works well for playing apps and watching videos

Reviews.Title: PERFECT TABLET!!!
Reviews.Author: Raul E. Cardenas "Raul Cardenas"
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate, great for videos which and the internet!!  I highly recommend this device to anyone looking for an easy tablet to operate.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: LNJKIDS
Reviews.Content: The screen is a  bit small at times but better than the larger 10".  Overall a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Patricia McCormick
Reviews.Content: I had a Galaxy Tab2 but left it in a taxi and was lost without it. I was so happy to get the #3, and the best thing about it is that the connector has been changed so that it is the same as my Sony camera and my Motorola phone! No more having all those wires lying around.

Reviews.Title: Bought for teenage son for Xmas
Reviews.Author: Trisha Lea
Reviews.Content: The shipping time exceeded my expectation! The Samsung tablet preforms well and looks great! My son loves it. It was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift but my boss at work has one. It is slim and very portable. The screen has great resolution. It takes pretty good pictures and they are easy to send/download. Easy connectivity to wifi.

Reviews.Title: good for now
Reviews.Author: Harmony & Rachel
Reviews.Content: Works goid, not as fast as I thought it would be and the pictures aren't the best, I expected more than I got. Although it does what I need it to for now. I had a sony Xperia worked so much better than this so does the kindle fire hdx not to impressed with this tablet more hyped up than it turned out to be worth unfortunately.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Tonya Hayes
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my husband for Christmas and it was just what he wanted! It's small enough to take anywhere and it gives him everything he needs and then some. I really liked the gold - brown color as well. It was nice to have a choice other than black or white.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: DIANA LOZANO
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture on tab. would recommend to all. very chic. I got the gold brown tab. Look's nice. So glad I got this. works great too.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet and Price
Reviews.Author: KATENJ
Reviews.Content: Best price around!  Nice tablet for excellent price.  Love Cyber Monday and Amazon.  Still haven't found a better price even with after Christmas sales.

Reviews.Title: It is what my little boy expected.
Reviews.Author: Jayra
Reviews.Content: I am not a technology fanatic but it does what we expected to do. My son is happy and I am happy because we have bought all the learning games that helps him for school.

Reviews.Title: battery
Reviews.Author: Aurelia Ramirez
Reviews.Content: the tablet it self is good but the battery life no so. have to charged the tablet twice a day

Reviews.Title: HUGE hit!
Reviews.Author: ITS "Its"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my son for Christmas!  I worried that the 7 inch might be too small, but he says it is just the right size for his busy graduate student lifestyle.  Not as bulky as some Tablets can be.  We added a leather case with a wireless keyboard to complete the gift.  He couldn't be happier.  It's fast, it's efficient, it has a lot of features.  Couldn't be happier with this purchase.  Well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tablet
Reviews.Author: booboobear
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, I guess she likes it, bigger to see than an Iphone so she can play her games and other stuff on the web.  Is another learning curve again for her, but she likes it.Seems like it has a lag in the time to bring up the next window, but for the price of the tablet, it is a pretty good deal.Wish there was a way to increase the 8 gb memory in it, yes you can put a chip in it on the side to increase the memory for the pictures, music and other stuff.  Don't know how much apps you can put in it with the 8 gb memory.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend going with faster processor and spending the extra $100. The tablet continues to lock up and crash when trying to use the GPS and Google maps

Reviews.Title: so easy to use
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: works great. just like my Samsung phone. very easy for even a beginner tablet user. son is very happy to be high-tech.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tab 3
Reviews.Author: LATOYA SMITH
Reviews.Content: I love it works perfect, my seven year old son is enjoying the various apps and I found them interesting and enjoying.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: deena
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Bought it as a Christmas gift for my son.  It has beautiful graphics on it's crystal clear screen and it super fast!  Perfect for gaming and internet browsing.  Would definitely recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with mySamsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Harold L. Weaver
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to learn to operate the Galaxy Tab 3 It is also very handy to have the information close at hand and in such a small Package

Reviews.Title: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER... Defective item!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Luvian
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my husband because I own the same one. I have already had to return it once and am going to do so again for the second time. There is a defective spot on the screen that is very visible. I want this tablet but it's becoming rather inconvenient for us to return the same item AGAIN! Am I the only one that one that received a defective item from this seller????

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Dawn Barnhart
Reviews.Content: it was what I expected so I am happy it was a xmas gift got it to be rebrised by a chartiey organization for my sister who has downs

Reviews.Title: Homerun Christmas present for my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: RICK SLAGLE
Reviews.Content: Our 11yr old granddaughter has hardly put it down. The 8g internal and with external storage is sufficient for her games and creativity apps.The Tab 3 7-inch is the perfect size for adult or child. I have a Galaxy S4 phone and while setting up some of the tablet apps I decided I'll be getting one for me. It's easy to hold and the larger screen is great of course.

Reviews.Title: Great tablets
Reviews.Author: Deanna Crump
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic tablet.  Got one for each of my pre-teen and teen grandsons and they all love them.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: Michelle Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Bought the 7" for my 7 yr old and she loves it.Easy for her to carry around (of coarse with protective cover). Also itis easy to use. I got her the white and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brown
Reviews.Content: Especially for the price, this tablet is everything I was hoping for. I had bought cheaper tablets in the past, and kept my fingers crossed that this one wouldn't be like the others. It does everything! Lightweight. The battery lasts quite a while. All apps work. The sound is great. The two way camera is am awesome feature and the pics are decent! GooglePlay is awesome...my daughter has all the music, books, and games she's looking for. Only drawback is you definately need to get an external memory card. Not really a drawback against the tablet and it's features, but if you want to store games and movies and such, I def recommend upping the memory. I would HIGHLY reommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Nice unit!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Hood
Reviews.Content: I'll say this little tablet does a great job. My 9 yr old has never been happier with a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Another great Samsung product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Just about every Android product that I have owned has been a Samsung.  Love their products and sleek styles.  I could not ask for a better product.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy tablet 3
Reviews.Author: Marlon Gooden
Reviews.Content: Great product got it in time for Christmas it's small and handy easy to use for adults n kids alike

Reviews.Title: The most useful I ever had!
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: It is beautiful. Full of tools, easy to work with, the screan resolution is the best I've seen. It is light and what I really wanted to have. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: This Tablet Rocks! The only complaint I have is that I can't watch Amazon instant prime videos. But all in all is a good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I Love this tablet is awesome! Is a little slow but is okay. If u are looking for something that is not to fast then this is okay.

Reviews.Title: Good gift
Reviews.Author: Travis Nevels
Reviews.Content: Camera quality isn't the best but it works great and my parents loved it. Great tablet for a first timer.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Anish
Reviews.Content: Good Product...nice sound and the screen clarity is very good..dont much expect for high graphics games but you can play many good games.

Reviews.Title: Meets all our expectations and then some!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Serex
Reviews.Content: We are still learning about all the capabilties that the Galaxy has. We can turn on and off our televisions with it, as well as surf the Internet and keep up with email.

Reviews.Title: Great present for my son
Reviews.Author: Nilda Martinez
Reviews.Content: Just great! My son loved it. Loves how fast it is, movies are clear, and battery life is greatest thing.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: We chose this tablet for my daughter because we had similiar phones and she knew how to work them already. She has loved it and I have used it several times myself. Battery life is good as well. Highly recommend this tablet if your looking for something small.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Ronny Nieto Pasquel
Reviews.Content: Very good article, fulfilled the expectations of purchase. One is to install programs and enjoy the tablet with my family. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael oconnor
Reviews.Content: Tab 3 7 inch works well. Bluetooth and wifi work great. Battery life is good also. The tablet is a little slower than s4 phone but when connected to a good wifi  its hardly noticeable.  Battery charge is a little slow but no big deal. My 5 year old has not put it down sense she got it for x mas. Wish the apps could be stored on sd card. 8 gb of internal storage fills up fast. Got all her favorite movies on sd card for her to watch. Great starter tablet. If you're a novice I suggest spend a little more money on a different tablet.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is amazing
Reviews.Author: Paola
Reviews.Content: This tablet is according to the wished is very nice . I bought this tablet for my children and they are very happy

Reviews.Title: Good table, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: KHY
Reviews.Content: Good size table which you can put in your pocket easily,  with Sd card capabilities and reasonable price. Great battery life

Reviews.Title: Very good device
Reviews.Author: Thomas Franks
Reviews.Content: Very good price from Amazon. The lowest I have seen for this tablet.The processor seems a little slow and the memory could be boosted but everything was as I expected.

Reviews.Title: Same thing as IPad so get it
Reviews.Author: Tranaya Walker
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my 7 year old son that's into the apple products. Since I'm a single mother I can't afford the iPad. This tablet does everything maybe more then iPad he downloads apps to make voice calls a lot of education games. It's affordable and he says it's better then iPad.

Reviews.Title: did not live up to its name
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: Samsung always has good products but i think this is below their standards for what I paid.  Yes this is my first table but I expected a flash on the camera and video because i  planned to take plenty of pictures and record the kids.  This is a big problem for me.  Other than the camera the rest of the tablet is cool, pre-loaded apps are great, size is great.  Still debating on sending it back.  I think I rather use my laptop for surfing, maybe buy a new digital camera and continue to use my cell for internet.

Reviews.Title: It is Great
Reviews.Author: nilantha Jayathilake
Reviews.Content: I love it, it gave me the expected value for me. I'm using it mostly for Skype calls and social media.

Reviews.Title: Much better than the Tagital Tablet!
Reviews.Author: thenursemommy
Reviews.Content: Much better performance than the generic tablets. We had bought the Tagital generic tablet for $90 thinking it would be sufficient for our 6 year old son but we were wrong. We returned it to Amazon, spent a little bit more money and we're very pleased with this Samsung tablet!

Reviews.Title: Its Great
Reviews.Author: Marista McKain
Reviews.Content: I have a Galaxy S3 mini and it is similar in style and function with a bigger screen and a few more perks. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Mother of 9
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son, who likes to check NFL scores while he's watching football.  It has a nice clear display and hooked up to our wireless network easily.  The price was good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I received this from my husband for Christmas to replace my Kindle HD that I loved but thought it wasn't comfortable to hold when reading in bed. This has made me totally happy since I have so many Samsung products because I believe they are the best and put Apple products to shame so I am thrilled to have this to add to my collection. I did have the problem at first with connecting to my home network but after doing the update as I had read about online it has been working perfectly. The screen is awesome so it makes everything much easier to read and enjoy pictures of mine or online in websites. I highly recommend this to anyone in the market for a small tablet and for the price you can't go wrong. But I also recommend anyone looking for a cell phone with the most awesome picture quality that you check out Samsung Galaxy Note 3 because it is by far untouchable. Thank you Amazon for all that you do for your customers.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Thing
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I was looking at quite a few 10.1" Android Tablets under the $250 mark but left a 7-8" option open if I found a decent one . I couldn't pass up $149.00 shipped , using Prime . I have a Samsung Centura phone so I was easily familiar with the operating system and functions . Out of the box this tablet is awesome and does the things I want it to do . It's lightweight , battery life is pretty damn good around the 8/hr. mark depending on applications running and usage . It charges quickly like most Samsung products and comes with a nice Samsung-branded charger .The only thing I wish it had , is the Multi-Window feature found in the Samsung Tab3 8" and possibly the 5MP rear Camera of the 8" , since this one is only 3MP . I think a fair competitor would be the ASUS Google Nexus 7" which has a NVIDIA Tegra 3 quad-core processor and is priced in the same range . I am very happy and would definitely recommend this Tablet to first-time users and those wanting something smaller but very capable .

Reviews.Title: Good starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer

I also bought a 64 gig card with it, so I can load it up with movies and games for him. (I have a program that downscales DVD's for mobile devices on my PC, so all the movies are free for us). I'll put some music on there for him also, all from my own collection. All sorts of free games he loves off of the Android Google Play marketplace. Plus, I can get him all sorts of childrens books that he'll have more fun reading on here than an actual real book. And lots of interactive books, which he loves. I totally recommend this tablet for kids. Just buy a decent case for it, and a screen protector, or take it to one of those cell phone accessory stores and have them put a screen protector on it.

Reviews.Title: Slow and Antiquated.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H.
Reviews.Content: I was shocked to find that this tablet is unable to play Netflix movies. As a tablet that is advertised as a device to be used for "watching the latest movies and TV shows, reading digital books, playing games, and more," one might expect that it would be capable of using the most popular/well-known/highly-used movie streaming service in the world. I didn't check if this device had a Netflix app before buying because I honestly didn't consider the possibility that ANY tablet at this point would be sold without it. In addition, I found the OS for this tablet to be quite slow, and it took a rather long time to load any webpages or attempt to download anything. I tried it on several different wifi networks available to me just to be sure that it wasn't my home wifi - it was slow no matter what. I am returning this and buying an iPad, which I should've just shelled the extra money out for in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Great beater tablet.  Does most jobs well.
Reviews.Author: B. Ginkel "bilobaman"
Reviews.Content: First of all, this is a decent tab.  I like it for what I use it for.  Value wise, it is a 'great success.'  I use it as my car navigation/radio device.  First thing I did was root it (XDA developers is AWESOME).  I left the stock rom on there, but needed root access for the Tasker app to be able to do all the things I wanted it to do.  I use an Akron dash holder to keep it mounted in my car.  When I power on the car, it boots Pandora, Waze, and other apps I want open while driving.  This thing spends 98% of it's time on my dash.  It does all these tasks admirably.  I have no idea how well it will do in the Utah summer heat though.  This is the WiFi model, I use WiFi hotspot from my phone for data while driving.Pros:- Bright screen with decent resolution- Battery life is quite long (even though it is always plugged in while driving)- It's Android rooted, so you can do whatever you want if you know what you are doing- Audio is sufficiently loud (I normally have the headphones plugged in to my aux while driving but sound is good)Cons:- Doesn't do great in the cold, even though I can't expect that; if it's cold, prepare for cold warnings and no charging, sluggish LCD refresh.- Menu/Back buttons don't light up on this 7" model, sucks when night driving while trying to use it- Camera might as well not even be there, it has terrible resolution and horrible color.  Don't plan on using it for any reason.Overall, for a dash rider, it rocks.  Using Waze, Torque app for car data, Pandora or whatever music app you like, and Tasker seals the whole deal.  This app has a medium learning curve, but once you master it, you can make you phone do just about whatever you can imagine automatically.  8/10 would buy again.  Good for kids too at home with the WiFi.  If it breaks, oh well.  Not $500 bucks down the drain like an Ipad if it gets broken.  This thing has 200% more VALUE dollar for dollar over the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Wish Samsung would add a light for the camera back onto the tablets
Reviews.Author: Robin C.
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my mother for Christmas.  Perfect for her.Considered getting one for my husband but realized they no longer put a light for the camera like my original Galaxy 10.1 when they first came out.They only tablet out there with a light is the Note3 10.1 ... but I would prefer a light on the smaller 7 inch version. It is a much better size for carrying with you while travelling and therefore better to have on hand for picture taking.My new S4 takes great pictures, but sometimes I like to have something a little bigger ... I am a huge photo nut and this is important to me... in fact I know of 3 others that actually bought and returned solely due to the lack of a light for the camera.Also a little slow on the processing speed.Samsung just needs to add a light and increase processing speed and it would be a perfect tablet.That being said, perfect for the newbies or people that don't live on their electronics...like my mother :)
