Reviews.Title: Everything MOST people need in a tablet.
Reviews.Author: M. Perry "M Perry"
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet as a gift, and as a proud owner of a galaxy phone, I like how both devices operate similarly. I know the phone is a higher end device in regards to resolution and raw power, but this tablet does everything I need it to, and much more. I like the build of galaxy devices, and this tablet is no exception. The screen is sharp and colors accurate. I noticed that the resolution is not on par with a lot of the new tablets, but the screen is still very clear and easy on the eyes. For the price, you really cant complain. Everything looks great on this tablet, and all the negative reviews you read are from really critical people. There is always something better out there in terms of specs, and you can drive yourself crazy comparing devices. Ibreally haveca hard time putting this tablet down, and I enjoy its performance. I use it primarily to web surf, shop onlinr, control my home theater, and basic tasks and it does them admirably,  with little lag. This is a great little tab, and am grateful to own it. Also, if you have a samsung smart tv...it integrates well with it. I consider myself a slight techie and this is a more than capable tablet except for maybe the most demanding games. If you use it for the basics and light gaming. Pick one up!!

Reviews.Title: I wanted to give it 4 and a half but my tablet wouldn't let me
Reviews.Author: random
Reviews.Content: So its a very good tablet in my opinion the keyboard is ugly though so installed a new one. It runs apps like modern combat with minor not at utters but little lag. My major complaint is this probably has happened to u with it maybe. So if your date on the tablet is wrong like now its the 27th but on my tablet it said the 31st. If u don't have the right date stuff will go slow and your internet will work but it will ask u to check the certificate every time. Also the YouTube app and amazon app won't work. So make sure its on the right date. All in all I love it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Great price and does all that you need. Yes, there's no Microsoft Office programs or Windows but that makes it better. Less chances for programs to freeze. Its literally an oversized smart phone less the capabilities of making a phone call. If you are familiar with Android devices, then this is a very easy transition. Amazingly easy to work with, intuitive in the way you would want. I would recommend getting an extra memory card otherwise this thing rocks. Programs/apps open with ease and there's no lag time as it should be. A little heavy so laying on your back and balancing may be an issue but otherwise its a mean machine.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good - (Revised my review after more use and  research.)
Reviews.Author: bobn
Reviews.Content: UPDATE:  I've now used the tablet and it's pretty good - rating upgraded.  It seems to work fine for everything I've used it for.  The problem noted below (Linux/USB Mass storage) turns out to be Android 4.x related, not just Samsung.  Newer Linuxes have MTP drivers that make it useable, at least in Nautilus.  Based on all this, rating upgraded.OLDER:I have not used the tablet yet.  But I found this out when I went to copy files:  LINUX Users beware - you cannot connect this to your Linux machine and transfer files!  The phone has Windows-only drivers on it, so you can (usually) connect it to Windows and transfer files.  Extra software is required on a Mac.  Stock Android does USB mass storage by default in my experience.  I am seriously disappointed, though I will probably end up keeping it, as I have promised it to someone for Christmas and I don't have time to do a swap.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Rocks! Loving the Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Mimi R-Y
Reviews.Content: Amazon Rocks!!! I originally ordered the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 and when it was delivered, the packaged was open and the seal on android box was broken. Appears as if the tablet was damaged but Amazon was great in sending a new item at no additional charge. I was very pleased in how easy the return process was as this was my first time sending a device back. I love the Galaxy tab 3 and it goes well with my Samsung Galaxy S 3 Phone. The Tablet has a beautiful bright 7 inch screen making the handheld experience comfortable. It can fit nicely in my purse. It is easy and simple to set up and use. I ordered the 16 gig because that is all I need for books, music and pictures storage. I love the camera that is front faced too. It is WiFi capable and I am not obligated to sign up with any carrier. I have a kindle but brought this tablet for more extended fun use where I am able to access documents on cloud apps for handling business or school. The camera feature is nice since a IPad was out of the question for me no matter what deal was available. I love Samsung products in their lap top, camera, phone and now I have the tablet. The white color with silver trim is very nice than the normal black color devices out there. I am a satisfied customer. I buy from Amazon on a regular. Both was a gift to myself for Christmas & upcoming Birthday! I hope the basic info helps as I have not used it very long to make an extensive review. Thank you.-MRY

Reviews.Author: Zarah25
Reviews.Content: Came on time and was in very good condition. I love it. Works just like your android phone. Looks just like my Samsung note when I'm on it except bigger.

Reviews.Title: successful acquisition
Reviews.Author: Ms. Oksana Litvinenko "yuyu-nezhnaya"
Reviews.Content: it is fully fit for purpose - reader, internet, a few games and movies. I'm happy - it is cheaper than in my country, and fast delivery. take 1 month. so far no hang-ups.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my brother who isn't overly technically inclined and I was worried about any issues he might encounter. However this fear is so far baseless. The initial start up sequences are very concise and easy to follow, the battery life is very good and the device itself is lighter and much easier to handle than a 10".

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Suzannah Ormston
Reviews.Content: I want to buy another one! It was exactly as I hoped! Great buy! I highly recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Love the size!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tiff"
Reviews.Content: It's been fun and is easy to use, wish I would have known that you can't use amazon prime, it doesn't support adobe flash. Had to get Netflix to use! I would've gotten something else if I had known.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: araxie ahillas
Reviews.Content: First time buyer of a tablet.Of course it is portable, but is some much moreversatile then laptops. More  area to view data than a phone, just as goodreception and great memory. Until there is a holographic display, phonewatch with the same capabilities I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: I got this for free with my samsung tv. I like it and use it more than my asus tf 700t. Makes me want to replace my asus with samsung 10.1

Reviews.Title: Amazing value
Reviews.Author: Milton Woods
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my son. I wanted him to have his own tablet. I use his table as much as I use my own ipad.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Merilyn
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use this, but mostly I love it. Easy to use, easy to see and use keyboard even for fat fingers. Great quality of audio and video. And since I have a Samsung Galaxy 3 phone made this all the easier to use. Much more convenient than a laptop for my purposes

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Not to big, not to small. My son is 9 years old and has been struggling with reading. We bought this so he could improve. In the past month we can already seen improvements and it makes reading and purchasing books easy. The screen is bright and clear, processing speed fast and its ease of use is amazing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Daniel S.
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it!This product works satisfactory and I am very happy with it and recommend to anyone who buys it will also be pleased to find that it was also shipped on time and in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: no bad
Reviews.Author: Lenox Plummer
Reviews.Content: it kinna hangs up or move slow sometimes. guess it have some kinks or it is the new software update from samsung that has the issue. the first software update on the samsung galaxy tab 2 7.0 runs much better.

Reviews.Title: Perfect, Just on time and excellent
Reviews.Author: Jose Rene Olmos Rosales
Reviews.Content: this product was delivered just in the next day before buy, i was really surprised because was very very fast, this become exactly like the description, NEW , with everything inside the box, awesome and thanks to the AMAZON team!I really like it and my personal experience with amazon have never fail, this is the best easy way to buy in a secure way from you're home!.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: mikulski
Reviews.Content: It was good - i am glad everything is perfect and OK good seller i can recommended  this shop for every one

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!!!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia L
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this tablet, I was pretty happy with it. Six months later is turns off, refuses to charge and will not come on.  I have tried to contact Amazon - no response.  This is a piece of junk that you will be very disappointed in - PLEASE take my advice - go elsewhere when looking for a tablet.  If I could give it negative stars believe me, I would.  I'm very disappointed in Amazon and Samsung for such shoddy products and lack of customer service.  I'm going to buy a new tablet but it will NOT be from Amazon and it will NOT be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Mario Cabrera
Reviews.Content: This tablet is better than I expected I've always been a fan of the iPad but since I have the iPhone five I wanted to try something new has tons of great apps and features however the touchscreen is a little slow at times I would recommend this tablet it is great for the price and works well too

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for price
Reviews.Author: Warren M.
Reviews.Content: This is a really good tablet for some games such as angry birds, subway surfers and  plants vs. Zombies. This is also really good for web browsing, listening to music and videos. The reason why I gave this tablet 4/5 stars is because it is a little slow web browsing but it gets the job done (: Id highly recommend this tablet if you are wanting something portable, with a long lasting battery 6-7 hours and something that is not really slow:)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: bird song
Reviews.Content: First time I have ever had a tablet, and am still learning its features. So far, I really do like it.

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: Joseph Aniolowski
Reviews.Content: We received this tablet within six days of ordering it. The picture quality is excellent as well as the sound. There are enough aps preloaded to keep most people happy. It comes with a wordprocessor ap, Polaris Office, which is excellent for our needs. We are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gail L. Pnacek
Reviews.Content: I use it instead of my laptop. I love it.  You can't save some stuff but you can keep it by taking a screen shot of it.  Very handy!

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE EQUIPO
Reviews.Author: A. Reyes
Reviews.Content: Este dispositivo llego a tiempo y en las condiciones que ofreció Amazon, el color y la nitidez de la pantalla son increibles, muchas aplicaciones para todos los gustos y sobre todo la aplicacion de hablar directamente al equipo lo hace genial. Lo unico que extrañé es que no tiene SIM card, con eso seria completo, por eso no le doy un 5.This device arrived on time and under the conditions offered Amazon, color and sharpness of the display are incredible, many applications for every taste and especially the application to talk directly to the equipment makes it great. The only thing I missed is that no has SIM card, with that would be complete, for this I not give it a 5.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: michael yaadar
Reviews.Content: The perfect gift for my mom and this is it.whAt more can i say it is the best gift for moms

Reviews.Title: I love this product!
Reviews.Author: Rosa González
Reviews.Content: It is a product that your system is excellent, and allows me to manage my daily activities faster. Additional to that, is my favorite brand electronic products, so I will say it is great. The only detail is that I do not get a line that allows me to access the Internet without having a WiFi nearby.

Reviews.Title: Love them
Reviews.Author: tie
Reviews.Content: This is the third Galaxy Tablet our family has purchased this year as a gift. They're super fun, easy, and portable. We absolutely love them.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Perkonx
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mother in law and she is thrilled with it. I also like it, it's pretty much fast and have a nice design. I don't know do other users have issues with it when speaking on camera on Skype, but the one that I bought is frosting the picture from time to time. Me personally never would buy an android, I am a Apple fan, but for android lovers it's great.

Reviews.Title: My laptop misses me.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Man with Van"
Reviews.Content: I setup my tab with Messagease, an alternative keyboard, SimpleMind, a mindmapping program (Pro), Wordpress for Android and all my usual web stuff. I use my phone for mobile data so wifi is all I need on the tab.For some people, this may be all you need for a computer. It's wicked portable. You can dash out the door without worrying about grabbing the charger. Available apps are dirt cheap or free.In the two weeks that I've owned the tab it's become my main device. I wanted something cheap and portable. Way better choice than a netbook. Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: I need a 3G vesion with a sim card slot
Reviews.Author: Soibibo Tonye Angala
Reviews.Content: the product description doesn't indicate if it's a wifi only version or a 3G vesion or a sim card slot

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Gretchen L.
Reviews.Content: Compact and easy to use.  It was an excellent buy and came very quickly.  Haven't had any problems whatsoever thus far.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: J_Onyx "I never let my schooling interfere wi...
Reviews.Content: Despite the opinion of a few posted here, This Galaxy Tab3 7" tablet is certainly a real upgrade. I enjoyed using a Tab 2 7" for well over a year but this Tab3, which I purchased for my grandson, surprised him and me. I gave my tab2 to his younger sister two months ago. They both love it. When I gave the Tab3 to my grandson for his birthday, we were all impressed. We thought the Tab2 was well built and has a sharp display. The Tab3 is clearly significantly thinner and lighter and the display is impressive!Samsung makes good products for at a competitive price. You will not go wrong with a Tab3 7".I gave mine away simply because a full sized tablet suits me better.

Reviews.Title: Looks good but not much different than the cheaper Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Matthew Yaple
Reviews.Content: I have owned the Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 for a little while now, and this one (Galaxy tab 3.0) isn't a whole lot different, it comes with a slightly faster processor physical buttons for home, back, and menu which gives a little more screen space, along with some more minor features. A nice tablet but if you want to save a few bucks get the Galaxy tab 2 7.0 you can get it for $170 new and about $130 used from here Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (7-Inch, Wi-Fi)

Reviews.Title: grest tablet easy to use
Reviews.Author: charlie
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this tablet its very easy to use, compact ligyt weight, the battery lasts for ages and the screen is superb

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: Diane C
Reviews.Content: The fact that Adobe Flash Player is not supported is a drawback. I can't look at some video clips on Facebook. I have not had time to look for a solution to that. I am sure I haven't been using the device to its full potential, but mainly need it for communication and web access. Dropbox access helps keep necessary information at hand.

Reviews.Title: Basically a good tablet, but missing some key components
Reviews.Author: Larry Vance
Reviews.Content: I already have the 7" Tab 1. It is basically the same without the sim card slot or the Swype keyboard. One thing that neither have and should be corrected is compatibility with flash player. The processor is an upgrade and does help, but I would advise getting the 8" model for faster processing.

Reviews.Title: Lemon On Day 1
Reviews.Author: Mary C Cooper
Reviews.Content: What a disappointment.  I opened it yesterday. It ran for awhile.  I charged it overnight. It still is not working.  Very disappointed.  I can send it in but wanted it for a trip.  Makes me question the quality.  Maybe I have a dud or lemon.  Wish Samsung would provide a new product versus fixing this lemon.

Reviews.Title: Poor Wifi speed, sites detect it as a cell phone!
Reviews.Author: K. Winter
Reviews.Content: This is like a giant galaxy s4 but is slooooowwwww! I own 3 other tablets and multiple computers for user testing. This is by far the worst I have tried. Despite loving my galaxy s3 and being a Samsung fan in general I had to send this back for the following reasons.Major faults with this tablet:1) Sloooooowwwww, much slower than even my s3 cell phone.2) Poor resolution, means newer responsive websites detect this tablet as a cell phone in portrait mode. Incredibly annoying.3) Wifi is very poor as well, spotty and jerky. A real deal killer.Summary:Half baked device that was not well thought out in the design process. Great idea, poor design.

Reviews.Title: the product is bad
Reviews.Author: Pablo Gavidia
Reviews.Content: the product is bad, there are no accessories available for my model, since the search buy an HDMI adapter and I have not been able to find so far, really believed that to be samsung better but not buy a USB adapter and it did not work, I totally dissapointed for purchases

Reviews.Title: Worst choice I ever made. Died in one week with no help from factory. Garbage!
Reviews.Author: A. C. Osse "TonyBR"
Reviews.Content: Worst choice I ever made. Check on the web about galaxy tabs that wont turn on. Mine, just one week old went to sleep and never returned. Samsumg support has no answer but tell you to take to service center.  My Ipad never gave me problems... The cheaper route took me to a literally DEAD end. Samsung never more. You get what you pay for. Into the trash in a few seconds... Oh, btw, im writing this review on an ipad....that works!!!POST MORTEN REVIEWOK, back to this one! Took it to a repair shop...  The guy just looked at it and said: Not turning on, right?  I said yes. He told me: get a better charger. The original one can't take it from hybernation when it get's to deep low energy levels.First I tought the guy was crazy (It's a tablet, not a bear!)...  but he seemd soo sure that I gave it a try. Bought his charger, left in the plug for 24 hours and.... it's back to life!!It's working right now, and it's very good for it's price and my use for it: check e-mails on trips basically!But I'll keep my 1 star because of the Samsumg NO-service!! They sure know the problem, as there are thousands of people talking about it on the net....  So why they just don't assume that the original charger is not good and tell us??

Reviews.Title: wifi
Reviews.Author: Marc807
Reviews.Content: Love the tablet but unless u in like same room where your router is then the wifi connection sucks had it freeze on me few times. I even upgraded my internet speed with a built in wifi it didn't help much really

Reviews.Title: PRINTING & EXTERNAL KEYBOARD USE BRAND-SENSITIVE
Reviews.Author: Caron Teenier
Reviews.Content: You may wish to reconsider making this purchase. This device will not print to any printer brand except its own. This is something very important. I was not aware of this at the time I purchased this unit. Another problem is that if you wish to use any other keyboard than Samsung, you may not make any adjustments for the board such as speed (I have a keyboard of another brand which has foreign language key popups if I type too fast. The manufacturer suggested that this is typicaI, but can be remedied by simply adjusting the speed of the keyboard on the tablet- SAMSUNG DOES NOT ALLOW FOR THIS). I bought this because of the price. It functions, but I wish I'd have known the peripherals. My recommendation: spend extra to get something that you can use to the full extent.

Reviews.Title: already broke, little to no use, does not charge the battery any more!
Reviews.Author: J. Porras
Reviews.Content: only 3 months of very light use and it broke, does not charge, and does not turn on. little piece of crap device. and i can not even return it.

Reviews.Title: fancy
Reviews.Author: krystal
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. This is an amazing product works wonderfully. I haven't been off amazon since I bought this product.  Nice color for the brown is beautiful.  Long battery life and easy maintenance. Would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: I bought this from fred Myers BUT LOVE IT AND WANTED TO SHARE SOME TIPS
Reviews.Author: Kaelib LeBreton
Reviews.Content: A few things about this tablet :)1. Social networks seem to take uo a lot of room so just use that for youre smarphone and I think the tablet preforms better without them2.handels some big games really well like asphalt 8 but its better on low quality but it still handels really nive3. GET AN SD CARD! to transfer all music and photos movies ect on thereANY OTHER QUESTIONS EMAIL MEkaelib1@gmail.com

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your MONEY!!!!
Reviews.Author: candicelhumphrey
Reviews.Content: I purchase this Samsung galaxy 3 in November, since then it freeze and wont turn on or off easily plus Amazon only cover it until Jan 31, 2014. So I would not recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Worked for just over a month, then just wouldn't turn on.
Reviews.Author: M. Boraz "beanth"
Reviews.Content: I should have suspected something was wrong when it seemed like the apps weren't responding and the wifi seemed spotty.  Pages took a long time to load, and apps were sluggish and/or hesitant.Then one day, it just wouldn't take a charge and wouldn't turn on.  We are so disappointed !  While it was working well (for a few weeks at most), we really liked it.  Now we have to figure out what to do with the thing.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: STEVEN C SNOW
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this Galaxy Tab 3.  I had played with one that my friend had and it was really cool to see all the features and apps and really just how much its like a computer.  The speed to it is fast and it doesn't freeze up.  It has many different features just by itself as a Tablet.  Then you add apps and you have the world.  This is a nice toy!

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Anita Vail
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for my boyfriend for Christmas...He absolutely loves it..Colors are beautiful when streaming an event or watching a movie.

Reviews.Title: Very reasonable price if you don't mind the lag....
Reviews.Author: Rachel Brink
Reviews.Content: I have owned several different brands of tablets- the 1st gen 10" iPad, the original 7" Google Nexus (ASUS), and now the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3, 7". I must say that this Samsung tablet is by far the slowest and has the worst battery life of the three. I actually bought this tablet while it was on a ridiculous sale of $129.99, which is a very reasonable price, but I did expect it to either match or exceed the performance of the 1st-gen Nexus. It does not.I owned a Nexus 7 for EXACTLY one year (to the day!) when it fell off the dresser and cracked the digitizer, rendering the touch capabilities useless. Being a computer repair technician for a living, I attempted to replace the digitizer/LCD assembly- which is ridiculously difficult- and ended up frying the motherboard in the process. Because it was so user-unfriendly when it came to service, I didn't want to buy another Nexus, but now I wish I had..... This Note 3 is SOOOOO slow.

Reviews.Title: Best gift for my 6 years old girls
Reviews.Author: Hernando Garavito
Reviews.Content: My child was witing a long for a tabled. I was waiting too. This tables works great, excellent graphics, good life time batery, and all you can download in the market....

Reviews.Title: good, but not great.
Reviews.Author: Sydney Sperry
Reviews.Content: i recently bought this device and quickly noticed a few things.first, it has great graphics and sound quality.second, it is equipped with the Google play store.third, its wi-fi connectivity is very shoddy. if you are someone with a need for speed, don't get this device. simple acts such as changing the volume slow it down. it is very laggy. however if you enjoy sitting around for 5 minutes to open or even simply play on your games, this is the device for you.

Reviews.Title: Expected better
Reviews.Author: JTW "jtw"
Reviews.Content: Expected a much better performance from this tablet.  I have a Galaxy S4 that is awesome and the Galaxy Tab doesn't even compare to the phone.  Not really sure how a cell phone half the size of this tablet is faster and more responsive, but it is.  I am looking to upgrade or go with another brand.

Reviews.Title: Decent Tablet but slow
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am a Mac user and have a Mac Air. Bought this instead of the Mac Mini because of its small size that is easily pocketable. Had the Mac Mini but not that pocketable with its larger screen. That said the Samsung is usable but very slow. Often have to wait several seconds for response to load a page or close an App. Also some of the Apps aren't as polished as those on the Mac. My Fitbit works fine on the Mac but not on many Android devices including this one. I paid $135. At that price it's okay but wouldn't pay more.

Reviews.Title: Delivery and product is very good.
Reviews.Author: Fong Her
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my wife.  However, she didn't like it and I could return it since she was traveled on job.  I wish the return policy allowed a longer range.

Reviews.Title: enjoy mini tablet
Reviews.Author: T. R. Draper
Reviews.Content: this is my first tablet and wanted to see how the DROID system worked so educational as well as fun...I gave ONLY 3 stars cause I really feel it has problems bringing in wifi signals...to be fair hotel and house only experience but other equipment in my house have a much stronger signal than this model pulls in...it works fine in my house and enjoy the bigger screen than phone etc...pictures were fuzzy sometimes...and to be honest I have only had since Christmas so still learning but you asked  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Worth Buying
Reviews.Author: Beba1973
Reviews.Content: I got 2 of these for my kids & they are of very good quality, known name-brand & easy to carry. The price is great too. The Android system is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: I love my samsung
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I started with a kindle then kindle hd after 6 months of owning the hd  it kept typing on its own after having it sent back 7 times to get a refurbished one losing all my game data each time. I was pretty irritated. Now comes my samsung which saves most of my game data so even if I delete a game it comes back when I reinstall the game. Only thing I dont like is thebapps that can not be removed.

Reviews.Title: would buy again
Reviews.Author: teeganz
Reviews.Content: It has performed all that I had expected. Only wished in had memory card that came with it. Other than that awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: LJE
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the average user.  Right size for reading books, checking email, and traversing through the internet using the WiFi.  Graphics are fairly good with adaptable key strokes.  There was issues with internet response, pages flashed as I scrolled through the pages of a website.  May have been the website.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price.
Reviews.Author: Frankp48094 "Retired, not a fan of sports, Li...
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 7 inch Galaxy 3 T for the ability to take it with me everywhere I go... I also own a 10 inch iPad thatI use daily, but it is difficult to take with me.. I am male, and I do not have pockets to accommodate a 10 inchtablet.. I am not prepared to carry a Murse, or Man Bag.. with my 7 inch tablet, I can stick it in my jacket pocket, oreven in some of my pants pockets... I like it because as long as there is WIFI, I can stay in touch...

Reviews.Title: A big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "walking girl"
Reviews.Content: I have had the original tablet and the 2 so I thought it would be great to get the 3. I have had it for one month and I am returning it.  It is so slow, lags when you try to get information and sticks when you hit websites.  You can touch the icon over and over and finally it will move to what you want.  It has been very frustrating.  I am going to buy the Nexus 7 2013 instead.

Reviews.Title: Missing parts
Reviews.Author: Gwen Roulx
Reviews.Content: The charger was missing from the box.  So I'm unable to use it.  I don't want to return it because they are no longer in stock.  But can not get a charger sent to me.  Also no book or warranty information in the box.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk; terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Josh Hunt
Reviews.Content: Had it just over a month when it started randomly restarting. When it comes back on, the date and time is wrong. Sent it off for repair. Same thing. Contacted tech support. They told me to restart it and contact them again if problem persists. My first and last Samsung device. I can understand lemons, we all make mistakes. I just expect better service when a mistake happens.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work properly
Reviews.Author: victor boyukansky
Reviews.Content: I've been playing with this for about a week and i'm not satisfied. Wifi turns off and on by itself, chat on always fails to work. The tab freezes sometimes, Keyboard doesn't pop up right away when you need to type.The worst part of all I can't download skype on this. While trying to download from google play it gets stuck at 12%. When it does download, it won't install and a message comes up that says Error: unknown error code during application install: "920"The only good use I found for it so far is to read the news but that wasn't the reason I bought this for. Waste of money. Need to return!!I own a galaxy s3 and am a fan of Samsung products but this one didn't do it for me.If seller has tips on how to fix this please contact me.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy tab 3 7 inch
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this very long but so far I like it a lot. Use/setup is very easy. Got mine at bestbuy for $149.00. I also bought a 64gb micro sd card. Im actually writing this review from the device itself. Screen view is very nice as well as the speakers. Would definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Knux03
Reviews.Content: good i was dissapointed that amazon confused my billing adress with my old one but i got it safe and sound in florida....

Reviews.Title: Nice entry level tablet
Reviews.Author: Nathan A. Mccollum
Reviews.Content: Great buy for a 10 year old and a 13 year old. Cheap but still decent enough of a tablet to let them enjoy gaming.

Reviews.Title: Too S...L...O...W
Reviews.Author: Basil Nestor
Reviews.Content: I tried to like the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7-inch... Really, I did. I'm a Samsung fan. I own two Samsung phones, a Galaxy Blaze and a Galaxy S III, and I'm very happy with them. The Tab 3 looks like a larger version of the S3 on steroids. Unfortunately, it doesn't perform that way. It's slow doing simple things. For example, there is a noticeable lag when scrolling through web pages. And I don't mean loading pages, I mean scrolling AFTER the page is fully loaded! Move your finger, and for half-a-beat nothing happens, then the page moves. Very irritating, especially since my 18-month-old Blaze scrolls so much faster. This general slowness affects all of the Tab's operations to some degree (for example, when turning pages in a book or reading a pdf file). Even the menu for Settings, while faster than browser scrolling, still lags just a bit. C'mon, Settings is the most basic operation on the device!This slowness occurs even with no background apps running, or in memory.The shape and size of the device is quite pleasing, but the back is smooth shiny plastic with no texture, so it makes the Tab feel like a heavy toy. And the shiny finish magnifies fingerprints and smudges.Aside from slowness, everything works as advertised. But I get a sense that Samsung didn't try very hard when they were designing this device. It lacks vision. It's not revolutionary or evolutionary. The Tab 3 is a familiar form factor housing tech suited to 2011 or 2012 (dual core, 1200 MHz, ARM Cortex-A9 and 1024 x 600 pixels), but seriously out of date in 2013-2014. Ya, it's cheaper than some other tablets. And for this reason it might be a good gift for a child, or a tablet for someone on a very tight budget. But overall, I can't recommend.I kept the Tab for two days and then returned it. Got a Nexus 7 (2013 version), and it performs perfectly.Note that this review is for the WiFi-only version. The LTE version has slightly different specs and a different processor which may improve performance.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: doglady
Reviews.Content: I like this size. It's big enough to read and watch videos. The prize is a little bit higher than others, but I would like to try out Samsung because a lot of friends are using Samsung instead of Apple. It's much easier to use than Ios. I already have an iphone which makes me dizzy. I don't want my tablet to be that way.Its performance is so far so good. I'll update if something wrong happens.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Essemmdee
Reviews.Content: This tablet is small enough to put in the cargo pockets of my shorts when strolling about, but the screen is also large enough to have plenty of area to work.  Samsung Galaxy, the name speaks for itself.  I am not a fan of all the requests for "cloud" type storage, this app and that app, but that isn't the device, it is part of the add on programming (apps).  Overall, I love it!

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price!!
Reviews.Author: DeDivaCaramel
Reviews.Content: i an enjoying this so far but with more flash memory and better screen resolution i would enjoy it even more i got it at the $179. so was happy about that but for basic usage which mine will be i would still say get it i got the white cause it just looks better to me still new so will play around with it some more but so far so good i like the 7" model easier to use with my small hands easy to tuck away in any purse your carrying just wish the resolution was better so pictures would show up true to color and such like thats the only disappointing part cause i use it for social network viewing pictures and not seeing them for the true color is abit off putting so thus the 4 stars....

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: PPG
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy tab 3 (7 inch) has the perfect size, great quality and, awesome features! ... it's a Samsung! what else should you expect but the highest quality!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: Carolyn J. Tedder "CJ"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing you can't do with the Samsung Tablet.  The price is great. Very easy to navigate.  Great color image and lot's of fun. MUST HAVE!!

Reviews.Title: Good and Bad
Reviews.Author: D. Kaufmann
Reviews.Content: I bought a Galaxy Tab 3, 7.0.  I wanted to start to learn the Android OS so I knew both sides of the house when it comes to portable operating systems.My thoughts -8gb is not very much storage, but I bought a Nice 32gig compact flash drive for movies and music and that works well.The OS layout has lots of ways to customize it, with lots of neat widgets.  I like that.The Google play store doesn't seem to have quite as many good apps as the apple store.Dumping movies on the tab, having them be converted and play nicely is very cool and something I really enjoy, it removes pain in the ass steps that exist in the apple world.When running apps like facebook and ebay, there are moments when the system seems to slow down and need to catch up.  I find this unimpressive for a NEW NEW tablet to have so many slow downs.  There's a smoothness factor to the newer apple products that this simply lacks.  Maybe the 8.0 or 10.2 is better.I find typing on this tablet much better than on the Ipads / Iphones.I find surfing clunkier than on a lot of apple products, it feels like some of my touches just aren't that accurate.Does not weight a lot, but feels a bit cheap/plasticy.Cost me less than half of what an ipad mini costs.Nice for reading.I'm about a month into owning this tablet, and overall I like it, but don't LOVE IT.  Not a game changer, but if you don't wanna spend boku bucks... this is a good way to go.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love It :)))
Reviews.Author: Zayad
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied...Another winner from Samsung. Would recommend it to anyone who wants a quality tab at a reasonable price. I would also definitely recommend getting a quality screen protector, my choice was Ghost Armour, bought invellop protectors which turned out to be complete crap. They are NOT completely clear, makes the screen look grainy & reduces image quality.

Reviews.Title: Lovi'n My Samsung
Reviews.Author: Janet Ousley
Reviews.Content: To start off I read every review on every tablet I could find. Tech reviews user reviews etc.before making up my mind. I have a 10" ipad which  I use for work and have enjoyed it immensly  however as small as it is it still was too cumberson to carry around in purse or tote. My friend purchased a Nexus 7  it was nice just not the bells and whistles I wanted.Long story short went to a local retailer for a hands on comparison...felt the Samsung was for me.  Sorry for those experiencing issues but the Tab 3 is awesome.. was very easy to setup found my home wifi immediately, the speed is all I need  had 3 email accounts set up in 15 min or less.  the screen display is bright and  vivid, the apps are plenty! I reccommend this to anyone who wants a easy enjoyable 7" tablet experience!

Reviews.Title: Great gift for anyone
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: was as great gift, my friend loved it.He wanted it for his wife but kept it for himself .....oh shame

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hames
Reviews.Content: Love it!  I mainly use for an e-reader, but I also use it to check e-mail and tool around on the internet and PInterest.  The battery life is great and it charges quickly.  Love the size.  Not too big so it's easy to hold one handed when reading, big enough to have a decent length on a page.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Ns
Reviews.Content: My son and I love this. Works great has enough memory for my things and for my sons games and books. Im very happy I bought this!!!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: Is a friendly product, strong, reliable and helpful, sometimes there sre "software conflics" with webpages (yahoo for ex) and apps (email app doesn't allow me to load my gmail account) but I can live with this.  Would buy it again if hae the chance

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my Mom- SHe loves it

Reviews.Content: I bought this Samusung Galaxy Tab for my Mom and she says her tablet is her new best friend. Now she barely pays attention when I call her.

Reviews.Title: It works okay

Reviews.Content: I was hoping the other reviews about picking up the wifi just had to do with other peoples wifi connections, but it is doing the same with mines as well. I have perfect internet at my house, but you have to be close to the router in order to get good signal otherwise is very slow.  Love that you can print from this tab, which is a plus

Reviews.Title: when it comes to Samsung
Reviews.Author: Alicia Martinez
Reviews.Content: There's no way you can ever go wrong with this Galaxy tablet! I take it everywhere with me and love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect ..
Reviews.Author: Nidal Malla Ahmed "xebato"
Reviews.Content: The quality of this tab is amazing, I loved it, the size is exactly what I need, thanks samsung :)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: john simansons
Reviews.Content: We use the Galaxy Tab when we travel and for reading books, magazines and newspapers. It's very useful do quick web searches and catch-up on emails. This tablet is light and easy to use. It's much faster than anticipated. The colors are true and text extra crisp.

Reviews.Title: Nice choice
Reviews.Author: sahraouil
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3, arrived on time and it works perfectly. My son loves it and can't take it off of his hands...The price was reasonable comparing to other retail stores. The navigation is so smooth that intrigued my baby daughter to navigate through all the screens and select her preferred app.

Reviews.Author: Terrey
Reviews.Content: tablet I got for my own personal use and I am quiet happy with it and has been very useful to me

Reviews.Title: I like it this product, very good
Reviews.Author: Jose Mendez
Reviews.Content: I like the product is well finished, has all the facilities listed in the features of the tablet and is easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about buying a tablet for the fist time and made sure to do some research before I picked one out but this is a great tablet and it is a good price too.

Reviews.Title: Good for my first Tablet
Reviews.Author: LJD "LJD"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a tablet and after looking around I chose the Samsung.  This 7 inch is small enough for my handbag and light compared to the others.  Amazon was the only place I could get the brown one.  I can't say much more as I haven't really got into it yet but the kids are doing fine.  I think if I was going to use it for pramarily for reading I would get the 8 inch but the 8 is a little heavier so it would be a trade off.

Reviews.Title: Price doesn't justify the negatives.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Ignoffo "Matty"
Reviews.Content: So so product. Can't see how it earns 5 stars from anyone. It's inexpensive, and runs games well. Everything else is below average IMO. Cameras stink. Screen is useless outdoors. Does not run smooth...kinda herky jerky IMO. Low storage space. Has occasional issues booting me out of applications, even readers occasionally which is terribly annoying because I lose my page.It is now Late May, 2014. Less than four months into buying two of these for a trip my wife and I took out of the country. My tablet has primarily been used as a reader because I can't stand the herky jerky nature of how it performs. The touch screen on mine does not work anymore. The tablet is ready for the garbage. No problem, I suppose....My wife uses her five year old ipad instead of this because it performs so much smoother, so I can just break hers now. Horrible product, Samsung.  Absolute shame becfause I LOVE my Galaxy S$ phone and think it outperforms apple on every level. This tablet is on par with the devices available at discount stores for <$100.00.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Maryam
Reviews.Content: Wow. One of the slowest tablets I have ever put my hands on. It takes so long to open up an app as well as closing it. Everything lags. I have two, for my siblings, and both of them are this way so it is not that they are defective. The design is nice considering its old design but man is this thing a disappointment. I am unimpressed this should be literally like $75 from how slow it is. In addition, I am very much in the tech world so it is not that I am unaware of this. Samsung should not sell products that are like this. I will definitely get an iPad mini instead.

Reviews.Title: christmas shopping
Reviews.Author: bkwife46
Reviews.Content: I love all products by samsung......Samsung is a really good product,anything by them has  a good product. I love Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Gave it a chance... Huge disappointment. Returned.
Reviews.Author: Chad Hobgood
Reviews.Content: I have a 3rd gen iPad already, but got the 7" Tab 3 for free as part of a promotion when I bought my Samsung TV. At first I was excited about how compatible it could be with my tv with it's built in IR sensor. But that was heavily outweighed by it's less than stellar performance. It was very slow all around... opening apps, keyboard input, waking up. Sometimes when waking up the numbers on the clock would be all scrambled and unreadable. Maybe if I got one of the other two models with a faster processor it would have been better/faster. I think the only way I would have kept this was if I took the time to root it and customize it. But for now, I'm content with my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: This tablet isn't really the greatest. It could be worse but it could also be better buy I guess you get what you pay for. My only complaint is the speed. It's pretty slow most of the time. It takes a while to load web pages and it always buffers when I'm watching videos whether it's YouTube, Netflix or whatever I'm trying to watch. Another thing is the smart remote. When I try to use it, it glitches whenever I pull the tab to show the controls. Nothing is there. It's just a little tab in the middle of the screen. I would recommend saving your money and getting the galaxy note, nexus 7, or iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Jodi-Ann Mundell
Reviews.Content: So far I love it. Getting familiar with it's features tweaking the settings to my liking? The specs are awesome

Reviews.Title: It is just okay
Reviews.Author: CharlieO
Reviews.Content: I own a 2nd Gen Apple iPad and a Kindle Fire HD.  This product is not as intuitive to use as the iPad or Kindle Fire HD.  One constant issue is every time I try to load something to the external SD card, no matter how small the file, I get a message that the card is full.  I have to shut down and restart the Galaxy Tab 3 before I can add another file to the SD card.  I also cannot play music files loaded to the SD card.  They must be loaded into the internal memory.  So far I am not impressed.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, missing a couple of features.
Reviews.Author: B. Carter
Reviews.Content: Received two Galaxy Tab 3s on July 8th thanks to Amazon Prime fast shipping.  One was the 7" model (for my Granddaughter) and an 8" (for myself).  Had no problems setting up /connecting either tablet.  My Granddaughter is eight years old and had no problems with any of the controls and is extremely delighted with the size of the screen compared to her iPod Touch. She has downloaded many games and other Aps from Google Play and everything works as advertised.  With that said, there are a couple of features that are present on the 8" model that I feel should have been included with the 7".  The first is the ability to transfer some Aps to the SD card.  Some (not all) Aps are developed with this capability and I think that Samsung should have allowed this on the 7" as it did on the 8".  The internal memory of the 7" is half that of the 8".  The other feature that is available on the 8" and not the 7" has been mentioned in several of the other reviews.  It is the ability to control the "Touch Key Light Duration".  I think a lot of owners would like the ability to have the lights on for a longer period or all the time.Note: In an attempt to get more information regarding the transfer of Aps to the SD card, I contacted Samsung through their "Chat" service.  After listening to my question, and doing some research, the Service Rep informed me that the 7" Tab 3 had the capability that I was questioning him about.  I told him that there were two identical Aps on each tablet.  I could transfer them on my 8" but not on the 7" in spite of both tablets having the same OS.  At that point the Rep said I should contact the developer of the Aps.  Needless to say, that ended "Chat".  A week later I decided to call Samsung.  Surprise!  I got to speak to a real life Human!  After a brief conversation and a not so brief "hold while I research", I was told "we don't know the answer but we will forward your question to the Tech Department".  I was given a transaction number that I'm sure is resting on the bottom of somebody's circular file.  Hopefully, in the future, they will  ad this feature to the 7" Tablets if it can be done with an update.

Reviews.Title: Invalid Package Files - and why I'll be Asking Amazon for A Return Authorization
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: UPDATE - INVALID PACKAGE FILE when updating apps or installing new ones work-around:Naviage to  [...] in your browswer and follow instructions about  Setting up VPN option.  Installs Hideman VPN (mine worked from Google Play.  Connect to any country then relaunch Google play.  and Voila you can update apps that had been failing with invalid package file - and most importantly I was successfully able to install Kindle.Should I have to do this.... absolutely not.  But comparing other devices seems they're all having issues.  (except of course Apple, but I'm just frugal but may surrender yet based on how well this solution works."--------------------Just purchased the Galaxy Tab 3 - and have so far spend an inordinate amount of time trying to get it to work.  The installation of an app update from the Google Play store generates  "Invalid package file".  Initially I was thinking this was simply an error  being thrown from download Amazon's Kindle; however the error also resulted from attempting to update any of the Google apps or the Samsung App.  [This is a replacement for a Kindle E-reader [not Fire], the Kindle had died and the owner [Rik]was ready to try a device where they could manage their calendar and take advantage of a tablet's capabilities.  [I'm the in-house IT guy performing the setup and am comfortable with the navigation/troubleshooting]After performing a complete factory reset (with the same results)  I contacted the Samsung technical service through Chat.  After variations of clearing cache, forcing stop, on chrome, google play the last suggestion was to try a different router - network congestion.  Seems unlikely since some apps will update successful.  The Help-Desk Analyst did seem very capable and understood the problem, but does not seem to have a ready solutionTotal time spent to setup, troubleshoot and still now have it NOT working is about 4 1/2 hours.  The time to get a return authorization for this Tab from Amazon will be much much shorter :)  I'm a Galaxy S3 phone user and love it - disappointed I don't have the same warm fuzzies with this device.

Reviews.Title: What is the difference from 7.0 plus and tab 3, a downgrade after 3 years of the 7.0 Plus
Reviews.Author: ccep22
Reviews.Content: I have the 7.0 Plus GT-P6210 Wi-Fi it has almost the same features as the Tab 3.  Speed 1.2 GHz and more internal memory (16GB) are better.  Tab 2 comes out and they reduce the memory to 8GB and the CPU to 1 GHz.  Then Tab 3 comes out and it is back to 1.2 GHz (yes dual core) just like the 7.0 Plus 2.5 years ago.  Why note a 1.5 GHz and put it back to 16 GB. Why not a better camera.  The 7.0 Plus has a front 2.0  Tab 3 1.3 megapixels.  Anything to compete at the $199 price with no real improvements to the unit itself.  It may look sleeker and lighter, it is a Dual core just like the 7.0 Plus, some other enhanced features, SD card expands to 64GB, that's good.  But it seems to lack major improvements and it is similar to the 7.0 Plus.  Nice but not that much better than its predecessors.

Reviews.Title: I feel like I should of bought a Nexus 7...
Reviews.Author: A. Miller "Warablo"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, so I have nothing to really compare it to, but I feel the new Nexus 7 that just came out has much better hardware for a little extra cash. Though the Galaxy Tab 3 does look more durable than the Nexus 7, and you can also increase your memory size with a Micro SD card on the Tab 3..My Tab 3 also sometimes has wifi issues where I have to go enter my password and such to my router to reconnect.I probably would of ended up buying this Nexus 7 if I knew it was coming out soon.Google Nexus 7 FHD Tablet (7-Inch, 16GB, Black) by ASUS (2013)

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: My wife got me one for Christmas of 2013.  The processor is very slow.  Just surfing the web is sometimes agrivating because ur waiting for page to finish updownloading.  I have 20 mps cable Internet.  My desktop computer that I built has no trouble surfing the web.  The battery is the only thing that impresses me.  It will last a really long time streaming netflix.  Certain vidoes on web pages wont play because its not flash player compatible.  There is a unaproved version of flash player that somewhat works. Good for pandora, netflix and angry birds.

Reviews.Title: Awesome used tablet like a new one.
Reviews.Author: I am Gerard
Reviews.Content: Galaxy tablet always amazes me than iPads.I bought this one for a gift. Well, it was refurbished here in Amazon. But I don't have any issues and works like brand new. Well I recommend buying this one...

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet. After removing the UX installing custom rom Rocket Tab with another rom built on it 64gb memory card to add to the 8gb of storage the processor does good. Enough to handle multitasking side by side apps I was watching tutorial video on youtube while taking notes and reading a book all on one screen :D

Reviews.Content: I purchased tis for my daughter. She used three or four times, now does not start! does not take a charge! Absolutely horrible!

Reviews.Title: NOT AS SHOWN IN VIEDO

Reviews.Content: THE TABLET I GOT HAS NO ""SIM SLOT"" AS SHOWN IN VIEDOI DID NOT RECIEVED NO PEN WITH THE ITEM AS SHOWN IN THE VIEDOCAN SOMEBODY EXPLAIN .......WHY!!!!THE TABLETS WORKS VERY GOOD!!!

Reviews.Title: the battery popped
Reviews.Author: Howard Giuliano
Reviews.Content: I never thought this could happen...my battery got really thick and popped the back ... when I went to the service they said it wasn't something uncommon and they had similar cases with some S4s... good thing is that they replaced the product on the spot... this one works.The model is exquisite and once you play with it a little you won't leave it out of your sight soon. Beautiful toy!

Reviews.Title: It's just ok
Reviews.Author: MaryLaw
Reviews.Content: I like this Tab but I much prefer the Tab 3 10" and the Tab 2 10". This one seems to get stuck when I search things on Google and sometimes the response time isn't what I'm used to with the bigger devices. It's really convenient for carrying in your bag though. I have a Galaxy Note II phone so this Tab doesn't really add much to my needs. If you don't have any other tablet or similar device, then this would be a great tablet to start with.

Reviews.Title: My 2 year old love it
Reviews.Author: Buzz'n'Boooo
Reviews.Content: In fact, he's addicted to it. He doesn't know what he's doing sometime, but he love the swipe some of the fun app design for kids. Surprisingly, he know exactly where all of the apps button are and how to get to them. He loves the camera and photo gallery and he know how to pull it up. Make sure you have backup enable as he also know how to delete them.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: K. DeBose
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet when Sprint was giving them away free when you switched to their framily plan. I like the tablet because it is easy to hold and portable. The only thing I dont like about it is that I dont have a wider usb port to use for my business.  Im sure there is a way to transfer the information from my usb to the tablet. I just haven't figured that out yet.  But otherwise I really do like the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: MaribelleZ
Reviews.Content: I have a great time with this tablet. Its easy to hold, lite weight, and great screen quality. Have had a great time with it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Arturo Uzcategui
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my dad and he could not be happier. This is a great buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Mama Vida
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my husband. It took him 2 weeks to get it ready as he had no free time to sit and play with it and download everything he wanted. Now he uses it for a lot of things. Is very useful for singers and computer programmers, who would have thought lol.Any way I want one now.

Reviews.Content: Not bad, not good. Something in between. Not as i expected to be. I would not recomend it to buy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy tab
Reviews.Author: Delana Guinn
Reviews.Content: A lil slow camera sucks but it gets the job done. I would prefer apple for all. Over android any day

Reviews.Title: Lousy product

I should have returned when I first started using it because I was having trouble with it then but thought it was nothing. Contacted Amazon they sold this item but was told the warranty expired after 90 days and to contact Samsung. I contacted Samsung and they are telling me that the serial number on it is no good so now what do I do with it. I spent $150.00 and can't use it I really am disappointed with Amazon for selling me a piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: its ok

Reviews.Title: price's for samsung 3 tablet

So far the samsung 3 tablet is alsome, I'm so excited to finally get one.I did that with Mehag's (amazon)giving me a much  earned credit .THANKS AGAIN FOR YOUR HELP!! YOU ROCK GIRL!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet and Great Purchase

Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet knowing it was refurbished, but it wasn't the box was banged up and also it was at it's original box when refurbished should have been white with 90 day returnpros: great unit to use and lite and easy to carriercons: Keep Rebooting and Core processor is kinda slow, and freezes even with new updates

Reviews.Title: No MHL function, won't charge after 6 month
Reviews.Author: Sherry Ford
Reviews.Content: Pros: portable, looks good in hand, IR remote works well.Cons: no MHL function (the tab 3 8" and 10" have MHL function), which means you cannot mirror the screen to TV via a single cable. If I had known this before purchase, I would buy a 8" instead of 7".Mine won't charge after 6 months. Contact the Samsung CS, had it repaired with no charge. Through the quality is not great, but their CS works.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 [ 7-inch, White.
Reviews.Author: ROGER
Reviews.Content: The Samsung is an improvement from my older model as far as the WIFI . The complaint I have with the unit is it lack the auto flash  for the camera.my older model had it. Samsung should have add flash and improve the camera. my complaint is with Samsung not the seller. The seller was great, just as promised in the ad. Reviews.Title: Tes 1
Reviews.Author: Jonatan Camacho
Reviews.Content: I like the team is very completeI like everything that sells this brand. I'm fond of it.I recommend it to other usersgood

Reviews.Title: great tablet

Reviews.Content: A very good tablet for the price. I  use it for email and Facebook. I'm glad I got this one instead of the larger one as this one fits perfect in my hand but  doesn't seem small at all.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Manly P Proctor
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it she even can do her  home work on it . She makes her own YouTube video to.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: cathy bamba
Reviews.Content: The product was fine, it was the Fed Ex Delivery that was unprofessional by throwing my product in the snow bank and being picked up by a neighbor...Product is wonderful, my daughter loves it..

Reviews.Title: S...O....S...L...O...W...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We received this as a promotional gift - If I had paid money for it it would have been returned.In the two weeks we have had this I have thrown it aside at least a dozen times in frustration / anger. Because of such poor performance its main use so far has been as a Kindle Reader - i find the size is well suited for the task and I actually prefer the screen to my Kindle (please note I do not do a lot of bright light reading).Also note that it seems you can only charge this unit with the brick provided with the tablet. It will not charge with any other usb brick in our house or with a car usb charger.If you have an iPad or an iPhone you will find the user experience, at best, frustrating. If you are new to tablets you may be happy but I would recommend trying other tablets in your price point before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dreuxmtz@gmail
Reviews.Content: Love it want it gonna get can't wait to get it for my birthday great price must get for this limited price

Reviews.Title: Sending it back
Reviews.Author: 6foot3
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet and not to thrilled with it was shown I can not mirror the image from the tablet to my tv will be sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: L. Bass
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my young son and easy to use. Fantastic price and comfortable size. Definitely recommend over any electronic devices specifically targeted to kids.

Reviews.Title: Best gift I've given my wife in a long time

She'll pick the tablet up before she'll bother to launch her laptop because it's instant on and does almost everything she uses the laptop for. Couldn't have been easier to set up and get it connected to our wireless network. Great camera and a great screen to see her pics on.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but slow as hell

Reviews.Content: I bought one for my mother and the other for my wife. When I was testing it for my mom I realized that this thing is just slow as hell, we have a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 and that's a lot faster than this, besides of this the wireless signal is very low, just like a cellphone; but again the main problem is just the speed.

Reviews.Title: I buy 3 of this tablet, but 2 was dead after 3 weeks.

Reviews.Content: I just buy 3 tablets for my kids. But 2 of them died after 20 days of use. Well, one I returned to amazon, but the other one came with us to Brazil and here samsung dont fix it. There are no warranty outside EUA. Uau, I will never buy samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Randy "dgenx321"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is awesome. For the money you will not find a better piece of equipment. Samsung has outdone themselves once again. The screen is bright and you will not be disappointed with your purchase. If you're looking for a good inexpensive tablet that is worth a lot more than you have to pay for it buy the Tab 3!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: this was free with a Samsung TV purchase.  very slow/lags quite a bit compared to my i-phone 5.  touch screen unresponsive at times, especially while using the built in web browser.  good size / works well for my kids playing games on it though.

Reviews.Title: Good Form, Nice Screen, Underpowered.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Case
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for my son for Christmas. I have a GS4, rooted with a ton of customization and tasker automation. I wanted to start really making the move to the Android infrastructure away from the IOS infrastructure, and love my GS4, so I went with this tablet.This tablet looks good, feels good in your hand, has a great screen, I love the removable microSD card, but it is just under-powered and lags. I don't think that my 10 year old knows the difference, but if I had bought it for myself I would have returned it for the slow performance. Really too bad.

Reviews.Title: Not all it's cracked up to be
Reviews.Author: Hedda Abbott "LV Mom"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this tablet for a number of months.  When on the internet, it will throw me off.  When playing games it will take me back to the desktop. When on the internet, especially Facebook, the screen will automatically enlarge and when trying to minimize the screen it will go back to the blank page and your have to ask for the site again. It was given to my wife as a gift and she started to complain about the freezing.  When playing Angry Birds it acts kinda whacky.  I know that doesnt say much except that Angry Birds becomes un-playable.  The screen flashes, the birds do not react to the correct finger movements and go off in the opposite direction.  When play slots it will just freeze.  I hoping that Samsung will address this issue and put out a software patch to fix this soon.

This leaves it very clunky and slow to move between apps etc.  Also while expandable memory with a micro SD card is a great idea, they do not allow you to install apps to the micro SD card making it much less advantageous. Samsung Galaxy,  out of the park.  M

Reviews.Title: Exitement turned to frustration
Reviews.Author: L. Cupit
Reviews.Content: I know that my experience with the Samsung Galaxy will not deter most people from buying one.... As for myself I read plenty negatives reviews on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 totally ignoring common issues other users had with the product only to purchase it and then discover I would have the same issues that others have expressed.My experience with the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 did not fair well for many reasons. I decided to purchase the Galaxy Tab 3 after hearing good reviews from friends & family bout the Samsung S4 Smartphone.  First issue that I had with the Galaxy Tab 3 out the box is that it will only pick an extra strong WIFI singnal in the same room as my WIFI router. I just purchased the router in recent months and never had issue with WiFi signals with any of our other WiFi enabled products....Smartphones, Laptop computers, etc. Potential buyers can & should confirm this WiFi signal issue with the Galaxy Tab 3 through a Google search on the topic. The Galaxy Tab 3; as with most computers; does auto-updates on the pre-installed applications and also any apps that I install through the Samsung/Google "Play Store". My Galaxy Tab 3 was giving me constant error messages when it would attempt auto updates on the applications. Last count I had 26 error messages....when I would clear them out the errors would cycle again. I tried to do the research online though Samsung and Android help forums on this one issue to no avail though it seems to be a persistant problem for many users with application update error -110.  A big negative for the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is no ADOBE FLASH. This is a bad if like my family you have Amazon Prime as you cannot play movies from the website and there is no app for Amazon Prime movies. This is just a personal issue for me, but I had to create a username and password to use most of the applications pre-installed on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3. This got extremely frustrating for me as I decided to forgo use of some apps because of this.  Also, when I was able to do a search through Yahoo search engine it was common to get a message alert message saying - "Too many redirects from search engine".  Needless to say, I will be returning my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3. Obviously others experience with the Galaxy Tab 3 has been good, but satisfaction would depend on what you plan on using it for.

Reviews.Title: Tablet bad
Reviews.Author: YUSTHYN RUEDA
Reviews.Content: wrong tablet, the tablet just arrived in Venezuela  new but it not works. turns itself off, the tablet will not download apps, amazon and the seller said I can not to accept the return

Reviews.Title: not a fan of samsung from way back and still standing
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Let me just say that this was a gift so I did not order personally.  I received this gift in April of 2013 and it no longer works at first they said that the plug or the charger had a short when I called Samsung directly.  I took it into Best Buy and went to the geek squad to find out that it was neither it is the actually tablet itself.  When I received the gift I immediately ordered a leather case for it and a screen protector.  Then they asked me at Samsung if I dropped it.  because they don't understand why the USB port would be damaged so in order to send it to them there is a $34.99 charge and if the USB port has to be replaced which I already told them it did there are additional charges not to mention I have to pay to ship it and for them to return it which will be billed on my credit card.  The warrantee literally expired 16 days after I reported that it would not turn on and to no avail would they honor taking a look at it.  Just like my handbags if you don’t stand behind your product I won’t purchase it I am 40 years old and take very good care of my things however technology is fickle and even though the warrantee expired two weeks before it broke this product should’ve lasted much longer.  I am not a child throwing it around or dropping it.  I don’t even use it at the gym while working out I have a MP3 player that I have had for 3 years and still going strong by Sony.  Needless to say I am replacing this because I do like the tablets and will go with Google Nexus going forward.  Very disappointed yet again with Mr. Samsung.  Hope this review helps the next person purchasing it for themselves or a gift to someone else.

Reviews.Title: Good Enough, But No iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "reverendlinux"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for two reasons. First as a replacement for my aging Kindle. I loved it, but it was on it's last leg. I wanted something I could easily tote around but could also do more than just read books on. Second, and more importantly, I'm in the IT field and wanted to get some experience with the Android platform. After 60 days of use, here's what I've come to learn about these devices.PROS:- Decent weight. The tablet plus the simple Belkin cover are about the same as a Kindle Fire; easy to hold and use as an e-reader.- Excellent design. The tablet overall has a good layout with buttons in the right place (versus in the way). It looks good and the components used seem to be of excellent quality. Although the casing is plastic, it's thick and doesn't flex.- Clear screen. Some reviews I saw marked this tablet down for having a screen resolution that was lower than competitors and not as sharp. Really, in comparison to other Android tablets I can't see a difference. Streaming movies look to be DVD quality with only slight blurring during action scenes. Colors are sharp. Print is easily legible.- Good performance. On occasion I get lags starting up an application or during use. But overall performance is responsive. I've only experienced a couple of application crashes.- Battery life.  Without the wifi on, the battery goes about a week.  With the wifi on, about two days.  Not stellar, but easy to live with.CONS:- NO ANDROID UPDATES. This is my number one gripe. The thing came with Android 4.1.2 while 4.4.2 was released nearly 5 months ago. I would expect slow or no updates from the bottom feeder tablets like Polaroids. But when you shell out $179 for a product from a company that's going toe-to-toe with king of the hill Apple, you expect a bit more in the way of updates.- Shiny screen. The screen is slick and super shiny. It shows finger prints really easy and is hard to clean. Glare can be an issue sometimes.- Screen responsiveness. The touch screen takes more pressure than it should requiring more of a stab than a tap.- Weak WiFi. The tablet can usually manage only about 3/4 signal strength unless I'm within 15 feet of my wifi router. Although I haven't found any dead spots in my 2-story house, the signal gets weak really fast as you move away from the router.- Camera. Although the rear camera is a decent 3MP, the front camera is pretty weak at 1.3MP.  Additionally, the cameras have no flash.- Crapware.  There's a ton of Samsung apps that I'll never use and no way to delete them (short of rooting it which most folks probably aren't going to do).In summary, this is a good tablet for everyday use and at a reasonable price.  It's met my original two goals of being a Kindle replacement and getting to learn Android. However, in comparison to my daughter's iPad Mini...well, there really isn't any comparison. The Apple (among other things) is more responsive, made of better materials, is regularly updated and has a better wifi range.  In the end, if you're on a budget, go with the Samsung.  If you're not, go with the Apple.

Reviews.Title: get something else
Reviews.Author: Cen
Reviews.Content: Having owned each generation of galaxy, this iteration is not up to par.  Don't let the trusted name of Samsung or Galaxy fool you into thinking that this is a similar product.Samsung has made it next to impossible to actually use an external memory card.  Google "move apps to sd card tab 3" and you will discover what many people have discovered. Functionally you have about 4gigs to work with for apps after the system usage.  With very restricted ability to moving apps to a card, that 4 gigs goes fast.The main camera is garbage.  No flash either.  They should have just skipped it and made the front facing camera better.The system is clunky and slow for today's apps.Samsung's separate account is annoying and useless.  It barges in to update or relog.  Nobody uses it, nobody cares about it, it's intrusive bloat.  Users are at the saturation point of user accounts across the tech world.We have one for a child and one for an adult.  With the amount of faults we found on each, we would have been better off getting non/Samsung tabs.  There are cheaper, faster, bigger it there.  The Samsung brand should not influence you on this one, since it is a misfit gutted option.

Reviews.Title: Decent book reader and other recreational uses
Reviews.Author: Thomas W. Day "T.W. Day"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Tab 3 7" unit on a special end-of-production buyout for about $99 shipped. That's pretty much what I've found the tablet is worth to me. It is an excellent back-lit eBook reader with the added bonus of being completely compatible with 3M's Cloud Library system and Adobe's Digital editions library system. For those purposes alone, I think my tablet has paid for itself in saved trips to the library, late fees, and book purchase costs.With a micro-USB adapter, it can be used as a half-decent laptop with the addition of a decent wireless keyboard. The screen is readable from a moderate distance and the processor is certainly fast enough for word-processing or other business software work using the included Polaris Office (compatible with MS Office) software.

Reviews.Author: mandamarierose
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas and wish I would have splurged for something else.  This device stops working in the middle of an app or game. I finally figured out after googling it, that this is common because the device decides on it's own to change the date and time back three years, then the tablet can't recognize what you are doing.  So I have had to manually go in at least 10 times now and fix it when it does that.  Next time I will go with Apple.

It would randomly power down and when I turned it back on the date and time would be reset to 7pm Dec 31st, 2011. Not sure what's so special about that date, pretty sure it was well before they started making these.I got the extended warranty that Amazon recommended from SquareTrade. Thus far they've proven themselves to be a frustratingly useless company. Basic website issues, limited responses with long waits, and unnecessary hoop jumping all included.I hope this helps.
