Reviews.Author: Beth Van Wattingen
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet on July 17. It can be slow at times, it is an ok tablet. The charging mechanism on the tablet was never great. On December 2, the plastic around the charger fell off. The next day the charging mechanism in the tablet  was broken, not allowing me to charge the tablet at all, therefore useless. I called Samsung and they said it was still under warranty. I had to ship it to them and they will fix it, but now I am without a tablet for a week so far. I am very dissatisfied and think Samsung should have just sent me a new tablet since this one was only 4 months old. I will not buy any more Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: jobby
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son who is 2+.  The tablet works eprfectly especially for his little hands. He takes good care of it too.  The pixels are very beautiful, the most beautiful tablet I ahve known, that is both high quality and very affordable..compatible with everything.  It also has a slot for a SD chip, the kind that doesnt have this feature with othe rpopular tablets such as hp.All in all, I love samsung. Cheers to them I am a diehearted lover of their products. They offer amazing quality product and features.  My son enjoys the tablet and the easy use of it.  Quality is good and he manipulates it very well.*Applaud*

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 3 7inch
Reviews.Author: hanna oh
Reviews.Content: Is anyone else experiencing a noticeable lag? I only have 3 apps that I've DL and there not even running in the bg

Reviews.Title: not quite what i expected
Reviews.Author: sean jackson
Reviews.Content: connection and data loading problems, also the battery drains fairly quickly. I guess i should have purchased a kindle fire like i started to.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: S. MacDonald "SMacDonald"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, the person uses it all the time and loves it.  They don't have a computer at home so this is a gem foir them.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Adams
Reviews.Content: Just as seen in the picture and it is truly worth the money and it works pretty well it recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mark Cranage "Mark C"
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my wife as she already owns the Samsung S3 phone and loves it. There was no learning curve.My only gripe is I should have bought a bigger tablet.

Reviews.Title: I likedd the galaxy tab
Reviews.Author: theresa mcfarland
Reviews.Content: the products was everything they posted on line .  I would recommend you pay this product if you want to play games and go on line.

Reviews.Title: Love it, just an all around great tablet...
Reviews.Author: WjFost11
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need in a tablet...alot of people say nexus 7 is superior ..but who cares...this is what I chose to purchase and I'm very satisfied with my purchase..don't listen to the negative talk...unless your like a super geeky nerd who loves what the massed like maybe you should roll with the nexus 7...but my Galaxy Tab 3 does everything I need, so take THAT...LOL

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Allolo
Reviews.Content: Very nice thank you very much for your good and your credibility will be a pleasure to deal with you again <3

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Dollhunter "Diana"
Reviews.Content: I've just had mine for a couple of days, but so far, so good.  I did find a User's manual online, and that's much easier to read than the one that came in the box. I don't think anyone has mentioned that before.  I have a big tablet, and use it mainly for reading and playing games, but it is a little heavy for my purse, so now I am brushing up on things I just never bothered to learn because I was using the first for different things.  I am having a little trouble getting Prime to recognize that I have two, but I probably missed something in the directions..  One comment.  I didn't think I wanted white, but was confused by the color gold-brown.  I still am confused.  To me it looks black.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product and price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Tab 3! Great price and super fast delivery!  I love the price of the Tab 3 compared to the IPad! Try it out, I  guarantee  you'll enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: Right price for the tab.
Reviews.Author: yelitza rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The price is exactly what you pay for.. Very useful and practice. Is not to big just big enough to carry everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anthony Phillips
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product.  Works as advertised. Hane recommended this to my workmates.  Will also recommend it to my personal friends. Thanks

Reviews.Title: What can you get and expect with $200?
Reviews.Author: June
Reviews.Content: it is fast. no lagging at all and the screen has very good quality to watch those HD movies and shows.jellybean is well known fast OS.samsung hardwares inside,i bought this for my gf and she loves it.but the camera has low megapixel but what do you expect when you spend only $200 for a tablet?if you want to compare this 200 bucks device to the high-end tablets, it proves us what type of consumer you are.but i can tell this one fact, this device does definitely better job worth $200.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected for MUSIC
Reviews.Author: Ambercool
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get this because it can support a 64gb micro-sd card in a small form factor.  I wanted to use WAV and/or FLAC formats for my music with this device.  It takes a few seconds just to load the player when my 1st generation iPad and iPhone 5s loads instantly.  The music loads fine after the player is up, but this is too long for this kind of device.  So I thought it was the player and music caching so I tried the internet.Launching the internet browser and other apps gave me the same result.  I really wanted to like this small tablet, but it's just an under performer.  Even my old HTC EVO phone loads faster than this.If you like speed don't get this.  If you want something fast or at least as fast as the technology available from its competitors than this is not for you.I'm going to return this soon.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expecting m
Reviews.Author: justjen9012
Reviews.Content: Wasn't worth the money. It is slow and "glichy"and it only works with WiFi which is my fault for not reading the details better but it still is very slow and doesn't respond well to opening apps.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed by bloatware
Reviews.Author: Shawn F Reynolds
Reviews.Content: My Samsung was delivered timely, packaged to arrive safely.  The product itself isn't very good however.  There are 64 bloatware applications that can't be removed.  That is very frustrating and ensures that my next tablet will not be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality! Do not buy this tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: sarah
Reviews.Content: After seeing this product reviews I purchased this like 2 weeks ago and thought this would last a lifetime. But guess what.. it went dead all of a sudden. I was in middle of loading a page & it just simply blanked out!!! Just wanna tell u guys out there that are looking into buying this tablet that the quality is terrible plus it works pretty slow than I expected.

Reviews.Title: It's is truly ironic that ...
Reviews.Author: mhs101255
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fine, but it is truly ironic that the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is offered for sale on Amazon.com because Amazon Prime subscribers cannot watch any Prime Instant Videos on the device.  It is Amazon's way of pushing its Kindle tablet.Is anyone at the Antitrust Division of the Justice Department looking into this?

Reviews.Title: What can I say, it's a tablet.
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with my credit card reader for my business and now I don't really need it. I decided to keep it to put my finished photography pics on it to show people. After 2 weeks I finally figured out how to do that and I'm fairly good with computers. Unless you have readily available wi-fi, it's pretty useless.There's no real manual for it. What happened to manuals anyway? It has apps I don't want, need or can't figure out a use for. It seems like every app has to go thru google + and who likes google +? The screen is clear and the speakers are OK. I feel like I bought an expensive radio.

Reviews.Title: would not buy this product again.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Bly
Reviews.Content: This product is much more difficult to navigate through.  I do not like the fact that I have to register with sites to get free download apps.  Also, it does not work smooth when trying to move from one site to another.

Reviews.Title: Eh!  Not so great
Reviews.Author: Melida Sottong
Reviews.Content: Device challenged, I bought this tablet after reviewing the list of devices that would support a "Square or Jax".  It does not support these e-commerce additions because it was the wrong version.  I was disappointed but realized I could input credit cards manually so decided to keep it and upgrade later.  However, my Son may be right, Apple products may be more suitable.  I noticed it has a pretty short battery life.  Not what I had hoped for and wish I hadn't bought another one at the same time as a gift.  Think I'll return the second one.

Reviews.Title: unhappy
Reviews.Author: adan francisco
Reviews.Content: Well,I am not happy, first, I ordered a mothern i9500 and inset I got i9505, i was so excited that i decided to leave it like that some of the items that i have bought here they brought payment receipt and some of them not, like my movile My Phone updated and everything became s*** my apps dont work properly so i think someone could give me a warning for that cus i didnt know what s happen if i update my android SO and that s why i feel unhappy with my phone the wi fi doesnt work i have to reset the phone to use it and the IMEI is broken so i cant have a phone number for i just can use my phone like a PSP pffftt.........

Reviews.Title: Out of two phones, one had a bad display. I am going to see if I can exchange it.
Reviews.Author: Ray Kent "rrkentjr"
Reviews.Content: I bought two phones. One of them has a bad display. I am going to see if I can exchange it.

Reviews.Title: here I am
Reviews.Author: Emily A. Wrathall
Reviews.Content: Super excited about my first tab, and it'll be just like my phone, which I freaking love. Yeah...Not so much. It's glichy and slow, and has done some really concerning things- like shut down and reboot and be at factory settings with none of my purchased apps! I rebooted it, and they were magically there. Just a weird thing. Also, none of the accessories I've bought for it fit. (and I made sure they were the right ones!) They're all to big and floppy, with holes in the wrong place. I love my galaxy phone, with all my heart. I just wish my tab was as fast and with it as my phone. It's the slow stupid version it seems. Poopy.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Onea Mihaela
Reviews.Content: Is fabricated in  vietnam and no have sim . No is good in the description sayd that the tablet has a sim. Recived in my country tablet without sim

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 - Not worth the wait... still waiting...
Reviews.Author: mrtraps
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet hoping to find a cost effective, FUNCTIONAL alternative to using a smartphone screen.The shipping was as advertised; the appearance of the tablet was nice. Once I started using the device I almost immediately became dissatisfied. The applications take forever to load. The internet runs so slowly that it is barely usable. The internet connection consistently locks up, requiring the user to go back to the home screen. Over-all performance of this product was disappointing at best.Now the fun part...After receiving an e-mail from both Amazon and ADARAMA CAMERA giving me permission to return the product due to performance issues, ADARAMA CAMERA then told me over the phone (had to call and wait on hold for ten minutes to get their shipping address) that I could not return the tablet and that I would have to deal with Samsung directly. Mind you - I have had this tablet for less than two weeks. The only thing I will definitely emphasize is that if customer service is a priorty, DO NOT ORDER ANYTHING FROM ADARAMA CAMERA !!!S. Trapnell

Reviews.Title: this product is not good at all I cant use it for a month before it's damaged
Reviews.Author: semui balogun
Reviews.Content: Because IDont enjoyed itI can't tell any body to buy itI return it and I dony see my money till now.

Reviews.Title: owned less than a week and went to repair
Reviews.Author: Arthur P
Reviews.Content: Owned less than a week and went to repair. Owned less than a month and went to repair for a second time.  Both times for the same problem... not able to charge.

Reviews.Title: Egh
Reviews.Author: Mister Ca
Reviews.Content: Neutral rating, I ordered this for a birthday gift last month. The recipient never got the package, it says it was delivered but never was at the correct adress. Opened a postal claim ourself etc and contacted the company about it. They came off a little nice but tried having me do a charge back on my  credit card...that's against amazons policy and they knew that. I was refunded and bought another for my gf from Anazon. They are not to blame for the shipping error, but I dislike there honesty with claims.

Reviews.Title: Buy any other tablet but not the Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Field Jr. "Chuck Tech"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slow and unresponsive.  The screen does not respond well to touch.  The processor is so slow that you type things twice.  The lag time is terrible.  When you are on wifii you have to wait a long time for response.  I have ipad, nexus 7, kindle fire and the Microsoft surface.  Any of those other 4 are far superior.  Dont waste your time with this galaxy it is horrendously slow.  If you need a cheap tablet for the kids, get them an XO or one of the 4 tabllets listed above.  Ranked from best to worst 1. ipad (any ipad), 2. Nexus 7, 3. surface, 4. kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Not a good product
Reviews.Author: Leon Rz.Lin
Reviews.Content: Awful product. The worst samsung that I ever had. System operates very slow, the screen constantly no response. This samsung couldn't give me any pleasure, not as good as other samsung products, not practical at all. I am prepare to send it back and get a refund.Whoever read this should consider to buy a kindle or nexus 7.0 or samsung tab 3 8.0

Reviews.Title: nice pice of HW
Reviews.Author: Fauzi Gomez "FG"
Reviews.Content: My phone is faster, but I just bought this table to stop using my phone for everything (mostly web surf and some games), I have a Galaxy S IV.It get stock pretty easy, (I have a lot of apps and increasing). the 8'' ipad is faster, but 179$ is pretty lower than apple stuffs

Reviews.Title: hEADLINE
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Davison
Reviews.Content: i WISH IT CAME WITH AN USERS MANUAL, AS IT IS I HAVE TO DOWNLOAD IT BUT OTHERWISE I LOVE IT (GUSHY SOUNDING)BUT I AM SURE I AM NOT UTILIZING ALL OF IT'S FUNCTIONS

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: BOLIVAR VILLACIS
Reviews.Content: When I saw that is a new model, I expected more. The galaxy 3 is ok, but could be better

Reviews.Title: Arrived with scratches and was only good for 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Seema Kumari
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet with scrathes; started using it and it was good for 2 weeks and then it completely stopped working. Tried different options from Samsung Customer support but not worked!! Crap

Reviews.Title: One tablet defective
Reviews.Author: Gmk "Mitch"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my 19 and 21 year old granddaughters as Christmas gifts. Both girls were very excited about the gift, especially because it's a Samsung. Now the tablet will not come on after recharging and she's heartbroken. I bought a Samsung because of their reputation for producing great products. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Kerry
Reviews.Content: It works well and is a nice tablet, but I actually liked the Tab2 much better.  Sometimes changes made aren't the best.

Reviews.Title: uhh.so-so
Reviews.Author: Rita Nones
Reviews.Content: i received it yesterday its for my boyfriend's bday present its okay but its kinda slow i mean we have a good internet connection but its slow.

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it so I returned it.
Reviews.Author: Nello O. Mehl "Online instructor"
Reviews.Content: I returned it  It is too smooth and hard to handle with big hands. It is too sensitive to touch. Difficult to find different type of cases let's say similiar to iPad.  I have used a Tab 2 before and I loved it but didn't have the same experience with this one.They are fantastic about refunding money.  Quick. Accurate and overall experience GREAT

Reviews.Title: Dont spend your money
Reviews.Author: Xavier Roberts
Reviews.Content: terriable do not buy the wifi doesn't work it moves slow please do not by this terrible item. noo good!!

Reviews.Title: false advertising by Amazon
Reviews.Author: AMAZON
Reviews.Content: The site is advertising a 300 dollar credit towards services, THERE IS NOTHING INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE, NO EMAIL, NO DIRECTIONS HOW TO GET THIS. COSTCO IS SELLING THESE FOR 179 WITH A CASE. I WILL BE RETURNIBG THIS ONE.

Reviews.Title: slow..
Reviews.Author: jinhui wu
Reviews.Content: my note 2 is better than this tab  ..so slow and crash few times .nothing so special about this product

Reviews.Title: Fried after a week and a half
Reviews.Author: wuSchu
Reviews.Content: Completely fried in a week and a half. Only had 1 app and 2 widgets on it. Was using it to display my photographs to customers. Fried... Seriously... Fried! Non responsive, not turning on, using it as a paper weight FRIED!!!! So... 1 star it is. What a POS.

Reviews.Title: Bad shepment
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: He left it on the door steps. And it could be stolen if i didnt pay atention i hope that wouled change

Reviews.Title: Way overpriced!
Reviews.Author: djm1976
Reviews.Content: I bought mine at Fry's electronics for the every day price of  $160. As far as the tablet goes it's just alright. Deinitely not what I expected from a Galaxy product at all. I would save your $ if I were you. Not Samsung's best product by a long shot.

Reviews.Title: This item turned out to be more than I wanted.
Reviews.Author: DianaD "DianaD"
Reviews.Content: My 21 year old grandson thought I was crazy when I returned it.  He loved it!  He said I am missing out on the whole Internet "revolution".  It was perfect for him!  I am going to order the Kindle Fire HDX.  It sounds perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: abagels
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money!!! It's a cheap knock off of the iPad mini. I had this for one week and the charger port broke. Battery life is short. You will rip threw a battery just surfing the web. It's so slow loading pictures and or videos. You get what you pay for, cheep junk.

Reviews.Title: No handwriting.
Reviews.Author: Wait4Retire "Wait4Retire"
Reviews.Content: Quick and nice, but no handwriting function. Some games are not available, I was told to download handwriting apps, I did and tried 2 apps, none worked. Returned.

Reviews.Title: It is so Cool.
Reviews.Author: Joanna R Snow
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because it is so cool. Wow like so cool I really mean that you know right.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this
Reviews.Author: carrie fowler
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for literally 2 days and I hate it. It looks great and is a nice size, however, it is so slow! I will click an app and the tablet doesn't even recognize my touch and when it does it takes at least 5 seconds to respond. Every single app I have downloaded (a whopping total of 5) are slow and don't load. I am pretty sure it's not the app itself since these apps work just fine on my Galaxy S3. I bought this tablet because I love my phone, but it is obvious that Samsung dropped the ball on this tablet. I definitely do NOT recommend and am returning it asap!

Reviews.Title: Not the best of Tablets!
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Jordan
Reviews.Content: I tested the Samsung Tab2 WIFI only(sent by Samsung Sales Dept to do a product review in my Blog)The listed specs by Samsung seem to "inflate" the actual performance of the 7" Tab2( I have not tested the Tab3,or the 8" or 10" models),for starters the default 8G becomes almost 4.7 G of internal memory,because of the operating system and default apps using a big "chunk" of memory.It might be fine if you don't go crazy downloading myriad apps,but very limited for serious use.A minor disappointment is the front 1.3 pixel camera,and even the 3.5 pixel rear camera,grainy photos and "jaggy"videos. Decent but unsharp screen resolution,and bad finish="greenish" cast on screen surface and bad colors at times,plus touch-screen retains finger print marks and looks "messy". Buy an Apple Ipad instead,if you want to brag about a tablet! Worst,battery life is disappointing.

Reviews.Title: love the easiness of it, don't care for the limitations of use
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: i was disappointed to discover that you have to purchase the Tablet directly from Verizon to have it compatible with cell phone data plan.  I wanted this tablet to be not only wifi capable, but also useful when on the road and no access to wifi.  I wanted it then to be used via cell phone data plan.  unfortunately the sales people at Verizon were NOT helpful about this.  They wanted to offer me $35 for my new tablet to trade in for a Verizon capable tablet which cost over $200.  Wish someone would have pointed out prior to purchase.  But as far as using it - I do love that feature!  User friendly, light weight and easy to carry and manage.  Nice graphics and taking pictures is a breeze.  Quality seems good.

Reviews.Title: good utility tablet, but behind others
Reviews.Author: paul "50 year old woodworker"
Reviews.Content: good utility tablet. I got mine from sprint for $49, and a data plan of 2gb for $20 and I like it. But if I were to pay the $150 or so, I would have chosen the Nexus 7 for its better screen resoulation, camera, and operation system.The Samsung is a good tablet and I'm happy with it for what I use it for, but if your looking for latest and greatest this isn't it.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok for the cost, compact and handy
Reviews.Author: Balaji Selvaraju
Reviews.Content: It lacks one of the basic feature in the display setting ->Touch key light duration:Which means the menu and the Back keys will not have lighting option or will not glow. so you can understand the difficulty in working with the device in no/low lights.Not sure if Samsung will take this defect call and come up with upgrades to rectify this defect with millions of cusotmers who bought Galaxy tab3 7.0 around the world?

Reviews.Title: Choppy performance
Reviews.Author: MobileAppProgrammerMan
Reviews.Content: I am returning this and getting the 8.0 inch model--the performance of the 7.0 is just too slow and sometimes it will flicker and redraw the screen for no apparent reason. Can't scroll smoothly or load web pages in a reasonable amount of time. Compared to an iPad mini, I expected the performance to be a bit slower but not this bad. The iPad is worlds better than this. Samsung has obviously done everything possible to make this inexpensive and unfortunately, it shows. It might be ok for some people but not for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Ipad is expensive, but too much better.
Reviews.Author: Santiago R. Castillo
Reviews.Content: The galaxy tab 3 is like a gameboy, buy an ipad mini will be a better option. Samsung is for dummies.

Reviews.Title: huge disappointment
Reviews.Author: Ed Ganza
Reviews.Content: I have another, no name tablet, that cost half as much and performs twice as good! Too many software glitches to evenlist. Reading some 5 star ratings makes it obvious they were made by paid professionals. I would gladly return it for a 50% refund. The first time you go to the internet the registration form appears and NEVER goes away, even if you open a new tab it appears there. Support e-mailed me instructions to remove it but of course that didn't work. I tried to reset to factory specs but the second it's finished it immediately reloads everything that you wanted to get rid of without user input. Does not accept most user preferred settings and many times e-mail confirmed as sent acctually isn't ! I'll go back to my $75 tablet and let the Tab 3 set and collect dust.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Jayne Moehr
Reviews.Content: I have concerns about the return policy. I cannot get the tablet to work and have not been able to return the item. We are very, very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ricsi Canas
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy, I love it, the size is perfect, the color is so cute, I can't said more because I don't have the time to use it yet

Reviews.Title: WHERE IS THE CASE?
Reviews.Author: AAppleton
Reviews.Content: I thought there was a promise to send with the item other accessories including a case.Please confirm.Other than that the item is quite handy and useful and so far does what it was bought to do.

Reviews.Title: Returned after 2 weeks.
Reviews.Author: Sean Anders
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this. The Tab 3 was my first Android device since I moved from the iPhone.The first thing I didn't like was moving back to a lower-resolution screen after having become accustomed to the Retina displays of Apple products. Next, and this is my biggest gripe, I found the user interface to be clunky and ugly. For example, the idea of program widgets is clever, but they do not blend in well with the overall look of the OS. There seems to be no standard design, it looks mashed together. iOS was much more polished and visually appealing.The way the programs were put into different screens was also annoying. In iOS you have up to X main screen where all the programs are listed. On this device there was a separate screen where all your downloaded programs would be listed, then you would have your "home" screens. You had to either make a shortcut from the all-programs screen to one of your home screen or just browse the all-programs screen. Breaking programs up this was seemed completely unnecessary.Having been on iOS now for several years, I refuse to repurchase apps on Android that I already bought on Apple's App Store.

Reviews.Title: Nice but...
Reviews.Author: Ascaris
Reviews.Content: I would have been greatly in love with this tablet had it not been for the capacitative buttons not lighting up.I have the white version.Normally I wouldnt mind little details and I usually love Samsung products. BUT someone dropped the ball big time on this.The tablet is great, its a lot faster and smoother than my Tab 2 7.0 which I love by the way.. Both are small, compact and light weight. Perfect size for me since Im on the move a lot.The new Tab 3 7.0 is even smaller even tho it still maintains the same screen size at7". And also the memory is upgradable via micro SD.But the most annoying issue I have is that the capacitative buttons dont light up, meaning that if you are in a room with low light, it is near impossible to see where the back button and the menu button are.I thought I would love those button not being on the screen itself but it really gets old when while watching a video or even surfing the web or playing in an app and accidentally hitting one of those button since they are not discernable from the frame.In a well lit up room or outside in a sunny day it isnt such an issue since the buttons are grayish outlined. But in a car or a plane where light can be low the whole thing turn gray and cannot see where the buttons are.Now people might think Im just being too overly negative about this issue but for what I bought this upgrade it just isnt working. I hate it, I HATE IT! Always accidentaly touching these invisible buttons. I would have much rather love for them to just leave them inside the screen.And I cannot even let my 2 year old play with it since she cannot tell the buttons arent there. On the tab2 she can see the those button and the home button since they are on screen and she knows what they do. On this one, she keeps getting kicked out of her apps and she thinks something is wrong with the tablet. She like the tab2 better obviously.And the worst part is that I tried looking up if this was due to a deffective product or the tablet is just made that way and even the rep couldnt give me a straight answer telling me that this tablet is made just like the Note and that the buttons light up but not bright, that it depends on the brightness of the screen. wait WHAT? That doesn't even make sense.Also looked up in the options to see if there was an option to turn those on but nothing.If I had the option, I'd just wait for the Nexus or something else, but if this issue does not bother you, Id definitely recommend it to you. As for me, I will explore my options.Update after 3 days with the Unit:2nd day of use and The unit seems to have issues with Wifi connection. Cannot connect to the Play store, but the web browser works just fine. As of yesterday it will not even connect to the Wifi while my tab 2 gets connection. I will try to do a factory reset and see where it takes me. Also it seems to have a issue when hooked up via Aux cable and there is a loud noise (for exemple an explosion or a shout especially while watching an action movie) the sound messes up and I have to unplug the Aux cable and plug it again. Yeah those are definitly too many issues with my unit.I understand that my review score might be a little too harsh to some, but Again, for what I bought this unit for, it is not serving its purpose so it is useless to me so far.Update After day 5:Yeah my unit is pure garbage at this point. Now it won't even connect to my laptop. It keeps restring or shutting off and just showing the charging battery. I'm done with this, returning the unit and giving it another shot but I'm not hoping for much here.I'm still not happy about the Capacitative buttons, but not much can be done here. The rest I'm sure is either I have a defective unit or its just a software issue that hopefully Samsung can fix with updates.I'm hoping I'm the only one with these issues as the Samsung rep told me he's never heard of the unit underperforming like that.All in all, There is much to like about this tablet, but right now with my experience now turning sour I would have to give it a 0 star. I've got a brick on my hand.

Reviews.Title: Samsung -never again!!!!
Reviews.Author: Miroslav
Reviews.Content: The touch screen is not sensitive enough. Poor catches wi-fi signal. I do not know how to turn back ...

Reviews.Title: Too slow
Reviews.Author: Lupito
Reviews.Content: I liked it at first . But then after visiting some web sites I found out this tablet is so slow that it feels like we are back to dial up . So frustrating to spend $ 200 on this when I could add just $ 100 and get a real apple . Tablet must be apple , there is no other way . All others are imitation . Now I will have to save more money . I like the size , features and design of Samsung . But the speed for internet is really annoying . And I've tested in many places . Its not my connection . Besides that , we have to wait to load , load , load when turning on . Just like an old desktop . 2 stars are for the design only . Every time I use my samsung I feel the urge to throw on the floor and break it in million pieces . I will give mine away to someone in the family.

Reviews.Title: Underpower tablet S3, S4, Note II can easily beat
Reviews.Author: Damian Ng
Reviews.Content: The tablet is slow, though beautifully constructed.  The same app ran significantly faster in my Note II.  Bluetooth connection has some issues.  Don't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It never arrived! and they send me a new one
Reviews.Author: Maria Nella Pinza-Salazar
Reviews.Content: It was so frustrating. I was just waiting for it....  And i have to change de color because thisone was out of stock..thankfully thy send me another one when i reported. And this new want works really amaizinly...im gonna put just 3 stars because of the incovenient.But the tab is just amaizing

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Suzie-Ana Boyne
Reviews.Content: I did not get the Samsung Tab with sim card as listed on the site and as I had ordered!!!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
Reviews.Author: nefeteri
Reviews.Content: phone worked for one month and then shut down.....waste of my hard earned money and the sad part is my return window expired

Reviews.Title: Slow and clunky
Reviews.Author: Ian Pulley
Reviews.Content: Terribly slow and terribly clunky interface. Not worth it. Had it less than 3 hours and hated it. Just buy an apple product (this coming from a dyed in the wool windows user).

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: katharina
Reviews.Content: I am so fed up of purchasing stuff for amazon and it doesn't work! Plus paying for prime! Bought this for my kid and it less than a week it froze!

Reviews.Title: best gift
Reviews.Author: Pudda22
Reviews.Content: I brought this for My son he's been asking for this forever now. I told him to get award like this I need good grades & I received his report card wednesday & the boy got honor roll Although he doesn't get nothing less than honor roll I wanted to reward him for his good grades

Reviews.Title: Not like apple product
Reviews.Author: randi130
Reviews.Content: Hi!Very difficult to use. No manual. Like apple product betterVery slow wifi. Apps had to google play to downloadDo not find this user friendly. Everything sync to a google accountSticking with apple in future. Refund? Or exchange available?

Reviews.Title: Pharmacy student/future resident needs help: Kindle Fire HD or Smasung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Lipscomb student
Reviews.Content: Hi!I am 3rd year, stressed out pharmacy student and I need to have quick access to lots of tables/charts/detailed decision trees based on guidelines that fits in my white coat pocket.Right now all my text books are on Access Pharmacy or APhA Library, but Amazon caries all the textbooks we use or I might need in the near future as a resident. My questions are these:1. Do I need Kindle Fire HD or Samsung Galaxy 3 Tab or should I wait until Christmas?2. Can I download a textbook/reference, save it as an app and have access to it whenever I need it without internet connection?3. What kind of screen size will fit in my regular white coat pocket? Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Disapointing tablet
Reviews.Author: Josh Hudson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this on Black Friday for $149.99 and will be returning it soon. This is a horrible tablet. I tried to play a game on it and it was moving in slow motion, the touch screen is not responsive, and the screen is mediocre. Luckily i was able to pick up the last 8gb Nook HD for $79.99 at B&N.; I ran the same apps on the Nook and it was SO much faster and ran sooo smooth. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: No Adobe Flash
Reviews.Author: Mary.J
Reviews.Content: Does not support adobe flash. This was a big problem for me since I Iake online courses and needed it for that soul purpose. Ah I will keep it anyways and it will be my new toy.

Reviews.Title: I do not agree
Reviews.Author: William Orasma
Reviews.Content: hello one of the tablets is defective, I can not handle well the screen is very hard because I wanted to know the shipping address for me to replenish one is in good condition

Reviews.Title: Need a newer version, so it cut be faster that this on
Reviews.Author: Cesar Gomez
Reviews.Content: Way to slow tablet. Not meet my criteria I need something faster something different may be a beer version or may be a tab note

Reviews.Title: VERY POOR THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: IT WAS NOT WHAT I EXPECTED, I NEED A TAB WITH SIM CARD COMPATIBILITY.KEEP THE GOOD WORK FOREVER. I REST MY CASE

Reviews.Title: NEVER RECEIVED MY SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB3
Reviews.Author: Marilyn A. Chorman
Reviews.Content: It's not Amazon's fault, but I never received my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3. The vendor Data Vision is conducting an investigation with Federal Express to find out what happened. FedEx said it was delivered to me but I never got it.  Therefore, I cannot provide Amazon with a review.  I really hope we get a replacement and that we can provide you with a great review.  Until then, we wait...

Reviews.Title: I tried, Lord knows I tried.
Reviews.Author: D. M. Adam
Reviews.Content: I'm a Mac person. iPhone, iPad, iMac, Macbook.  I'm taking a class in cloud computing and we are working on Google drive.  I thought I'd buy an android device.  I thought android would be more compatible with all the google apps.This Tab3 is really clunky.  I found it s-l-o-w.  While supposedly running a 1.2gb processor and 8gb flash memory and 1gb memory.  It became really annoying while trying to open an app, then it would automatically close.I tried to load some music on it.  I found on Youtube, a suggestion to connect it as an external drive than upload.  I unloaded one album, but could never find the music.  Another suggestion was to download an app called 'Kies' -  Kies asks if I wanted ALL my music, and i checked 'NO' I then downloaded one album, when I opened my Galaxy Tab3, I couldn't find the music, but i did find my entire iPhoto library.Trying to delete my photos was impossible, unless I deleted them one at a time.  I had over 4,000 photos uploaded.Finally getting so frustrated, I wiped it, reset to original condition, repacked it and sent it back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Used to be an Samsung Fan - No More
Reviews.Author: Kyle Ryan
Reviews.Content: DON'T BUY UNLESS YOU ALSO INTEND TO BUY ALL PRINTERS ETC... FROM SAMSUNG (Forever).  Samsung, decided to prevent you from printing from Samsung Devices to anything but a Samsung printer.  I assumed this was a software glitch but Samsung verified that they made the phones that way.  Of course I may want to buy that HP PRinter that can print from everything (including all android devices) except Samsung.  This is simply Samsung deciding to inconvenience their customers (in my case former customer) in the hopes that they will buy their other more expensive printers (let alone they aren't even available near me).  Besides, why do I want to be forced to use Samsung products for everything in the future regardless of the value that they provide, the wireless printer Samsung won't print to is an HP and it prints from my HP computer, my microsoft computer and my Apple IPAD.
